GP12nardp1_u:4447: abhivādanaśīlaḥ syād vṛddheṣu ca yathākramam // NarP_1,25.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4449: ādhyātmikā diduḥkhāni nivārayati yo guruḥ // NarP_1,25.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4455: pāṣaṇḍaṃ patitaṃ vrātyaṃ tathā nakṣaghatrajīvinam // NarP_1,25.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4457: unmattaṃ ca śaṭhaṃ dhūrttaṃ dhāvantamaśuciṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4461: bhartṛnghīṃ puṣpiṇīṃ jārāṃ sūtikāṃ garbhapātinīm // NarP_1,25.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4464: pratyekaṃ tu namaskāro hṝnti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:4465: śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyārcanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4466: yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4467: kṛte 'bhivādane yastu na kuryā tprativādanam // NarP_1,25.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4468: nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yayā śūdrastathaiva saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4470: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya adhīyīta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4475: pariveṣaṃ gate sūrye śrotriye gṛhamāgate // NarP_1,25.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4477: saṃdhyāyāṃ garjite meghe hyakāle parivarṣaṇe // NarP_1,25.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4479: manvādiṣu ca devarṣe yugādiṣu caturṣvapi // NarP_1,25.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4481: tṛtīyā prādhave śuklā bhādre kṛṣṇā traghayodaśī // NarP_1,25.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4482: kārttike navamī śuddhā māghe pañcadaśī tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4490: kārtikī phaālgunī caighatrīṃ jyaiṣṭhī pañcadaśī sitā /
GP12nardp1_u:4495: galagrahe durddine ca nādhīyīta kadācanā // NarP_1,25.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4499: anadhyāye tu yo 'dhīte taṃ vidyādvrahmaghātakam // NarP_1,25.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4500: na taṃ saṃbhāṣayedviprana tena saha saṃvaset /
GP12nardp1_u:4503: anadhītya tu yo vedamanyatra kurute śramam // NarP_1,25.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4507: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam // NarP_1,25.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4511: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārtācāreṣu varṇāśramadharmeṣvadhyayanādidharmanirupaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4517: adhītya gurave dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ saṃviśedvṛham // NarP_1,26.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4519: dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyāṃ suśīlāṃ dharma cāriṇīm // NarP_1,26.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:4531: atikṛṣṇāṃ raktavarṇāṃ dhūrtāṃ naivodvahe dvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4532: sadā rodanaśīlāṃ ca pāṇḍurābhāṃ ca kutsitām /
GP12nardp1_u:4537: garvitāṃ bakavṛttiṃ ca sarvathā nodvahedvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4539: pragalbhāṃ vāguṇāṃ jñātvā sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4540: bharttṛputreṣu yā nārī sarvadā niṣṭhurā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:4541: parānukūlinī yā ca sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4543: pūrvaḥ pūrvo varo jñeyaḥ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,26.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4546: brāhmeṇa ca vivāhena vaivāhyo vai dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4549: abhāveṣu tu pūrveṣāṃ kuryādeva parānbudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4553: dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum // NarP_1,26.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4557: parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta paravādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4559: na saṃhatābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyedātmanaḥ śiraḥ // NarP_1,26.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4563: nāroheduṣṭrayānaṃ ca śuṣkavādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4564: anya striyaṃ na gacchecca paiśunyaṃ parivarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4567: asūyāṃ matsaratvaṃ ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4569: svakaṃ nāma svanakṣatraṃ mānaṃ caivātigopayet // NarP_1,26.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4570: na durjanaiḥ saha vase nnāśāstraṃ śṛṇuyāttathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4571: āsavadyūtagīteṣu dvijastu na rartiṃ caret // NarP_1,26.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4572: ārdrāsthi ca tathocchiṣṭaṃ śūdraṃ ca patitaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4573: sarpaṃ ca bhaṣaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret // NarP_1,26.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4574: citiṃ ca citikāṣṭaṃ ca yūpaṃ cāṇḍālameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4575: spṛṣṭvā devalakaṃ caiva savāsā jalamāviśet // NarP_1,26.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4583: tāṃbūlamaśuciṃ nādyāttathā suptaṃ na bodhayet // NarP_1,26.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4585: na vāmahastenaikena pibedvakreṇa vā jalam // NarP_1,26.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4589: darśe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca yāgaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // NarP_1,26.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4593: darśe ca pretapakṣe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādgṛhī dvijaḥ // NarP_1,26.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4594: manvādiṣu mṛdāhe ca aṣṭakāsu ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:4595: nāvadhānye samāyāte gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4597: puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4598: yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:4599: vṛthā bhavati tatsarvamūrddhapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam // NarP_1,26.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4600: urddhapuṇḍraṃ ca tulasīṃ śrāddhe necchanti kecana /
GP12nardp1_u:4604: sadā cāraparā ye tu teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati /
GP12nardp1_u:4605: viṣṇau prasannatāṃ yāte kimasādhyaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,26.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4606: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārttadhermaṣu vedādhyayanādikasya gṛhasthadharmasya ca nirupaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4610: yadrūtāṃ sarvapāpāni naśyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,27.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4618: tathā vṛkṣasya cchāyāyāṃ kāntāre vahnisannidhau // NarP_1,27.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4620: brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe ca tathā goguruyoṣitām // NarP_1,27.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4622: evamādiṣu deśeṣu malamūtraṃ na kārayet // NarP_1,27.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4623: śauce yatnaḥ sadā kāryaḥ śaucamūlo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4625: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ brāhmamābhyāntaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4628: na mūṣakādikhanitāṃ phaālotkṛṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4630: śaucaṃ kuryātprayatnena samādāya śubhāṃ mṛdam // NarP_1,27.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4631: liṅge mṛdekā dātavyā tisro vā meḍhrayordvayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4633: ekā liṅge gude pañca daśa vāme tathobhayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4634: satpa tisraḥ pradātavyāḥ pādayormṛttikāḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,27.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4639: āture niyamo nāsti mahāpadi tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4644: evaṃ śaucaṃ tu nirvartya paścādvai susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,27.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4657: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4658: brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvanno dhehi vanaspate // NarP_1,27.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4666: jihvāmullikhya tābhyāṃ tu dalubhyāṃ niyatendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4668: tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,27.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4670: praṇamya tatra tīrthāni āvāhya ravimaṇḍalāt // NarP_1,27.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4673: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:4676: āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ snānakāle sadā mama // NarP_1,27.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4677: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśīṃ kāñcī hyavantikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4678: purī dvārāvatī jñeyā satpaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // NarP_1,27.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4682: paridhāyāhataṃ dhautaṃ dvitīyaṃ parivīya ca // NarP_1,27.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4684: īśānābhimukho vipra gāyatryācamya vai dvija // NarP_1,27.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4686: tatastu vāriṇātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā samukṣya ca // NarP_1,27.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:4690: vinyasya hṛdaye tāraṃ bhūḥ śirasyatha vinyaset // NarP_1,27.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4692: bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathātrāstraṃ dikṣu tālatrayaṃ nyaset // NarP_1,27.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4694: āgaccha varade devi tryakṣare brahmavādini // NarP_1,27.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4700: tāraṃ ca vyāhṛtīḥ satpa tripadāṃ ca samuccaran // NarP_1,27.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4701: śiraḥ śikhāṃ ca saṃpūrya kubhayitvā virecayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4704: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne sāyamagniścameti ca // NarP_1,27.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4706: sumutriyā na ityuktvā nāsāspṛṣṭajalena ca // NarP_1,27.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4708: ṛtaṃ ca satyametena kṛtvā caivādhamarṣaṇam // NarP_1,27.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4710: tataḥ sūryāya vidhivadgandhaṃ puṣpaṃ jalāñjalim // NarP_1,27.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:4717: brahmaṇī caturānanākṣavalayā kumbhaṃ karaiḥ srukstravau bibhrāṇā tvaruṇendukāntivadanā ṛgrūpiṇī bālikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4718: haṃsārohaṇakelikhaṇkhaṇmaṇerbibārcitā bhūṣitā gāyatrī paribhāvitā bhavatu naḥ saṃpatsamṛddhyai sadā // NarP_1,27.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4719: rudrāṇī navayauvanā trinayanā vaiyāghnacarmāṃbarā khaṭvāṅgatraghiśikhākṣasūtravalayābhītiśriyai cāstu naḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4721: dhyeyā sā ca sarasvatī bhagavatī pītāṃbarālaṅkṛtā śyāmā śyāmatanurjaroparilasadgātrāñcitā vaiṣṇavī /
GP12nardp1_u:4722: tārkṣyasthā maṇinūpurāṅgadalasadgraiveyabhūṣojjvalā hastālaṅkṛtaśaṅkhacakrasugadāpahmāśriyai cāstu naḥ // NarP_1,27.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4728: gṛhasthasya sattāraḥ syājjapya evaṃvidho mune // NarP_1,27.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:4729: tato japtvā yathāśakti savitre vinivedya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4730: gāyatryai ca savitre ca prakṣipedañjalidrūyam // NarP_1,27.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4731: tato visṛjya tāṃ vipra uttare iti mantrataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4734: prātarādeḥ paraṃ karma kuryādapi vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,27.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4737: āturāṇāṃ tu rogadyaiḥ pānthānāṃ ca sakṛnmatam /
GP12nardp1_u:4740: śarvaryāḥ prathame yāme tāni kuryādyathākramam // NarP_1,27.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:4742: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,27.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4762: dvijānāṃ bhojyamaśrī yātpātraṃ naiva parityajet // NarP_1,27.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:4763: saṃsthāpya svāsame pādau vastrārddhaṃ paridhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4764: mukhena vamitaṃ bhuktvā surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,27.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4766: pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva gomāṃsaśīti gadyate // NarP_1,27.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4768: śabda na kārayedviprastaṃ kurvannārakī bhavet // NarP_1,27.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:4778: putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥkṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // NarP_1,27.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4783: varjaye dgrāmajātāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4784: aṣṭau grāsāṃśca bhuñjīta na kuryādrātribhojanam // NarP_1,27.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4786: vyavāyaṃ varjayeccaiva nidrālasye tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4790: yadā manasi vairāgyaṃ jātaṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu // NarP_1,27.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:4796: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ // NarP_1,27.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:4802: japecca praṇavaṃ nityaṃ jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:4812: nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyedātmānaṃ parataḥ param // NarP_1,27.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:4814: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devaṃ ca sadā dhyāyejjitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:4816: sa yāti paramānandaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam // NarP_1,27.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:4818: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocayati // NarP_1,27.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:4820: nārāyaṇaparā yānti tadviṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,27.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:4821: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāreṣu gṛhasthaāvānaprasthayatidharmnirupaṇaṃ nāma satpaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4825: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,28.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4827: adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī niśi viprānnimantrayet // NarP_1,28.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4830: adhvānaṃ kalahaṃ krodhaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca dhuraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4831: śrāddhakarttā ca bhoktā ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,28.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4832: śrāddhe nimantrito yastu vyavāyaṃ kurute yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:4842: ete niyojitavyā vai śrāddhe viprā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4845: kuṣṭī ca kunakhī caiva laṃbakarṇaḥ kṣatavrataḥ // NarP_1,28.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4847: kuvādī parirvattā ca tathā devalakaḥ khalaḥ // NarP_1,28.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4851: kuṇḍaśca golakaścaiva hyayājyānāṃ ca yājakaḥ // NarP_1,28.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4864: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4867: sa kālaḥ kutapastatra pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam // NarP_1,28.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4868: aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu dattaḥ kālaḥ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12nardp1_u:4869: tatkāla eva dātavyaṃ kavyaṃ tasmāddvijottamaiḥ // NarP_1,28.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4871: rākṣasaṃ taddhi vijñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭati // NarP_1,28.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:4872: kāvyaṃ prattaṃ tu sāyāhne rākṣasaṃ tadbhavedapi /
GP12nardp1_u:4873: dātā narakamānpoti bhoktā ca narakaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,28.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4875: viddhāparāhni kāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ vijānatā // NarP_1,28.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:4877: pūrvā kṣaye tu karttavyā vṛdvau kāryā tathottarā // NarP_1,28.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4879: tithiḥ sāyāhnagā yatra parā kāvyasya viśrutā // NarP_1,28.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4881: naitanmataṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kāvyadāne munīśvara // NarP_1,28.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4885: ubhau ca viśvedevārthaṃ pighatrarthaṃ trīnyathāvidhi // NarP_1,28.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4889: vaiśyasya vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ śūdrasyābhyābhyukṣaṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,28.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4891: ātmānaṃ vā niyuñjīta na vipraṃ vedavarjitam // NarP_1,28.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4894: brāhmaṇānāṃ tu madhye ca dvāradeśe tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4895: apahatā ityṛcā vai karttā tu vikirettilān // NarP_1,28.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4897: dattveti bhūyo dadyacca daive kṣaṇapratīkṣaṇam // NarP_1,28.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4899: annadāne caturthī syāccheṣāḥ saṃpuddhayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,28.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4902: yavosīti ti yavān kṣitpvā gandhapuṣpe ca vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4904: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4909: śannodevyā jalaṃ kṣiptvā tilosīti tilānkṣaghipet // NarP_1,28.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4911: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ ca pūrvavat // NarP_1,28.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:4915: agnau kariṣya ityuktvā tebhyo 'nujñāṃ samāharet // NarP_1,28.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4917: kuruṣva kriyatāṃ veti kurviti brūyureva ca // NarP_1,28.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4919: sāmāya ca pitṛmate svadhā nama itīrayet // NarP_1,28.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4920: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama itīha vā /
GP12nardp1_u:4923: agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau homo vidhīyate // NarP_1,28.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4924: yathācāraṃ prakurvīta pāṇāvagnau ca vā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:4926: saṃdhāyāgniṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā taṃ visṛjetkṛtī /
GP12nardp1_u:4929: kṣayāhe caiva saṃprātpe svasyāgnirdūrago yadi // NarP_1,28.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:4932: yadyagnau juhuyādvāpi pāṇau vā sa hi pātakī /
GP12nardp1_u:4933: upāsanāgnā dūrasthe kecidicchanti vai dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4938: ye yatra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāṃ bhavantu te /
GP12nardp1_u:4939: iti saṃprārthayeddevānye devāsa ṛcā nu vai // NarP_1,28.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:4941: amūrtānāṃ mūrtānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ dītpatejasām // NarP_1,28.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4945: tataste brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bhuñjīranvāgyatā dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4947: yathaācāra pradeyaṃ ca madhunāṃsādikaṃ tathā // NarP_1,28.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:4949: yadi pātraṃ tyajetko 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ śrāddhayojitaḥ // NarP_1,28.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4951: bhañjāneṣu ca vipreṣu hyanyonyaṃ saṃspuśedyadi // NarP_1,28.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:4957: trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca pāvamānaṃ yajūṃṣi ca // NarP_1,28.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4961: brāhmaṇeṣu ca bhukteṣu vikiraṃ vikṣipettathā // NarP_1,28.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:4962: śeṣamannaṃ vadeccaiva madhusūktaṃ ca vai japet /
GP12nardp1_u:4963: svayaṃ ca pādau prakṣaghālya samyagācamya nārada // NarP_1,28.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:4967: acālayitvā pātraṃ tu svasti kurvanti ye dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:4971: dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā tāṃbūlaṃ gandhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,28.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:4974: bhoktā ca śrāddhakṛttasyāṃ rajanyāṃ maithunaṃ tyajet /
GP12nardp1_u:4979: paitṛkena tu sūktena homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,28.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4981: snātvā ca vidhivadvipra kuryādvā tilataparṇam // NarP_1,28.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4984: paredyuḥ śrāddhakṛnmartyo yo na tarpayate pitṝn /
GP12nardp1_u:4985: tatkulaṃ nāśamāyāti brahmahatyāṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,28.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:4986: śrāddhaṃ kurvanti ye martyāḥ śraddhāvanto munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4987: na teṣāṃ saṃtaticchedaḥ saṃpannāste bhavanti ca // NarP_1,28.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:4988: pitṝnyañjati yeṃ śrāddhe taistu viṣṇuḥ prapūjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4991: yakṣāśca siddhā manujā harireva sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:4993: tasmāddātā ca bhoktā ca sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4994: yadasti vipra yannāsti dṛśyaṃ cādṛśyameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4995: sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jñeyaṃ tasmādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,28.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:4999: karttā kārayitā caiva sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:5001: kathitaḥ kurvatāmevaṃ pāpaṃ sadyo vilīyate // NarP_1,28.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:5002: ya idaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā śrāddhakāle dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5004: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde śrāddhakriyāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5009: śrautaṃ smārttaṃ vrataṃ dānaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:5010: anirṇītāsu tithiṣu na kiñcitphalati dvija // NarP_1,29.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5014: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭī śivaviddhā tu satpamī // NarP_1,29.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5016: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ ca satpamīṃ pitṛvāsaram // NarP_1,29.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5018: kṛṣṇapakṣe pūrvaviddhāṃ satpamīṃ ca caturdaśīm // NarP_1,29.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:5020: vratādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śuklapakṣo viśiṣyate // NarP_1,29.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5022: asaṃbhave vratādīnāṃ yadi paurvāhnikī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5028: arddharātrādadho yā tu nakṣatravyāpinī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5032: arddharātradvaye syātāṃ nakṣatraṃ ca tithiryadi // NarP_1,29.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5033: kṣaye pūrvā praśastā syādrṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5038: tataḥ syustithayaḥ puṇyāḥ karmānuṣṭānato divā // NarP_1,29.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5041: tasyāṃ tu tadvataṃ kāryaṃ saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5048: vṛṣabhe vṛścike caiva siṃhe kumbhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,29.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5050: tulāyāṃ caiva meṣe ca pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,29.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5052: kanyāyāṃ mithune caiva mīne dhanuṣi ca dvija // NarP_1,29.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5058: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,29.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5063: kṣaye pūrvā tu karttavyā vṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5075: tatrecchayā ca saṃgrāhyā pūrvā vātha parāthavā /
GP12nardp1_u:5081: paredyureva viprendra sadyaḥ kālo vidhīyate // NarP_1,29.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:5083: sadyaḥ kālaḥ paredyuḥ syājjñeyamevaṃ tithikṣaye // NarP_1,29.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5087: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti cetsā parā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5089: traghayodaśī ca rātryante tatra vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // NarP_1,29.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:5090: pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ sā kāryyā hyuttarā yatibhistathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5091: gṛhasthāḥ siddhimicchanti yato mokṣaṃ yatīśvarāḥ // NarP_1,29.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:5092: dvādaśyāṃ tu kalāyāṃ vā yadi labhyeta pāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5094: śulke vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe bhavedekādaśīdvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:5095: gṛhasthānāṃ tu pūrvoktā yatīnāmuttarā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:5098: viddhāpyekādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:5099: aviddhāpi niṣiddhaiva parato dvādaśī yadi // NarP_1,29.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:5103: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ nāsti vā vidyate 'thavā // NarP_1,29.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:5107: dvādaśī ca trayodaśayāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,29.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:5111: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatraiva cāpare // NarP_1,29.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:5112: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā sarvaireva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5113: kecidāhuśca pūrvāṃ tu tanmataṃ na samañjasam // NarP_1,29.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:5115: pāraṇaṃ copavāsaṃ ca na kuryātputravāngṛhī // NarP_1,29.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:5119: nādyādvai yadi bhuñjīta surāpena samo bhavet // NarP_1,29.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:5121: prāyaścittaṃ muniśreṣṭha karttavyaṃ tatra yājñikaiḥ // NarP_1,29.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5123: āpyāyasva ṛcā caiva somapāsta iti dvija // NarP_1,29.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:5127: yaḥ karoti vratādīni tasya syādakṣayaṃ phalam // NarP_1,29.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5129: tasmāddharmaparā yānti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,29.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:5132: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde tithyādinirṇayo nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5138: tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ proktaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parisevitam // NarP_1,30.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5143: brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5150: taddravyaṃ dhvajadaṇḍe tu dhṛtvā vanacaro bhavet // NarP_1,30.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5156: yadi vanyairna jīveta grāme bhikṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,30.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5160: gonimittaṃ dvijārthaṃ vā prāṇānvāpi parityajet // NarP_1,30.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5167: hatvā tu vipramātraṃ ca caretsaṃvatsaraṃ vratam /
GP12nardp1_u:5169: dviguṇaṃ kṣatriyasyoktaṃ triguṇaṃ tu viśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:5170: brāhmaṇaṃ hṝnti yaḥ śūdrastaṃ muśalyaṃ virdurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,30.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5171: rājñaiva śikṣā kartavyā iti śāsteṣu niścayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5172: brāhmaṇīnāṃ vadhe tvarddhaṃ pādaḥ syātkanyakāvadhe // NarP_1,30.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:5174: hatvā tu kṣatriyaṃ vipraḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kucchramācaret // NarP_1,30.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5175: saṃvatsaraṃ trayaṃ veśyaṃ śūrdraṃ hatvā tu vatsaram /
GP12nardp1_u:5176: dīkṣitasya striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇī cāṣṭavatsarān // NarP_1,30.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5178: prāvaścittaṃ vidhānaṃ tu sarvatra munisattama // NarP_1,30.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5180: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā // NarP_1,30.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5182: kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtrameteṣvanyatamaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5186: tāmreṇa vāthaṃ pātreṇa tatpītvā maraṇaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,30.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5188: ajñānādātmabuddyā tu surāṃ pītvā dvijaścaret // NarP_1,30.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:5194: tālaṃ ca pānasaṃ caiva drākṣaṃ khārjūrasaṃbhavam // NarP_1,30.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:5196: gauḍī mādhvī surā madyamevamekādaśa smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,30.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:5200: samakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā balāccauyaṇa vā tathā // NarP_1,30.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:5202: suvarṇasya pramāṇaṃ tu manvādyaiḥ paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,30.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:5212: guruṇāṃ yajñakatṝṇāṃ dhārmiṣṭānāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,30.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5214: kṛtānutāpo dehe ca saṃpūrṇe lepayed dhṛtam // NarP_1,30.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:5216: brahmasvaṃ kṣatriyo hṛtvā paścāttāpamavāpya ca // NarP_1,30.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5226: gaurasarṣapamānaṃ tu hṛtvā hema vicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,30.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:5230: hema kṛṣṇalamātraṃ tu hṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ caret // NarP_1,30.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:5238: hatvā ca rajataṃ vidvānkuryāccāndrāyaṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:5249: haste gṛhītvā muṣkaṃ tu gacchandvai naiṛtīṃ diśam /
GP12nardp1_u:5250: gacchanmārgai sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācidvicārayet // NarP_1,30.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5256: kārīṣavahninā dagdhaḥ śuddhiṃ yāti dvijottama // NarP_1,30.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5262: gatvā śūdvāṃ gurorbhāryāṃ trivarṣaṃ vratamācaret // NarP_1,30.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:5264: pitṛvyabhāryāmatha mātulānīṃ putrīṃ ca gacchedyadi kāmamugdhaḥ // NarP_1,30.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:5268: dinatraye gate vahnidagdhaḥ śudhyeta nānyathā // NarP_1,30.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:5269: cāñjālīṃ puṣkasīṃ caiva snuṣāṃ ca bhaginīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5270: mitrastriyaṃ śiṣyapatnīṃ yastu vai kāmato vrajet // NarP_1,30.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:5282: kṛtvā saṃgaṃ tu ṣaṇmāsaṃ careccāndrāyaṇadvayam // NarP_1,30.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:5284: etacca triguṇaṃ proktaṃ jñānātsaṃge yathākramam // NarP_1,30.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:5285: maṇḍūkaṃ nakulaṃ kākaṃ varāhaṃ mūṣakaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5286: mārjārājāvikaṃ śvānaṃ hatvā kukkuṭakaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:5288: jatpakṛcchraṃ karivadhe parākaṃ govadhe smṛtam // NarP_1,30.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:5292: śuṣkakāṣṭatṛṇānāṃ ca drumāṇāṃ ca guḍasya ca // NarP_1,30.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:5294: ṭiṭṭibhaṃ cakravākaṃ ca haṃsaṃ kāraṇḍavaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:5296: śukaṃ cāṣaṃ balākaṃ ca śiśumāraṃ ca kacchapam // NarP_1,30.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:5300: rajasvalāṃ ca cāṇḍālaṃ mahāpātakinaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:5302: spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snāyīta ghṛtaṃ saṃprāśeyattathā // NarP_1,30.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:5306: snānadānajapādau ca bhojanādau ca nārada // NarP_1,30.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:5315: prāyaścittaṃ tu teṣāṃ ca kuryādevaṃ yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:5320: mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ // NarP_1,30.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:5321: vimukta eva pāpebhyo jñeyo viṣṇuparo yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5323: yastu saṃsmarate martyaḥ sa muktaḥ pāpakoṭibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5324: smṛto vā pūjito vāpi dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā // NarP_1,30.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:5326: saṃparkādyadi vā mohādyastu pūjayate harim // NarP_1,30.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:5330: mānuṣaṃ durlabhaṃ janma prāpyate yairmunīśvara // NarP_1,30.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:5335: paraṃ mokṣaṃ labheścaiva pūjite tu janārdane /
GP12nardp1_u:5339: labdhvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ vṛttiṃ rere darpaṃ tu mā kṛthāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5340: saṃtyajya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:5341: parāpavādaṃ nindāṃ ca bhajadhvaṃ bhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:5344: yāvannāyāti maraṇaṃ yāvannāyāti vai jarā // NarP_1,30.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:5352: bhaktyā yajati yo viṣṇuṃ mahāpātakavānapi // NarP_1,30.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:5353: so 'pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yatragha gatvā na śocati /
GP12nardp1_u:5354: sarvatīrthāni yajñāśca sāṃgā vedāśca sattama // NarP_1,30.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:5356: kiṃ vai vedairmakhaiḥ śāstraiḥ kiṃvā tīrthaniṣevaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,30.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:5358: yajanti ye viṣṇumanantamṛrtiṃ nirīkṣya cākāragataṃ vareṇyam /
GP12nardp1_u:5359: vedāntavedyaṃ bhavarogavaidyaṃ te yānti martyāḥ padamacyutasya // NarP_1,30.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:5361: jyotiḥ svarupaṃ paramacyutākhyaṃ smṛtvā samabhyeti naraḥ sakhāyam // NarP_1,30.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:5362: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde prāyaścittavidhirnāma ghatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5372: ye narā dānaśīlāstu te yānti sukhino dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:5373: dharmaśūnyā narā yānti duḥkhena bhṛśamarditāḥ // NarP_1,31.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5375: kradanto vistaraṃ dīnāḥ pāpino yānti tatpathi // NarP_1,31.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5379: kvacidvai dāvarupeṇaḥ tīkṣṇadhārāḥ śilāḥ kvacit // NarP_1,31.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5383: śarkarāśca tathā loṣṭāḥ sūcītulyāśca kaṇṭakāḥ // NarP_1,31.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5385: kvacivdyāvrāśca garjante vardhante ca kvacijjvarāḥ // NarP_1,31.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:5391: vahṝntaścāyasāṃ bhāraṃ śiśrāgreṇa prayānti vai // NarP_1,31.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5393: karṇābhyāṃ ca tathā kecidvahṝnto yānti pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,31.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:5397: śocantaḥ svāni karmaṇi jñānājñānakṛtāni ca // NarP_1,31.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5398: ye tu nārada dharmiṣṭhā dānaśīlā subuddhayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5400: annadāstu munuśreṣṭha bhuñjantaḥ svādu yānti vai /
GP12nardp1_u:5413: anaḍuddo muniśreṣṭha yānāruḍhaḥ prayāti vai // NarP_1,31.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5415: tāṃbūlado naro yāti prahṛṣṭor dhamamandiram // NarP_1,31.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5417: sa yāti parituṣṭātmā pūjyamāno divisthitaiḥ // NarP_1,31.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:5424: evaṃ dharmaparā yānti sukhaṃ dharmasya mandiram /
GP12nardp1_u:5429: manuṣathya janma yaḥ prāpya sukṛtaṃ na karoti ca // NarP_1,31.31 //

GP12nardp1_u:5852: na gṛhṇāti na tyajati vāyumantarbahiḥ sthitam /
GP12nardp1_u:5853: viddhi tacchūnyakaṃ nāma prāṇāyāmaṃ yathāsthitam // NarP_1,33.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:5855: anyathā khalu jāyante mahārogā bhayaṅkarāḥ // NarP_1,33.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:5859: samāmāhṛtya nigṛhṇāti pratyāhārastu sa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,33.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:5863: mūḍhātmānaṃ ca taṃ vidyāddhyānaṃ cāsya na sidhyati // NarP_1,33.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:5877: dhyānaṃ kṛtvā muhurttaṃ vā paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,33.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:5881: tena dhyānena tuṣṭātmā harirmokṣaṃ dadāti vai // NarP_1,33.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:5883: dhyānaṃ dhyeyaṃ dhyātṛbhāvaṃ yathā naśyati nirbharam // NarP_1,33.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:5888: yogī samādhyavasthāyāṃ na śṛṇoti na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:5889: na jighrati na spṛśati na kiñcadvakti sattama // NarP_1,33.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:5895: tannāśe nirmalaṃ brahma prakāśayati paṇḍitaṃ // NarP_1,33.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:5899: paśyanti yajjñānavidāṃ variṣṭāḥ parātparasmātparamaṃ pavitram // NarP_1,33.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:5903: ānandaṃ nirmalaśāntaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:5905: avikāramajaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:5914: vācyaṃ tu paramaṃ brahma vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5917: tadabhyāsena saṃyuktāḥ paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhanti ca // NarP_1,33.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:5926: iti śrībṛnnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde yoganirupaṇaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5932: yasya tuṣyati sarveśastasya bhaktiśca śāśvatam // NarP_1,34.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5937: bhaja sarvātmanā vipra yadi muktimabhīpsasi // NarP_1,34.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5938: ripavastaṃ na hiṃsanti na bādhante grahāścatam /
GP12nardp1_u:5939: rākṣasāśca na cekṣante naraṃ viṣṇuparāyaṇam // NarP_1,34.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5942: pādau tau saphalau puṃsāṃ yau viṣṇugṛhagāminau /
GP12nardp1_u:5943: tau karau laphalau jñeyau viṣṇupūjāparau tu yau // NarP_1,34.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5944: te netre suphale puṃsāṃ paśyato ye danārdanam /
GP12nardp1_u:5945: sā jihvā procyate sadbhirharināmaparā tu yā // NarP_1,34.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5947: tattvaṃ gurusamaṃ nārita nata devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // NarP_1,34.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5948: satyaṃ vacmihitaṃ vācmi sāraṃ vacmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5952: tanmanaḥ saṃyutaṃ viṣṇau sā vāṇī yatparāyaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5955: ākāśamadhyagaṃ devaṃ bhaja nārada saṃtatam // NarP_1,34.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5956: sthānaṃ na śakyate yasya svarupaṃ vā kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:5965: parabrahmamayo devaḥ suṣutpa iti gīyate // NarP_1,34.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5969: vartate yasya tasyaiva tuṣyate jagatāṃ patiḥ // NarP_1,34.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5972: satkathāyāṃ ca ramate satkathāṃ ca karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5973: satsaṅgo nirahaṃ kārastasya prīto ramāpatiḥ // NarP_1,34.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5975: karoti satataṃ yastu tasya prīto hyadhokṣajaḥ // NarP_1,34.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5977: tasyāstuṣṭo jagannātho dadāti svapadaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5981: mā kuruṣva hyahaṅkāraṃ vidyullolaśriyā vṛthā // NarP_1,34.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5984: kiṃ na paśyasi devarṣe hyāyuṣārddhaṃ tu nidrayā /
GP12nardp1_u:5985: hataṃ ca bhojanādyaiśca kiyadāyuḥ samāhṛtam // NarP_1,34.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:5990: mā vināśaṃ vraja mune magnaḥ saṃsāragahvare /
GP12nardp1_u:5993: kimarthaṃ śāśvatadhiyā kuryātpāpaṃ naro vṛthā // NarP_1,34.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:5995: viśvāso nātra karttavyo niścitaṃ mṛtyusaṃkule // NarP_1,34.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6004: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya yo hariṃ nārcayetsakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:6006: durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ nārcayanti ca ye harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6007: teṣāmatīva mūrkhāṇāṃ vivekaḥ kutra tiṣṭhati // NarP_1,34.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6015: tathaḥā carācaraṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇāviva pralīyate // NarP_1,34.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6018: janmano maraṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ janma vai mṛtyusādhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:6019: ubhe te nikaṭe viddhi tannāśo harisevayā // NarP_1,34.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6020: dhyātaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā praṇato vā janārdanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6023: yaṃ samabhyarcya viprarṣe mokṣabhāgī bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,34.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6025: harināmni sthite lokaḥ saṃsāre parivarttate // NarP_1,34.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6037: bhūyo bhūyo hitaṃ vacmi bhujamuddhṛtya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:6044: narakāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ ca tasmāttadapi saṃtyajet // NarP_1,34.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6048: viṣṇau sthite jagannāthe na bhajanti madoddhatāḥ // NarP_1,34.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6050: saṃsārasāgare magnāḥ kathaṃ pāraṃ prayānti hi // NarP_1,34.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6052: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham // NarP_1,34.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6054: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ te vai sarvatra vanditāḥ // NarP_1,34.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6055: adyāpi ca muniśreṣṭa brahmādyā api devatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6056: yatprābhāvaṃ na jānanti taṃ yāhi śaraṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6058: hṛtpadmasaṃsthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ na vijānanti nārada // NarP_1,34.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6060: hariḥ śraddhāvatāṃ tuṣyenna dhanairna ca bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,34.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6066: haripūjāratānāṃ tu bhavatyena na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,34.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6074: cauryeṇa rakṣitamiva viddhi lokeṣu niścitam // NarP_1,34.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:6078: hari bhakti yutā daivī taddhīnā hyāsurī mahā // NarP_1,34.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:6080: śreṣṭhāḥ sarvatra vikhyātā yato bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // NarP_1,34.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:6082: kāmādirahitā ye ca teṣāṃ tuṣyati keśavaḥ // NarP_1,34.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:6085: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde haribhaktilakṣaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6089: paṭhatāṃ śuṇvatāṃ sadyaḥ pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati // NarP_1,35.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6100: karmaṇā manasā vācā yo yajedbhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6101: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ sarvalokottamottamam // NarP_1,35.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6105: yasya śravaṇamātreṇa vācimedha phalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,35.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6112: tapasāṃ vikrayaṃ cakre vratānāṃ vikrayaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6114: kālena gacchatā vipra jātau tasya sutāvubho /
GP12nardp1_u:6128: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6129: cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇekā taruṇāyate // NarP_1,35.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6131: balaṃ hataṃ ca jarasā tṛṣṇā taruṇatāṃ gatā // NarP_1,35.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6132: kaṣṭāśā varttate yasya sa vidrānatha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6136: balaṃ tejoḥ yaśaśvaiva vidyāṃ mānaṃ ca vṛddhatām /
GP12nardp1_u:6137: tathaiva satkule janma āśā hatyativegataḥ // NarP_1,35.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6141: avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho // NarP_1,35.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6143: śarīramapi jīrṇaṃ ca jarasāpahataṃ balam // NarP_1,35.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6145: evaṃ niścitya viprendra dharmamārga rato 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6147: svayaṃ tu bhāga dvitaya svārjitārthādapāharat // NarP_1,35.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6151: annādīnāṃ ca dānāni gaṅgātīre cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,35.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6153: nāranārāyaṇa sthānaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // NarP_1,35.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6158: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tatra muniṃ jānanti saṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:6159: gṛṇantaṃ paramaṃ brahma tejorāśiṃ dadarśa ha // NarP_1,35.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6165: vinayāvanato bhūtvā provāca vadatāṃ varam // NarP_1,35.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6173: bhaja viṣṇuṃ paraṃ nityaṃ smara nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP12nardp1_u:6174: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ kadācidapi mā kṛthāḥ // NarP_1,35.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6177: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca madamatsarau /
GP12nardp1_u:6179: asūyāṃ paranindāṃ ca kadācidapi mā kuru /
GP12nardp1_u:6181: dayāṃ kuruṣva bhuteṣu śuśrūṣāṃ ca tathā satām /
GP12nardp1_u:6182: tvayā kṛtāṃśca dharmānvai mā prakāśaya pucchatām // NarP_1,35.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6192: mārgaśobhāṃ ca dīpaṃ ca viṣṇorāyatane kuru // NarP_1,35.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6196: vedāntapaṭhanaṃ caiva pratyahaṃ kuru śaktitaḥ // NarP_1,35.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6202: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā keti svayameva vyaktintayat // NarP_1,35.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6203: mama janma kathaṃ jātaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:6209: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā kā ca mama janma kathaṃ vada // NarP_1,35.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6211: satyaṃ satyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ cittaṃ bhrātaṃ suniścitam /
GP12nardp1_u:6214: ahṝṅkāro manodharma ātmano nahi paṇḍita // NarP_1,35.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6215: punaśca ko 'hamityuktaṃ vedamāle tvayā tu yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6216: mama jātyādi śūnyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // NarP_1,35.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6220: avicchinnasvabhāvasya kathyate ca kathaṃ kriyā // NarP_1,35.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6222: anantasya kriyā caiva kathaṃ janma ca kathyate // NarP_1,35.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6226: jñāne tvanāhate siddhe sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,35.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6232: guruṃ praṇamya jānanti sadā dhyānaparo 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6237: iti śrībṛhannārādīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde jñānanirūpaṇa nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6241: yajñamālī sumālī ca tayoḥ karmādhunocyata // NarP_1,36.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6243: dhanaṃ dvidhā kaniṣṭasya bhāgamekaṃ dadau tadā // NarP_1,36.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6244: sumālī ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vyasanābhirakataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6245: apādānā dibhiścaiva nāśayāmāsa bho dvija // NarP_1,36.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6261: ādade svayamarddhaṃ ca dadāvarddhaṃ yavīyase // NarP_1,36.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6266: bhrātrā dattaṃ dhanaṃ tañca sumālī nāśayanmune /
GP12nardp1_u:6269: rājñāpi bādhito vipraprapede nirjanaṃ vanam // NarP_1,36.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6281: yajñamālī sumālī ca hyekakāle mṛtāvubhau // NarP_1,36.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6283: hariḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa vimānaṃ pārṣadā vṛtam // NarP_1,36.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6293: krośantaṃ ca sudantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā manasi vivyathe // NarP_1,36.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6297: asau sumālī bhrātā te pāpātmeti samabruvan // NarP_1,36.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6299: manasā duḥkhamāpannaḥ punaḥ papraccha nārada // NarP_1,36.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6301: tadupāyaṃbadadhvaṃ me yūyaṃ hi mamabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,36.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6303: satāṃ sāptapadī maitrī satsatāṃ tripadī tathā // NarP_1,36.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6304: satsatāmapi ye saṃtasteṣāṃ maitraghī pade pade // NarP_1,36.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6305: tasmānme bāndhavā yūyaṃ māṃ netuṃ samupāgatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6306: yato 'yaṃ mama bhrātāpi mucyate tadihocyatām // NarP_1,36.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6314: purā tvaṃ vaiśyajātīyo nāmnā viśvaṅghabharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6315: tvayā kṛtāni pāpāni ahantyagaṇitāni vai // NarP_1,36.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6319: tadā vṛṣṭirabhūttatra tatsthānaṃ paṅkilaṃ hyabhūta // NarP_1,36.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6323: daṃśitaścaiva sarpeṇa prāptaṃ pañcatvameva ca // NarP_1,36.42,1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6325: viprajanma tvayā prāptaṃ hari bhaktistathācalā // NarP_1,36.42,2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6327: vasādya jñānamāsādya paraṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // NarP_1,36.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6329: upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmastaṃ nibodha mahāmate // NarP_1,36.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6333: tatphalaṃ pradadau tasmai bhrātre pāpavimuktaye // NarP_1,36.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6335: babhūva yamadūtāstu taṃ tyaktvā prapalāyitāḥ // NarP_1,36.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6337: tadā sumālī svaryānamāruhya mumude mune // NarP_1,36.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6347: sthitvā bhūmiṃ punaḥ prāpya vipratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // NarP_1,36.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6351: tatra snātaśca gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśveśvaraṃ prabhum // NarP_1,36.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6355: akāmādapi ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛtpūjāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,36.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6362: śuśrūṣāniratā yānti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // NarP_1,36.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6363: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇusevāprabhāvo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6367: kasya no jāyate prītiḥ śrotuṃ harikathāmṛtam // NarP_1,37.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6370: sakṛdvā na namedyastu viṣṇuṃ pāpaharaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:6373: śmaśānasadṛśaṃ taddhi kadācidapi no viśet // NarP_1,37.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6376: yo vā ko vāpi viprendra vipradveṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6377: samarcayati govindaṃ tatpūjā viphalā bhavet // NarP_1,37.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6379: sā pūjaiva mahābhāga pūjakānāśu hṝnti vai // NarP_1,37.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6385: dṛḍhabhaktimatāṃ viṣṇau pāpabuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,37.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6387: kṣayaṃ yāti kṣaṇādeva teṣāṃ syātpāpadhīḥ katham // NarP_1,37.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6389: caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ // NarP_1,37.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:6395: sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,37.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6399: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,37.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6409: na teṣāṃ śakyate vaktuṃ saṃkhyā vatsarakoṭibhiḥ // NarP_1,37.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6415: chaditaṃ hemakalaśairdṛṣṭvā vyādho mudaṃ yayau // NarP_1,37.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6421: cauryāntarāyakartāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhako mune // NarP_1,37.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6425: hṝntuṃ kṛtamatiṃ vyādhamuttaṅkaḥ prekṣya cābravīt // NarP_1,37.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6427: bho bho sādho vṛthā māṃ tvaṃ haniṣyasi nirāgasam /
GP12nardp1_u:6428: mayā kimaparāddhaṃ te tadvadasva mahāmatte // NarP_1,37.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6430: nahi saumya vṛthā ghnanti sajjanā api pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,37.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6432: virodhaṃ nahi kurvanti sajjanāḥ śāntacetasaḥ // NarP_1,37.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6434: tamuttamaṃ naraṃ prāhurviṣṇoḥ priyataraṃ sadā // NarP_1,37.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6436: chede 'pi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya // NarP_1,37.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6437: aho vidhiḥ subalavānbā dhate bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6439: aho niṣkāraṇaṃ loke bādhante bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6447: ante tatsarvamutsṛjya eka eva prayati vai // NarP_1,37.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6448: mama mātā mama pitā mama bhāryā mamātmajāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6449: mamedamiti jantūnāṃ mamatā bādhate vṛthā // NarP_1,37.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6453: mṛtamagnimukhe hutvā ghṛtānnaṃ bhuñjate hi te // NarP_1,37.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6454: gacchantaṃ paralokaṃ ca naraṃ tu hyanutiṣṭataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6455: dharmādharmauṃ na ca dhanaṃ na putrā na ca bāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,37.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6458: vṛthaiva vyākulā lokā dhanādānāṃ sadārjane // NarP_1,37.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6460: iti niścitabuddhīnāṃ na cintā bādhate kvacit // NarP_1,37.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6462: tasmājjanma ca mṛtyuṃ ca daivaṃ jānāti nāparaḥ // NarP_1,37.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6463: yatra kutra sthitasyāpi yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhaved dhruvam /
GP12nardp1_u:6464: lokastu tatra vijñāya vṛthāyāsaṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,37.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6467: arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ bhuñjate bāndhavāḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6470: gulikaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha kṣamasveti punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,37.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6473: mayā kṛtā ni pāpāni mahānti subahūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6474: tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni viprendra tava darśanāt // NarP_1,37.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6476: kathaṃ me niṣkṛtir bhūyo yāmi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vibhoḥ // NarP_1,37.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6478: atrāpi pāpajālāni kṛtvā kāṃ gatimāpnuyām // NarP_1,37.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6479: aho mamāyuḥ kṣayameti śīghraṃ pāpānyanekāni samarjjitāni /
GP12nardp1_u:6480: prātikriyā naiva kṛtā mayaiṣāṃ gatiśca kā syānmamajanma kiṃ vā // NarP_1,37.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6481: aho vidhiḥ pāpaśatā kulaṃ māṃ kiṃ sṛṣṭavānpāpataraṃ ca śaśvat /
GP12nardp1_u:6482: kathaṃ ca yatpāpaphalaṃ hi bhokṣye kiyatsu janmasvahamugrakarmā // NarP_1,37.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:6485: uttaṅkaḥ patitaṃ prekṣya lubagdhakaṃ taṃ dayāparaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6495: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāttadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6497: tasmānnato 'smi te vidvanmatkṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva ca // NarP_1,37.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6499: pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,37.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6505: vareṇa tenoktaṅko 'pi prapede paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:6513: pādodakasya māhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,38.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6516: cakrābjaśārṅgīsidharaṃ mahāntaṃ smṛtārtinighnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6517: yannibhijābja prabhavo vidhātā sṛjatyamuṃ lokasamuñcayaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6518: yatkrodhajo hṝnti jagañca rudrastamādidevaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum // NarP_1,38.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6520: vedāntavedyaṃ pukuṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taijonidhiṃ viṣṇumahaṃ prapannaḥ // NarP_1,38.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6522: jñānaikavedyo bhagavānanādiḥ prasīdatāṃ vyaṣṭisa praṣṭirupaḥ // NarP_1,38.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6524: nityaḥ prapannārti haraḥ parātmā dayāṃbudhirme varadastu bhaghūyāt // NarP_1,38.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6526: tvameva tatsarvamanantasāraṃ tvattaḥ paraṃ nāsti yataḥ parātman // NarP_1,38.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6528: nirañjanaṃ nirmalamaprameyaṃ paśyanti santaḥ paramārthasaṃjñam // NarP_1,38.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6530: tathaiva sarveṣvara eka eva pradṛśyate bhinna ivārivalātmā // NarP_1,38.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6532: ta eva māyārahitāstadeva pasaayanti sarvātmakamātmarupam // NarP_1,38.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6544: indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ // NarP_1,38.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6548: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,38.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6549: varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ purāṇaṃ sanātanaṃ sarvagataṃ samastam /
GP12nardp1_u:6550: nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyaḥ // NarP_1,38.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6552: yannāma duṣkarmanivāraṇāyacaya tamaprameyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6560: viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // NarP_1,38.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6561: yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6562: pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum // NarP_1,38.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6563: yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati /
GP12nardp1_u:6569: sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6570: jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje // NarP_1,38.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6576: yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6577: sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram /
GP12nardp1_u:6582: vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6583: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:6584: jānanti devā kamalodbhavādyastoṣyāmyahaṃ taṃ kathamātmarūpam // NarP_1,38.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6585: saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham /
GP12nardp1_u:6586: akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum /
GP12nardp1_u:6587: dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6601: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam // NarP_1,38.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6602: asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6604: punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam // NarP_1,38.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6605: kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6607: kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī ca // NarP_1,38.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6608: evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham // NarP_1,38.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6609: puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan // NarP_1,38.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6612: tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6621: āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,38.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6622: pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6627: so 'pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,38.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6628: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6634: śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,39.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6638: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_1,39.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6641: dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:6644: cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ // NarP_1,39.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6646: yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā // NarP_1,39.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6648: vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam // NarP_1,39.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6655: sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6667: tanme vada mahābhāga kiṃ tvayā viditaṃ phalam // NarP_1,39.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6671: tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NarP_1,39.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6672: sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6673: tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet // NarP_1,39.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6682: piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī // NarP_1,39.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6685: sa kadāciddharthaṃ tu pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭan dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6687: tasminmṛte tasya bhāryā nāmnā bandhumatī mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6688: kāmacāraparā sā tu parityaktā ca bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,39.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6692: gāvaśca viprā bahavo nihatā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,39.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6696: kadācitkāmasaṃtapto gantu kāmo ratiṃ striyaḥ // NarP_1,39.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6697: śūnyaṃ viṣṇugṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaśca striyā saha /
GP12nardp1_u:6698: niśi rāmopabhogārthaṃ śayitaṃ tatra kāminā // NarP_1,39.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6704: evaṃ sthite viṣṇugṛhe hyāgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // NarP_1,39.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6705: jāro 'yamiti māṃ tāṃ ca hatavantaḥ prasahya vai /
GP12nardp1_u:6706: āvāṃ nihatya te sarve nivṛttāḥ purakṣakāḥ // NarP_1,39.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6712: tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,39.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6714: tataśca bhūmibhāgeṣu devayogeṣu vai kramāt // NarP_1,39.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6718: bhaktyā kurvanti ye saṃtasteṣāṃ puṇyaṃ na vedyaham // NarP_1,39.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6720: yatiṣye parayā bhaktyā hyahaṃ jātismaro yataḥ // NarP_1,39.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6724: bhaktibhadbhiḥ praśāntaiśca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,39.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6729: anityā bāndhavāḥ sarve vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6730: nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,39.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6731: ajño loko vṛthā garvaṃ kariṣyati mahoddhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6738: sarvabhūtadayā vāpi sulabhā yasya kasya cit // NarP_1,39.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6740: durlabhaṃ prāpyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ na tathā gamayed budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6744: bhrātarāśraya govindaṃ mā vilaṃbaṃ kuru priya /
GP12nardp1_u:6745: āsannameva nagaraṃ kṛtāntasya hi dṛśyate // NarP_1,39.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6749: ye prapannā mahātmānaste kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,39.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6755: pānīyaṃ vā phalaṃ vāpi sa eva bhagavatpriyaḥ // NarP_1,39.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6756: viṣṇubhaktiparāṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣāṃ kurvate tu ye /
GP12nardp1_u:6758: ye yañjati spṛhāśūnyā haribhaktān hariṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6759: ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ puṃnati svāṅghripāṃśunā // NarP_1,39.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6762: pūjyamānā ca tulasī yasya tiṣṭati veśmani /
GP12nardp1_u:6765: na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ // NarP_1,39.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:6771: sāṃgā vedāstathā sarve viṣṇorūpaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,39.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:6773: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam // NarP_1,39.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6774: iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6777: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6778: yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,40.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6785: atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho // NarP_1,40.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6786: indrastu kīdṛśaḥ prokto vivudhāḥ kīdṛśāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6787: teṣāṃ ca kīdṛśaṃ karma yathāvadvaktumarhasi // NarP_1,40.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6789: na jñāyate mayā śakra pūrvedyuścaritaṃ vidheḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6792: yo vijānāti taṃ te 'dya kathayāmi niśāmaya // NarP_1,40.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6793: sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava /
GP12nardp1_u:6795: sa vā eta dvijānāti kathayāmi niśāmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:6799: dṛṣṭvā yathārhaṃ devarṣe pūjayāmāsa sādaram // NarP_1,40.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6808: dānena vā tapobhirvā kathametādṛśaḥ prabho // NarP_1,40.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6813: ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa // NarP_1,40.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6815: indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava // NarP_1,40.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6816: tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6817: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,40.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6824: bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6835: amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ca tathā śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:6836: āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ // NarP_1,40.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6844: vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,40.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6846: krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ // NarP_1,40.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6849: caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6850: evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ // NarP_1,40.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6853: karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ // NarP_1,40.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6854: mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6855: teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto 'smyadya dvijottama // NarP_1,40.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6859: tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,40.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6860: mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:6862: ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6869: gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho // NarP_1,40.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6871: mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam // NarP_1,40.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6873: saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,40.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6880: kathaṃ bhavatyugrabhavasya bandhastatsaṅgalubdhā yadi muktibhājaḥ // NarP_1,40.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6881: ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:6882: te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,40.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:6883: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
GP12nardp1_u:6884: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // NarP_1,40.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6886: te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ // NarP_1,40.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6888: tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija // NarP_1,40.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6892: pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati // NarP_1,40.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6893: pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6894: teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati // NarP_1,40.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6899: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6902: ākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida /
GP12nardp1_u:6908: tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale // NarP_1,41.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6909: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12nardp1_u:6912: kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ // NarP_1,41.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6914: tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt // NarP_1,41.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6916: nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,41.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6917: sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau /
GP12nardp1_u:6918: vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake // NarP_1,41.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6930: haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:6933: dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:6940: adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā // NarP_1,41.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6942: kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate // NarP_1,41.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6944: dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate // NarP_1,41.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6946: yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca // NarP_1,41.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6948: naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'sūyāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,41.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:6952: prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6955: kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,41.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6957: kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6964: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // NarP_1,41.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6968: adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ // NarP_1,41.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6969: ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6972: vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ // NarP_1,41.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6975: śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6976: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // NarP_1,41.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6981: dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo 'khilāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6984: ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6987: pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:6991: sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6992: na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ // NarP_1,41.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6994: dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ // NarP_1,41.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6996: dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate // NarP_1,41.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6997: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7000: na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,41.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7003: dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7030: bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,41.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7032: ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate // NarP_1,41.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7038: nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca // NarP_1,41.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7042: prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam // NarP_1,41.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7044: dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ // NarP_1,41.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7046: śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ // NarP_1,41.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7047: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7048: na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro 'tra saṃkare // NarP_1,41.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7049: kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7054: śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune // NarP_1,41.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7060: kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ // NarP_1,41.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7068: nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham // NarP_1,41.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7075: yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet // NarP_1,41.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7076: yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7079: sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // NarP_1,41.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7080: evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:7082: tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7085: dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // NarP_1,41.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7087: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // NarP_1,41.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7088: ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7089: kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7090: namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7091: niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7092: harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:7093: ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān // NarP_1,41.95//.
GP12nardp1_u:7095: ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,41.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7097: ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // NarP_1,41.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7103: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ // NarP_1,41.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7105: iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate // NarP_1,41.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7107: itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,41.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:7109: iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam // NarP_1,41.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7111: ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā // NarP_1,41.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7124: aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare /
GP12nardp1_u:7125: te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api // NarP_1,41.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7127: satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija // NarP_1,41.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:7135: evaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7139: prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam // NarP_1,41.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:7144: tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu /
GP12nardp1_u:7149: brahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:7157: pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana // NarP_1,42.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7159: sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ // NarP_1,42.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7161: śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham // NarP_1,42.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7162: kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7163: asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān // NarP_1,42.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7171: kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada // NarP_1,42.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:7173: sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā // NarP_1,42.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:7175: lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so 'yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ // NarP_1,42.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7179: jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt // NarP_1,42.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7181: evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam // NarP_1,42.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7184: mānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,42.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7187: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7188: so 'mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // NarP_1,42.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:7192: tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // NarP_1,42.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7195: brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7196: śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī // NarP_1,42.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:7199: agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute /
GP12nardp1_u:7200: nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ // NarP_1,42.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7202: sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ // NarP_1,42.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7205: tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yadiha tvayā // NarP_1,42.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7208: kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ // NarP_1,42.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:7211: ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate // NarP_1,42.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7213: tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ // NarP_1,42.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7214: te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7226: paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7227: trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā // NarP_1,42.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7228: adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7229: siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ // NarP_1,42.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7232: yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7237: puṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram /
GP12nardp1_u:7238: brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me // NarP_1,42.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7243: tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ // NarP_1,42.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7245: prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7249: saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam // NarP_1,42.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7251: yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varddhante yena ca prajāḥ // NarP_1,42.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7253: pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare /
GP12nardp1_u:7257: kathaṃ vā medinī sṛṣṭetyatra me saṃśayo mahān // NarP_1,42.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7262: tyaktāhārāḥ sparddhamānā divyaṃ virṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ // NarP_1,42.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7264: divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt // NarP_1,42.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7282: bhūmiryo niriyaṃ jñeyā yasyāḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // NarP_1,42.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:7284: ya ete dhātavaḥ pañca rakṣyā yānasṛjatprabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7292: pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam // NarP_1,42.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7294: śrotre ghrāṇo rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiścendriyasaṃjñitāḥ // NarP_1,42.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:7297: sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7299: vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7300: va śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7301: na ca sparśaṃ hi jānanti te kathaṃ pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7307: ūṣmato mlāyate parṇaṃ tvakphalaṃ puṣpameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7308: mlāyate śīryate cāpi sparśastenātra vidyate // NarP_1,42.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7314: arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ saṃti tasmājjighranti pādapāḥ // NarP_1,42.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7316: jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇāmacaitanyaṃ na vidyate // NarP_1,42.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7319: jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre paṃñca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7320: pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7321: tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyuśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7325: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7327: śleṣmā pittamatha svedo vasā śoṇitameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7328: ityāpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā // NarP_1,42.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7337: nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rukṣo viśada eva ca // NarP_1,42.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7339: jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyaḥ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā // NarP_1,42.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7340: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasaścāpi guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7341: rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // NarP_1,42.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7345: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaśca triguṇaṃ jyotirucyate // NarP_1,42.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7346: jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7349: kaṭhinaścikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo mṛdu dāruṇaḥ // NarP_1,42.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7355: eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,42.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7359: vāyavyastu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaśca bahudhā smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,42.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7360: uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ snigdho viśada eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7361: tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo lavurgurutaro 'pi ca // NarP_1,42.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7366: āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavastaistu dhātubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7369: pārthivaṃ dhātumāsādya yathā ceṣṭayate balī // NarP_1,42.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:7371: prāṇo mūrddhani vāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7372: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7373: mano buddhirahṝṅkāro bhūtāni viṣayaśca saḥ // NarP_1,42.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7374: evaṃ tviha sa sarvatra prāṇaistu paripālyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7375: pṛṣṭatastu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritaḥ // NarP_1,42.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7389: ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām // NarP_1,42.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7391: sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam // NarP_1,42.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7393: nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,42.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:7396: eṣa mārgo 'pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam /
GP12nardp1_u:7400: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7404: śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7409: yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā /
GP12nardp1_u:7411: saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7413: kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane /
GP12nardp1_u:7414: kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā // NarP_1,43.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7420: pīḍite 'nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām // NarP_1,43.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7422: kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca // NarP_1,43.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:7424: yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati // NarP_1,43.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7425: gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:7426: ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ // NarP_1,43.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7428: agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7429: chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati /
GP12nardp1_u:7430: jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati // NarP_1,43.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:7434: ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham // NarP_1,43.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7439: na prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7440: yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate // NarP_1,43.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7447: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate // NarP_1,43.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7451: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7456: prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām // NarP_1,43.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7459: patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvamayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7460: jagamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,43.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:7469: śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ vettubhicchāmi yādṛśam // NarP_1,43.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:7471: bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate // NarP_1,43.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7473: śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam // NarP_1,43.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7474: śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat /
GP12nardp1_u:7475: maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7477: manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // NarP_1,43.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7478: na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate /
GP12nardp1_u:7479: na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7480: hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko 'tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7481: icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ // NarP_1,43.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7484: sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye 'lye // NarP_1,43.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7486: saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham // NarP_1,43.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7487: yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake /
GP12nardp1_u:7488: tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati // NarP_1,43.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7490: tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt // NarP_1,43.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:7492: tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare // NarP_1,43.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7494: tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām // NarP_1,43.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7495: acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam /
GP12nardp1_u:7496: ataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti prāvartayadyo bhuvanāni sapta // NarP_1,43.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:7497: na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede mithyaitadāhurmuna ityabuddhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7498: jīvastu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti daśārddhatastasya śarīrabhedaḥ // NarP_1,43.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7503: cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:7509: tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tathā brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12nardp1_u:7510: ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ // NarP_1,43.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7515: cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhidyate // NarP_1,43.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:7517: tvantaḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmādvarṇo vibhajyate // NarP_1,43.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7521: na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:7522: brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇā varṇatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,43.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:7526: svadharṃmannānutiṣṭanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:7528: kṛṣṇāḥ śaucapāribhrāṣṭāste dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7532: brahma caiva purā sṛṣṭaṃ yena jānanti tadvidaḥ // NarP_1,43.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7537: brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:7538: vaiśyaḥ śūdraśca viprarṣe tadbrūhi vadatāṃ vara // NarP_1,43.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7543: nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate // NarP_1,43.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7545: tapasyāṃ dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7547: dānādānaratiryastu sa vai kṣatriya ucyate // NarP_1,43.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7549: vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ // NarP_1,43.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7551: tyaktavedastvanācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7552: śūdre caitadbhavellakṣma dvije tacca na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7553: na vai śūdro bhavecchūdro brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇo na ca // NarP_1,43.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7560: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān // NarP_1,43.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7570: nivedādeva nirvāṇaṃ na ca kiñcidviccitayet // NarP_1,43.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7572: śauce tu satataṃ yuktaḥ sadācārasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,43.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7574: satyaṃvrataṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ satyaṃ visṛjate prajā // NarP_1,43.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7575: satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svaḥ satyenaiva gacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:7576: anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hyadhaḥ // NarP_1,43.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7578: suduṣprakāśa ityāhurnarakaṃ tama eva ca // NarP_1,43.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7580: tatrāpyevaṃvidhā loke vṛttiḥ satyānṛte bhavet // NarP_1,43.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7585: sukhaṃ hyanityaṃ bhūtānāmiha loke paratra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7586: rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate // NarP_1,43.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7587: tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ naśyate sukham // NarP_1,43.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7588: tatkhalu dvividhaṃ sukhamucyacate śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7589: iha khalvamuṣmiṃśca loke vastupravṛttayaḥ sukhārthamabhidhīyante nahītaḥ paratrāparvagaphalādviśiṣṭataramasti /
GP12nardp1_u:7593: na tadupagṛhṇīmo na hyeṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām // NarP_1,43.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:7594: aprāpya eṣa kāmya guṇaviśeṣo na cainamabhiśīlayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:7595: tapasi śrūyate trilokakṛdbrahmā prabhurekākī tiṣṭati brahmacārī na kāmasukhoṣvātmānamavadadhāti // NarP_1,43.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7596: api ca bhagavānviśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmamabhivartamānamanaṅgatvena samamanayat // NarP_1,43.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7597: tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti // NarP_1,43.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7598: naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtātsukhamavāpyate 'nyathā duḥkhamiti // NarP_1,43.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7600_0: atrocyate anṛtātkhalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tatastamograstā adharmamevānuvartante na
GP12nardp1_u:7601: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nāsti na jarā na ca pātakam /
GP12nardp1_u:7602: nityameva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkhamihobhayam // NarP_1,43.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7604: pṛthivī sarvabhūtānāṃ janitrī tadvidhāḥ striyaḥ // NarP_1,43.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7608: hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntiruttamā // NarP_1,43.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7610: dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārthamihaiva ca // NarP_1,43.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7613: yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute // NarP_1,43.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7615: kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7622: teṣāṃ sve sve samācārāstanme vaktumihārhasi // NarP_1,43.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7624: pūrvameva bhagavatā brahmaṇā lokahitamanutiṣṭatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthamāśramāścatvāro 'bhinirddiṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,43.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7629: iti gārhasthyaṃ khalu dvitīyamāśramaṃ vadanti // NarP_1,43.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7631: samāvṛtānāṃ sadācārāṇāṃ sahadharmacaryaphalārthināṃ gṛhāśramo vidhīyate // NarP_1,43.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7632_1: vā brahmarṣinirmitena vā adbhiḥ sāgaragatena vā dravyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena
GP12nardp1_u:7632_2: vā dhanena gṛhastho gārhasthyaṃ vartayet // NarP_1,43.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7633_0: taddhi sarvāśramaṇāṃ mūlamudāharanti gurukulanivāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye 'nye saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭāninasteṣāmapyantarā
GP12nardp1_u:7634: vānaprasthānāṃ ca dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalvete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyodanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṃginastīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti // NarP_1,43.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7638: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // NarP_1,43.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:7639: api cātra yajñakriyābhirdevatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vidyābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ apatyotpādanena prajāpatiriti // NarP_1,43.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:7651: vānaprasthāḥ khalvapi dharmamanusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprastravaṇāni svabhakteṣvaraṇyeṣu mṛgavarāhamahiṣa śārdūlavanagajākīrṇeṣu tapasyante anusaṃcaranti // NarP_1,43.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:7662: na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayamutpadyate kvacit // NarP_1,43.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:7664: viprastu bhaikṣopagatairhavirbhiścitā gninā saṃvrajate hi sokān // NarP_1,43.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:7666: anindhanaṃ jyotiriva praśāntaṃ sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ // NarP_1,43.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:7667: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde brāhmaṇācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7674: puṇyaḥ kṣemyaśca kāmyaśca sa paro loka ucyate // NarP_1,44.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7677: sa svargasadṛśo deśaḥ tatra hyuktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7678: kāle mṛtyuḥ prabavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca // NarP_1,44.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7680: nānyo hi vadhyate tatra dravyeṣu ca na vismayaḥ // NarP_1,44.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:7681: paro hyadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7682: kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣamupalabhyate // NarP_1,44.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7688: sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ kecinnirdhanā dhanino pare // NarP_1,44.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7689: iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7691: yastadvedo bhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7696: iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7702: ihasthāstatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ // NarP_1,44.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7706: ihaiva parivarttante na ca yāntyuttarāṃ diśam // NarP_1,44.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7710: dharmādharmauṃ hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān // NarP_1,44.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:7713: yadadhyātmaṃ yathā caitattanme brūhi tapodhana // NarP_1,44.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7716: tadvyākhyāṃsyāmi te tāta śreyaskaratamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,44.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7718: yajjñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,44.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7722: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti layaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,44.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7724: prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ // NarP_1,44.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7725: tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭāni harate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7727: akarotteṣu vai samyak taṃ tu jīvo na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7728: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayamākāśayonijam // NarP_1,44.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7729: vāyoḥ sparsastathā ceṣṭā tvakcaiva tritayaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7730: rūpaṃ cakṣustathā pākastrividhaṃ teja ucyate // NarP_1,44.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7731: rasāḥ kledaśca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7732: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca ete bhūmiguṇāstrayaḥ // NarP_1,44.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:7733: mahābhūtāni pacaiva ṣaṣṭaṃ ca mana ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7736: śrotraṃ vai śravaṇārthāya sparśanāya ca tvak smṛtā // NarP_1,44.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7743: tamo rajaśca sattvaṃ ca te 'pi bhāvāstadāśritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7744: etāṃ buddhiṃ naro buddhā bhūtānāgatiṃ gatim // NarP_1,44.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7750: yena paśyati tañcakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotramucyate // NarP_1,44.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7752: tvacā sparśayati sparśaṃ buddhirvikriyate sakṛt // NarP_1,44.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7756: puruṣe tiṣṭatī buddhistriṣu bhāveṣu vartate // NarP_1,44.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7758: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadācidapi vartate // NarP_1,44.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7759: evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣu vartate /
GP12nardp1_u:7764: indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pravartayati sā sadā // NarP_1,44.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7765: prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokastamaḥ krodhastu te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7766: ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'sminsarve pyeteṣu vai triṣu // NarP_1,44.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7768: indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā // NarP_1,44.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7771: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:7774: tava yatprītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet // NarP_1,44.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7780: praharṣaḥ prītirānandaḥ sukhaṃ vā śāntacittatā // NarP_1,44.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7782: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaśca śoko lobhastathā kṣamā // NarP_1,44.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7787: manaḥ svaniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretyaceha ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7789: sṛjatehi guṇāneka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP12nardp1_u:7790: maśakoduṃbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā // NarP_1,44.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7792: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau sapraṃyuktau ca sarvadā // NarP_1,44.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:7793: yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayukto tathaiva tau /
GP12nardp1_u:7794: na guṇā vidurātmānaṃ sa guṇānvetti sarvaśaḥ // NarP_1,44.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7795: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ tu saṃstraṣṭā manyate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7798: sṛjate hi guṇānsattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati // NarP_1,44.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7800: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaścana // NarP_1,44.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7801: sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjate na guṇānvai kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:7802: raśmīṃsteṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅniyacchati // NarP_1,44.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7804: tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityamātmaratirmuniḥ // NarP_1,44.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7806: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī salilena na lipyate // NarP_1,44.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7810: bhāvayuktyā prayuktastu sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān // NarP_1,44.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7818: malināḥ prāṇnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ // NarP_1,44.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:7820: mahānadyā hi pārajñastapyate na taranyathā // NarP_1,44.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7821: na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ kulajñastu taratyuta /
GP12nardp1_u:7822: evaṃ ye viduradhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānamuttamam // NarP_1,44.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7823: evaṃ buddhā naraḥ sarvo bhūtānāmagatiṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:7824: avekṣya ca śanairbuddhyā labhate ca śamaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,44.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:7825: trivargo yasya viditaḥ prekṣya yaśca vimuñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:7829: etad buddhā bhaved buddhaḥ kimanyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7830: vijñāya taddhi manyante katakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7831: na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ yadaviduṣāṃ sumahadbhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:7832: nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇepravadatyatulyatām // NarP_1,44.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7834: nāpriyaṃ tadubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ tasya tajjanayatīha kurvataḥ // NarP_1,44.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7836: tatra paśya kuśalānna śocate jāyate yadi bhayaṃ padaṃ sadā // NarP_1,44.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7842: yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīha maharṣayaḥ // NarP_1,44.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7843: yathā svanuṣṭitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7848: asaṃgānya vidhādīni manaḥ śāntikarāṇi ca // NarP_1,44.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7851: śabdaṃ na vindecchrotreṇa tvacā sparśaṃ na vedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7852: rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vindyājjihvayā na rasāṃstathā // NarP_1,44.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:7860: eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo bhayā samanuvarṇitaḥ // NarP_1,44.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7864: evamevāsya cittaṃ ca bhavati dhyānavartmani // NarP_1,44.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:7866: punarvāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat // NarP_1,44.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7874: sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanāḥ // NarP_1,44.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7875: kiñcit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syācchuṣkaṃ cūrṇamabhāvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:7880: pūrvaṃ dhyānapathe sthāpya nityayogena śāmyati // NarP_1,44.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7881: na tatpuruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kenacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7884: gacchanti yogino hyovaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tu nirāmayam // NarP_1,44.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7888: eṣa te prasavo vidvan jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7889: nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // NarP_1,44.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7897: na ca me jāyate tṛptirbhūyobhūyo 'pi śṛṇvataḥ // NarP_1,45.2 //
