GP12nardp1_u:7899: tathā kathaya sarvajña mokṣadharmaṃ sadāśritam // NarP_1,45.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7905: tasya śmaśāna mācāryā vasati satataṃ gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:7907: sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretya jātau viniścaye /
GP12nardp1_u:7916: sa manye tena rūpeṇa vikhyāpayati hi svayam // NarP_1,45.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7925: tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7927: tasyaḥ putratvamāgatya sriyāḥ sa pibagati stanau /
GP12nardp1_u:7928: tataśca kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭikīm // NarP_1,45.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7931: sāmātyo janako jñātvā dharmajño jñāninaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7939: yadarthaṃ dharmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalo dayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7944: ātmānaṃ manyate mohāttadasamyak paraṃ matam // NarP_1,45.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7950: pratyakṣo hyāgamo bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiñcana // NarP_1,45.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7952: anyojīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate sthitaḥ // NarP_1,45.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7958: amūtasya hi mūrtena sāmānyaṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,45.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7959: avidyā karma tṛṣṇā ca kecidāhuḥ punarbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:7960: tasminnaṣṭe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi // NarP_1,45.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7964: evaṃ sati ca kā prīhirjñānavidyātapobalaiḥ // NarP_1,45.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7968: yathā hi muśalairhanyuḥ śarīraṃ tatpunarbhavet // NarP_1,45.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7974: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsamasthi ca // NarP_1,45.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7978: iti samyaṅ manasyete bahavaḥ saṃti hetavaḥ // NarP_1,45.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7984: arthāstathā hṝnti sukhāvahāṃśca lihata ete bahavopaśuṣkāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7985: mahattaraṃ duḥkhamabhiprapannā hitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti // NarP_1,45.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7987: vihāya yo gacchati sarvameva kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca // NarP_1,45.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7989: itīdamālakṣya ratiḥ kuto bhavedvināśināpyasya na śama vidyate // NarP_1,45.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7993: bhagavanyadi na pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasyacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7994: evaṃ sati kimajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:7996: apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7997: asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:7998: kasmai kriyata kalpeta niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ // NarP_1,45.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8006: dhātavaḥ pañcadhā toyaṃ khe vāyurjyotiṣo dharā // NarP_1,45.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8008: ākāśaṃ vāyurūṣmā ca sneho yaścāpi pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,45.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8010: jñānamūṣmā ca vāyuśca trividhaḥ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,45.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8013: śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭirnāsā tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8017: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca mūrtyarthameva te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8020: tamāhuḥ paramaṃ śuddhiṃ buddhirityavyayaṃ mahat // NarP_1,45.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8023: anātmeti ca yadṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mametyapi /
GP12nardp1_u:8028: nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho tamaḥ // NarP_1,45.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8029: dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8030: sukhatyāgā tapo yogaṃ sarvatyāge samāpanā // NarP_1,45.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:8032: viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatirhi tathā bhavet // NarP_1,45.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8034: basaṣaṣṭāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmedriyāṇi tu // NarP_1,45.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8039: karṇo śabdaśca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:8040: tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ // NarP_1,45.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8044: trividhā vedānā yeṣu prasṛtā sarvasādhinī // NarP_1,45.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8051: imāṃ ca yo veda vimokṣabuddhimātmānamanvicchati cāpramattaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8052: na lipyate karmapalairaniṣṭaiḥ patraṃ viṣasyeva jalena siktam // NarP_1,45.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8054: yadā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye jahāti muktastadāgryāṃ gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8056: kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe tanornimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe // NarP_1,45.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8059: tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ vidhaavaṃsate loṣṭamivādimṛcchan /
GP12nardp1_u:8060: yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgamatho purāṇaṃ hitvā tvacaṃ vāpyurago yathā ca // NarP_1,45.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8062: matsyaṃ yathā vāpyudake patantamutsṛjya pakṣī nipatatsaśaktaḥ // NarP_1,45.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8063: tathā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye vihāya muktaḥ parārddhyā gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8065: nikhilamabhisamīkṣya niścitārthaḥ paramasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥ // NarP_1,45.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8066: api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ nagaramupāhitamagninābhivīkṣya /
GP12nardp1_u:8067: na khalu mama hi dahyate 'tra kiñcitsvayamidamāha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ // NarP_1,45.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:8068: imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ mahāmune satatamavekṣate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8069: upadravānanubhaghavate hyaduḥ khitaḥ pramucyate kapilamivaitya maithilaḥ // NarP_1,45.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8070: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8074: punaḥ papraccha taṃ prītyā sanandanamudāradhīḥ // NarP_1,46.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8077: prabrūhi tanmune mahyaṃ prapannāya dayānidhe // NarP_1,46.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8084: tatprāptihetujñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // NarP_1,46.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8089: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8091: dve vidye veditavye cetyāha cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8096: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ taṃ vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:8098: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,46.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8108: tenāgamapitā sraṣṭā gakāro 'yaṃ tathā mune // NarP_1,46.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8118: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // NarP_1,46.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8123: khāṇḍikyaṃ janakaṃ prāha pṛṣṭaḥ keśidhvajaḥ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:8125: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8126: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,46.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8127: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikāraṃ guṇādidoṣāṃśca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8132: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ saṃti parāvareśe // NarP_1,46.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:8135: sa jñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalameva rūpam /
GP12nardp1_u:8142: na māṃsacakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥ sa śakyate // NarP_1,46.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8148: janakāya purā yogaṃ tathāhaṃ kathayāmi te // NarP_1,46.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8162: ekadā vartamānasya yāge yogavidāṃ vara // NarP_1,46.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8163: tasya dhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane /
GP12nardp1_u:8164: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ // NarP_1,46.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8168: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājendra veda sa vetsyati // NarP_1,46.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8169: sa gatvā tamapṛcchañca so 'pyāha nṛpatiṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8170: na kaśerurnacaivāhaṃ na cānyaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhuvi // NarP_1,46.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8171: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8172: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmaripuṃ mune // NarP_1,46.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8173: prāpta eva mayā yajñe yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8174: prāyaścittaṃ sa cetpṛṣṭo vadiṣyati ripurmama // NarP_1,46.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8177: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste khāṇḍikyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8183: mṛgānāṃ vada pṛṣṭeṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim // NarP_1,46.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8184: yeṣāṃ matvā vṛthā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8185: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase // NarP_1,46.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8189: na tvāṃ hṝntuṃ vicāryataitkopaṃ bāṇaṃ ca muñca vā /
GP12nardp1_u:8190: tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārddhamekānte sapurohitaḥ // NarP_1,46.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8193: hate 'tra pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8194: khāṇḍikyaścāha tānsarvāneva meva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,46.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8195: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8201: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvayā sarvaṃ tatpṛccha tvaṃ vadāmyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8202: tataḥ prāha yathāvṛttaṃ homadhenuvadhaṃ mune // NarP_1,46.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:8203: tataśca taṃ sa papraccha prāyaścittaṃ hi tadrūtam /
GP12nardp1_u:8204: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ mune keśidhvajāya tat // NarP_1,46.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:8210: pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā // NarP_1,46.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8212: yathāhaṃ martyalokasya mayā sarvaṃ vicaṣṭitam // NarP_1,46.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8213: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathā na mama kiṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8214: itthaṃ tu cintayanneva saṃmāra sa mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8216: sa jagāma tato bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,46.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8220: ahaṃ tu nāpakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ // NarP_1,46.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8222: niṣpādito mayā yāgaḥ samyak tvadupadeśataḥ // NarP_1,46.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8224: ityukto mantrayāmāsa sa bhūyo mantribhiḥ saha // NarP_1,46.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8228: prāhasya tānāha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyo mahāpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8231: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8232: ityuktvā samupetyaiṃnaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam // NarP_1,46.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8236: yadi ceddīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8239: na prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmānmama rājyamakaṇṭakam // NarP_1,46.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8242: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ // NarP_1,46.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8246: yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāstyapakṛte tvayā // NarP_1,46.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8250: na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitatsatāṃ matam // NarP_1,46.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8255: ahaṃ ca vidyayā mṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai // NarP_1,46.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8257: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiścaryatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,46.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8265: kalevaropabhogyaṃ hi gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ ca yat // NarP_1,46.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:8267: itthaṃ ca putrapautreṣu taddehotpāditeṣu ca // NarP_1,46.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8271: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃ bhasā // NarP_1,46.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8274: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso garvo 'tra kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8279: mohaśrame śamaṃ yāte svacchāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān // NarP_1,46.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:8283: jalasya nāgninā saṃgaḥ sthālīsaṃgāttathāpi hi // NarP_1,46.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:8288: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,46.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:8289: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8295: tad brūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga yogaṃ yogaviduttama /
GP12nardp1_u:8299: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,47.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8307: tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // NarP_1,47.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8309: yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuramidhīyate // NarP_1,47.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8317: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yigitāṃ svamano nayan // NarP_1,47.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8319: kurvvīta brahmaṇi tathā parisminpravaṇaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,47.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8325: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sabījo 'bīja eva ca // NarP_1,47.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8332: vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate niścalā tmanām /
GP12nardp1_u:8337: kathyatāṃ me mahābhāga cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8341: rūpaṃ mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // NarP_1,47.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:8343: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // NarP_1,47.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:8356: na tadyogayujā śakyaṃ nṛpa cintayituṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8357: tataḥ sthūlaṃ hare rūpaṃ cintyaṃ yañcakṣugocaram // NarP_1,47.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8359: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskārāstārakā grahāḥ // NarP_1,47.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:8361: manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ śailāsamudrāḥ sarito drumāḥ // NarP_1,47.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8362: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8370: yeyaṃ kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karmajā /
GP12nardp1_u:8371: asārabhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate // NarP_1,47.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8373: tayā tirohitatvāttu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā // NarP_1,47.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8385: amṛrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yatsadityucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,47.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8392: tadrūpaṃ viśvarūpāya cintyaṃ yoga yujā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:8397: kurvīta saṃsthitaṃ sādhu vijñeyā śuddhalakṣaṇā // NarP_1,47.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8400: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpā8yāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8403: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yañcitaṃ tatra dhāryate // NarP_1,47.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8404: tatra mūrttaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛk cintyaṃ narādhipa /
GP12nardp1_u:8417: tāvadyāvad dṛḍhībhūtā tatraiva nṛpa dhāraṇā // NarP_1,47.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8419: nāpayāti yadā cittātsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // NarP_1,47.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8430: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye paraṃ brahmaṇi pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8433: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyo nivartate // NarP_1,47.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8437: ātmano brahmaṇābhedaṃ saṃmataṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // NarP_1,47.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:8446: paramārthastva saṃlāpyo vacasāṃ gocaro na yaḥ // NarP_1,47.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8451: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,47.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8460: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān /
GP12nardp1_u:8466: tathāpi me mano bhrāntaṃ na sthitiṃ labhateṃ'jasā // NarP_1,48.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8474: yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam // NarP_1,48.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8476: ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate // NarP_1,48.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8484: tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune // NarP_1,48.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:8486: nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale 'bhali nārada // NarP_1,48.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:8492: sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,48.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8494: athājagāma tattīraṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā // NarP_1,48.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:8496: tataḥ samabhavattatra pītaprāye jale tayā // NarP_1,48.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8503: munīndra sā tu hariṇī nipapāta mamāra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8504: hariṇīṃ tāṃ vilokyātha vipannāṃ nṛpatāpasaḥ // NarP_1,48.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8506: cakārānudinaṃ cāsau mṛgapotasya vai nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,48.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:8507: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaśca sa tena vavṛdhe mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8513: āsīñcetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na tathā hyacyute mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8516: kiṃ vṛkaibhakṣito vyāghnaiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ // NarP_1,48.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8520: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,48.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:8523: mṛgo babhūva sa mune tādṛśīṃ bhāvanāṃ gataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8528: tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho 'sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ // NarP_1,48.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8534: na papāṭha guruproktaṃ kṛtopanayanaḥ śrutam // NarP_1,48.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8535: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8540: saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ // NarP_1,48.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:8542: tasmāñcareta vai yogī satāṃ dharmamadūṣayan // NarP_1,48.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8546: bhuṅkte kulmāṣavaṭakān śākaṃ tranyaphalaṃ kaṇān // NarP_1,48.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8554: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija // NarP_1,48.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8556: śreyaḥ kimatra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇāmiti // NarP_1,48.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8564: vilokya nṛpatiḥ so 'tha viṣamaṃ śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8566: punastathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan // NarP_1,48.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8572: kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvā nāsi nirīkṣyase // NarP_1,48.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8574: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8575: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāso voḍhānyo 'sti mahīpate // NarP_1,48.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8578: śramaśca bhāro dvahane bhavatyeva hi dehinām // NarP_1,48.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8580: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yaddṛṣṭaṃ mama tadvada /
GP12nardp1_u:8582: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayyadyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8583: mithyā tadapyatra bhavān śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // NarP_1,48.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8584: bhūmau pādayugaṃ cātha jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:8590: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāśca pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8594: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛte paraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8597: tadāpi bāliśo 'si tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // NarP_1,48.63/
GP12nardp1_u:8599: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samastvayā // NarP_1,48.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8603: soḍhavyaḥ sumahānbhāraḥ katamo nṛpa te mayā // NarP_1,48.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8608: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // NarP_1,48.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8610: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8611: kathyatāṃ ko bhavānatra jālmarupadharaḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,48.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8613: tatsarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvanmahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // NarP_1,48.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8619: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8625: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tanmameccā pravartate // NarP_1,48.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8626: yo 'sti yo 'hamiti brahmankathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8627: ātmanyeva na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvijā // NarP_1,48.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8640: tadadā hi ko bhavānko 'hamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ // NarP_1,48.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8641: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥ sarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8642: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate // NarP_1,48.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8644: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā vai tasyā dārusaṃjñāthavā nṛpa // NarP_1,48.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8645: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8646: na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8650: kva jātaṃ chatramityeṣa nyāyastvayi tathā mayi // NarP_1,48.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8653: pumānna devo na naro na paśurna ca pādapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8656: tathānyaśca nṛpetthaṃ tanna satyaṃ kalpanāmayam // NarP_1,48.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8658: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tadvastu nṛpa tañca kim // NarP_1,48.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8659: tvaṃ rājā sarvasokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8660: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvaṃ bhūpa vadāmyaham // NarP_1,48.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8661: tvaṃ kimetacciraḥ kiṃ tu śirastava tatho daram /
GP12nardp1_u:8662: kimu pādādikaṃ tvetannaiva kiṃ te mahīpate // NarP_1,48.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:8664: ko 'hamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // NarP_1,48.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:8666: pṛthakūcaraṇaniṣpādyaṃ śakyaṃ tu nṛpate katham // NarP_1,48.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:8674: śrute tasminbhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // NarP_1,49.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8676: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tatparaṃ prakṛtermahat // NarP_1,49.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8677: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā mayi na sthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8680: pravartante guṇāścaite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // NarP_1,49.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8684: praṣṭumabhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kintvatra saṃśaye // NarP_1,49.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8686: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // NarP_1,49.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8694: bhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthena pṛcchasi /
GP12nardp1_u:8697: putrānicchati rājyaṃ ca śreyastasyaiva tannṛpa // NarP_1,49.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8701: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktaistathā paraiḥ // NarP_1,49.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8702: śreya stasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8704: saṃtyatra paramārthāstu na tvete śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GP12nardp1_u:8705: dharmo 'yaṃ tyajate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi // NarP_1,49.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:8708: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi naḥ pitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8709: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagatyatra carācare // NarP_1,49.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8712: paramārthā bhavantyatra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8715: yattu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā // NarP_1,49.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8718: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī /
GP12nardp1_u:8721: tadevāpaladaṃ karma paramārtho mato mama // NarP_1,49.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8729: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇa prakṛteḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,49.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8739: śṛṇvatra bhūpa prāgvṛttaṃ yadgītamṛbhuṇā bhavet // NarP_1,49.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8747: devikāyāstaṭe vīra nāgaraṃ nāma vai puram // NarP_1,49.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8751: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tatpuram // NarP_1,49.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8758: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yadatra bhavato gṛhe // NarP_1,49.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8759: tatkathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8764: kadannāni dijaitāni miṣṭamannaṃ prayaccha me // NarP_1,49.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8767: gṛhe śālini madgehe yatkiñcidati śobhanam // NarP_1,49.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8769: ityuktā tena sā patnī miṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya tat // NarP_1,49.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:8774: api te paramā tṛptirutpannā puṣṭireva // NarP_1,49.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8775: api te mānasaṃ svasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8776: kva nivāsī bhavānvipra kva vā gantuṃ samudyataḥ // NarP_1,49.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8780: na me kṣudhā bhavettṝptiḥ kasmānmāṃ dvija pṛcchati /
GP12nardp1_u:8781: vahninā pārthivenādau dagdhe vai kṣurāpīśvaḥ // NarP_1,49.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8783: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija // NarP_1,49.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8787: kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvayā // NarP_1,49.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8791: so 'haṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ // NarP_1,49.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8792: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ tvaṃ nānye naivāhamapyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8793: miṣṭanne miṣṭamityeṣā jihvā sā me kṛtā tava // NarP_1,49.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:8798: mṛṇmayaṃ hi mṛdā yadvadgṛhaṃ liptaṃ sthirībhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8799: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // NarP_1,49.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8801: guḍaḥ phalānīti tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // NarP_1,49.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8803: tanmanaḥ śamanālabi kāryaṃ prāpyaṃ hi muktaye // NarP_1,49.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8807: naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvija // NarP_1,49.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8811: eka evamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:8815: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyānicchitaḥ prayayau vibhuḥ // NarP_1,49.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8818: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dṛṣṭavān munim /
GP12nardp1_u:8823: uvāca kasmādekāntaṃ sthīyata bhavatā dvija // NarP_1,49.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8826: pravivakṣau pure ramye tenātra sthīyate mayā // NarP_1,49.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:8829: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama // NarP_1,49.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8834: etau hi gajarājānau dṛṣṭau hi yugapanmayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8837: jñātumicchāmyahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // NarP_1,49.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8840: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // NarP_1,49.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8843: adhaḥ sattvavibhāgaṃ kiṃ kiṃ corddhamabhidhīyate // NarP_1,49.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8845: ityuktvā sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha taṃ ṛbhum /
GP12nardp1_u:8846: śrayatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // NarP_1,49.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8848: avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // NarP_1,49.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:8851: tadevaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva katamastvamahaṃ tathā // NarP_1,49.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8856: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum // NarP_1,49.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8863: evamuktvā dadau vidyāṃ nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurguruḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8871: ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12nardp1_u:8872: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvametadātmāṃsvayaṃ bhātyapabhedamohaḥ // NarP_1,49.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8878: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahmaṃstathā te gaditaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8884: asaṃtuṣṭa iva prāha bhrātaraṃ taṃ sanandanam // NarP_1,50.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8887: tathāpi nātmā prīyeta śṛṇvanharikathāṃ muhuḥ // NarP_1,50.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8889: siddhiṃ sumahatīṃ prāpto nirviṇṇo 'vāntaraṃ bahiḥ // NarP_1,50.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8891: na jāyate kathaṃ prāpto jñānaṃ vyāsātmajaḥ śiśuḥ // NarP_1,50.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8896: yāṃ śrutvā brahmatattvajño jāyate mānavo mune // NarP_1,50.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:8897: na hāyanairna palitairna vittena na bandhubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8898: ṛṣayaścakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān // NarP_1,50.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8901: tanme karma samācakṣva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // NarP_1,50.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8905: śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8912: aṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi vedānāṃ cāpi vistarāt /
GP12nardp1_u:8918: vedānāṃ vedavidbhistu tacchṛṇuṣva vadāmi te // NarP_1,50.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8919: ārcikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikaṃ ca svarāntaram /
GP12nardp1_u:8925: mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā mithyāprayukto na tamarthamāha /
GP12nardp1_u:8926: sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hirnāsti yathendraśatruḥ svarato 'parādhāt // NarP_1,50.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8927: uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraścaiva sthānāni trīṇi vāṅkye /
GP12nardp1_u:8930: na ca śakto 'si vyaktastu tathā prāvacanā vidhiḥ // NarP_1,50.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8932: ṛgvede sāmavede ca vaktavyaḥ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8938: mandraḥ kruṣṭo munīśvara etānkurvanti sāmagāḥ // NarP_1,50.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8941: ete viśeṣataḥ proktāḥ svarā vai sārvavaidikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8943: sāmavede tu vakṣyāmi svarāṇāṃ caritaṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8946: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ yathā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,50.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8954: svargābhrāñcaiva gāndhāro grāmasthānāni trīṇi hi // NarP_1,50.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8955: svarāṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa grāmarāgā iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8958: nadī viśālā sumukhī citrā citravatī mukhā // NarP_1,50.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8959: balā cāpyatha vijñeyā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8960: āpyāyinī viśvabhṛtā candrā hemā kapardinī // NarP_1,50.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:8961: maitrī ca bārhatī caiva pitṝṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8963: aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre tṛtīyā mūrcchanā smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:8964: madhyame khalu sauvīrā hṛṣikā pañcame svare // NarP_1,50.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8965: dhaivate cāpi vijñeyā mūrchanā tūttarā matā /
GP12nardp1_u:8966: niṣāde rajanīṃ vidyādṛṣīṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ // NarP_1,50.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8968: pitṝṇāṃ mūrcchānāḥ sapta tathā yakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8969: ṛṣīṇāṃ mūrchanāḥ sapta yāstvimā laukikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8970: ṣaṅjaḥ prīṇāti vai devānṛṣīnprīṇāti carṣabhaḥ // NarP_1,50.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8974: gānasya tu daśavidhā guṇavṛttistu tadyathā // NarP_1,50.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8975_0: raktaṃ pūrṇamalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ vyaktaṃ vikruṣṭaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ sukumāraṃ madhuramiti
GP12nardp1_u:8975_1: guṇāstatra raktaṃ nāma veṇuvīṇāsvarāṇāmekībhāvaṃ raktamityucyate pūrṇaṃ nāma svaraśrutipūraṇācchandaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8975_2: pādākṣaraṃ saṃyogātpūrṇamityucyate alaṅkṛtaṃ nāmorasi śirasi kaṇṭhayuktamityalaṅkṛtaṃ
GP12nardp1_u:8975_6: ślakṣṇamityucyate samaṃ nāmāvāpanirvāpapradeśe pratyantarasthānānāṃ samāsaḥ samamityucyate
GP12nardp1_u:8975_7: sukumāraṃ nāma mṛdupadavarṇasvarakuhagaraṇayuktaṃ sukumāramityucyate madhuraṃ nāma
GP12nardp1_u:8987: pacamo madhyamaḥ ṣaṅja ityete brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8992: nipatati madhyamarāge sa niṣādaṃ ṣāṅjavaṃ vidyāt // NarP_1,50.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8998: dhaivataḥ kaṃpito yatra sa ṣaṅgayāma īritaḥ // NarP_1,50.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:9000: taṃ tu sādhāritaṃ vidyātpañcamasthaṃ tu kaiśikam // NarP_1,50.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:9001: kaiśikaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svaraiḥ sarvaiḥ samantataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9005: geti geyaṃ viduḥ prājñā dheti kārupravādanam /
GP12nardp1_u:9006: veti vādyasya saṃjñeyaṃ gandharvasya prarocanam // NarP_1,50.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:9007: yaḥ sāmagānāṃ prathamaḥ sa veṇormadhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9008: yo dvitīyaḥ sa gāndhārastṛtīyastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:9009: caturthaḥ ṣaṅja ityāhuḥ pañcamo dhaivato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9010: ṣaṣṭho niṣādo vijñeyaḥ saptamaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:9011: ṣaṅjaṃ mayūro vadati gāvo raṃbhanti carṣabham /
GP12nardp1_u:9012: ajāvike tu gāndhāraṃ kraiñco vadati madhyamam // NarP_1,50.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:9014: aśvastu dhaivataṃ vakti niṣaādaṃ vakti kuñjaraḥ // NarP_1,50.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:9020: ṣaṅbhiḥ saṃ jāyate yasmāttasmātṣaṅja iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:9024: vāti gandhavahaḥ puṇyo gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:9029: dhaivataṃ ca niṣādaṃ ca varjayitvā tu tāvubhau /
GP12nardp1_u:9033: somena gīto gāndhāro viṣṇunā madhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9036: ādyaṃsya daivataṃ brahmā ṣaṅjasyāpyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,50.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:9038: gāvaḥ praṇīte tuṣyanti gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:9046: dāravī gātravīṇā ca dve vīṇe gānajātiṣu // NarP_1,50.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:9047: sāmanī gātravīṇā tu tasyāstvaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9048: gātravīṇā tu sā proktā yasyāṃ gāyanti sāmaṅgāḥ // NarP_1,50.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:9050: hastau tu saṃyatau dhāryauṃ jānubhyāmuparisthitau // NarP_1,50.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:9056: viralā nāṅgulīḥ kuryānmūle caitāṃ na saṃspṛśet // NarP_1,50.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:9057: aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tā nityaṃ madhyame parvaṇi spṛśet /
GP12nardp1_u:9060: trirekhā yasya dṛśyate siddhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // NarP_1,50.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:9062: parvāntaraṃ sāmasu ca ṛkṣu kuryāttilāntaram // NarP_1,50.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:9068: kūrmo 'gāni ca saṃhṛtya cetodṛṣṭiṃ diśanmanaḥ // NarP_1,50.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:9072: samyakpracārayedvākyaṃ hastena ca mukhena ca // NarP_1,50.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:9075: samaṃ sāmāni gāyeta vyomni svena gātiryathā /
GP12nardp1_u:9076: yathā sucaratāṃ mārgo mīnānāṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,50.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:9078: yathā dadhini sarpiḥ syātkāṣṭastho vā yathānalaḥ // NarP_1,50.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:9084: svaraḥ sthānāccyuto yastu svaṃ sthānamativartate // NarP_1,50.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:9086: abhyāsārthe drutāṃ vṛttiṃ prayogārthe tu madhyamām // NarP_1,50.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:9090: kruṣṭasya mūrddhani sthānaṃ lalāṭe prathamasya tu // NarP_1,50.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:9094: aṅguṣṭasyottame vruṣṭo hyaṅguṣṭaṃ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:9096: anāmikāyāṃ ṣaṅgastu kaniṣṭāyāṃ tu dhaivataḥ // NarP_1,50.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:9099: mandro hi mandībhūtastu parisvāra iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9100: kruṣṭena devā jīvanti prathamena tu mānuṣāḥ // NarP_1,50.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:9105: sarvāṇi khalu bhūtāni dhāryante sāmikaiḥ svaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9107: śrutīnāṃ yo viśeṣajño na sa ācārya ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9108: dīptā mandre dvitīya ca pracaturthe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:9109: atisvare tṛtīye ca kruṣṭe tu karuṇā śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9110: śrutayo yā dvitīyasya mṛdumadhyāyatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,50.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:9111: tāsāmapi tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:9112: āyatātvaṃ bhavennīce mṛdutā tu viparyaye // NarP_1,50.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:9113: sve svare madhyamātvaṃ tu tatsamīkṣya prayojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9114: dvitīye viratā yā tu kruṣṭaśca parato bhavet // NarP_1,50.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:9115: dīptāṃ tāṃ tu vijānīyātprāthamyena mṛduḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9116: atraiva viratā yā tu caturthena pravartate // NarP_1,50.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:9119: taṃ ca hrasve ca dīrghe ca na cāpi ghuṭisajñake /
GP12nardp1_u:9124: dīptāmudātte jānīyāddīptāṃ ca svarite viduḥ // NarP_1,50.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:9128: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ācikasya svaratrayam // NarP_1,50.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:9130: ya evodātta ityuktaḥ sa eva svaritātparaḥ // NarP_1,50.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:9134: sa tu saptavidho jñeyaḥ svaraḥ pratyayadarśanāt // NarP_1,50.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:9135: padena tu sa vijñeyo bhavedyo yatra yādṛśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9146: jātyaḥ kṣaipro 'bhinihita stairavyañjana eva ca // NarP_1,50.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:9150: sapakāraṃ savaṃ vāpi hyakṣaraṃ svaritaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:9151: na codāttaṃ puro yasya jātyaḥ svāraḥ sa ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9162: svare cetsvaritaṃ yatra vivṛtā yatra saṃhitā // NarP_1,50.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:9164: tānyaḥ svāraḥ sa jātyena śrutyagre kṣaipra ucyate // NarP_1,50.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:9172: ikārānte pade pūrva ukāre parataḥ sthite // NarP_1,50.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:9174: ikārānte pade caivokāradvayaṃ pare pade // NarP_1,50.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:9176: trayo dīrghāstu vijñeyā ye ca saṃdhyakṣareṣu vai // NarP_1,50.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:9177: manyā yathā na indrābhyāṃ śeṣā hrasvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9182: na rephe vā hakāre vā dvirbhāvo jāyate kvacit // NarP_1,50.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:9183: na ca vargadvitīyeṣu na caturthe kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:9184: caturthaṃ tu tṛtīyena dvitīyaḥ prathamena tu // NarP_1,50.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:9185: ādyamantyaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca svārākṣareṇa pīḍayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9186: anantyaśca bhavetpūrvo hyantaśca parato yadi // NarP_1,50.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:9194: saṃyogo yatra dṛśyeta rvyañjanaṃ virate pade // NarP_1,50.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:9196: saṃyoge svaritaṃ yatra udvātaḥ pratanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,50.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:9200: anusvāraḥ padāntaśca kramajaṃ pratyaye svake // NarP_1,50.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:9203: yaśabda iti vijñeyo yo 'nyaḥsaya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9209: yannīcaṃ nīcameva tadyatpracayasthaṃ tadapi nīcam // NarP_1,50.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:9211: priyaṃ dūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ cittamatiśabdastu nīcataḥ // NarP_1,50.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:9216: dvau varuṇau vasvarata uduttamantvaṃ varuṇadhāra caurudhārāmurudhāresvadohate /
GP12nardp1_u:9217: mātrikaṃ vā dvimātraṃ vā svaryate yadihākṣaram /
GP12nardp1_u:9218: tasyāditor'ddhamātraṃ vai śeṣaṃ tu parato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9229: vivṛtayaścatasro vai vijñeyā iti me matam // NarP_1,50.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:9230: akṣarāṇāṃ niyogena tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:9233: catasṛṇāṃ vivṛtīnā mantaraṃ mātrikaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.170 //
GP12nardp1_u:9237: nakārānte padā pūrve svare ca parataḥ sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:9240: arddhamātrā tu pūrvasya rajyate tvaṇumātrayā // NarP_1,50.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:9242: repho raṅgaśca lopaśca sānusvaro 'pi vā kvacit // NarP_1,50.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:9244: mṛduścaiva dvimātraśca dadhanvāṃ iti nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:9246: evaṃ raṅgaḥ prayoktavyo nāradaitanmataṃ mama // NarP_1,50.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:9248: caturṇāṃ padajātīnāṃ padāntā daśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,50.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:9249: svara uccaḥ svaro nīcaḥ svaraḥ svarita eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9250: vyañjanā na tu vartante yatra tiṣṭati sa svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:9252: maṇivadvyañjanaṃ vidyātsūtra vañca svaraṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:9259: saṃdhyakṣare pare saṃdhau prāptasuptau yavau yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:9261: ūṣmāntaṃ virate yatra saṃbhāvo bhavati kvacit /
GP12nardp1_u:9262: vivṛttiryā bhavettatra svarākhyāṃ tāṃ vinirddiśet // NarP_1,50.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:9269: chandomānaṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca pādasthānaṃ trikāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9273: ṛvarṇe tu pṛthagrephaḥ pratyayastu vṛthā bhaveta /
GP12nardp1_u:9275: ūṣmaṇaiva hi saṃyukta ṛkāro yatra pīḍyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9276: guruvarṇaḥ sa vijñeyastṛcaṃ cātra nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:9277: ṛṣabhaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ ca bṛhaspatiṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9278: nirṛtipañcamā hyatra ṛkārā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:9284: śaṣaseṣu vivṛtāṃ tu hakāre saṃvṛtāṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:9286: ikāraṃ cāpyukāraṃ grastadoṣaṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:9288: atha sāntika ca naṅmasānusvāraṃ ghuṭataṃ ca // NarP_1,50.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:9291: yasyā lakṣaṇamuktaṃ yā tvanyā sā smṛtā vipulā // NarP_1,50.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:9294: vivṛttir yatra dṛśyate svārasyaivāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,50.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:9298: madhyodāttaṃ svaritaṃ dvirudāttamityetā aṣṭau padasaṃjñāḥ // NarP_1,50.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:9299: agniḥ somaḥ pravo vīryaṃ haviṣā svarvanaspatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9300: antarmadhyamayotāmyudamanunipātya ādyātsvaritamupasarge dvirnnīcamākhyāta iti svaritātparāṇi yāni syurddhārāpakṣarāṇi tu /
GP12nardp1_u:9302: pracayo yatra dṛśyeta tatra hanyātsvaraṃ budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9303: svaritaḥ kevalo yatra mṛdustatra nipātayet // NarP_1,50.205 //
GP12nardp1_u:9304: pañcavidhamācāryakaṃ nāma sukhaṃ nyāsaḥ karaṇaṃ pratijñoccāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:9305: atrocyate śreyaḥ khalu vaiśyāḥ pratijñātoccāraṇā yasya kasyacidvarṇasya karaṇaṃ nopalabhyate pratijñā tatra voḍhavyākaraṇaṃ hi tadātmakam // NarP_1,50.206 //
GP12nardp1_u:9307: sāmasu nibhṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ svarasaukṣmyānnaiva jānīyuḥ // NarP_1,50.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:9309: jīrṇo hāraḥ prabuddhaḥ khalūṣasinbrahma cintayet // NarP_1,50.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:9315: sarve kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ kṣīriṇaśca yaśasvinaḥ // NarP_1,50.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:9316: tenāsya karaṇe saukṣmyaṃ mādhuryaṃ copa jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9321: pītvā madhuṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva śucirbhūtvā tato vadet // NarP_1,50.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:9328: na tasya parimokṣo 'sti pāpāheriva kilbiṣāt // NarP_1,50.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:9330: susvareṇa svavakreṇa prayuktaṃ brahma rājati // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9331: na takālo na laṃboṣṭo na ca sarvānunāsikaḥ // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9334: sa tu varṇānprayuñjīta detoṣṭhaṃ yasya śobhanam // NarP_1,50.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:9335: pañcavidyāṃ na gṛhṇanti caṇḍā stabdhāśca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9336: alasāśca sarogāśca yeṣāṃ ca visṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,50.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:9338: śanairadhvasu varteta yojanānna paraṃ vrajet // NarP_1,50.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:9347: añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya tu saṃcayam /
GP12nardp1_u:9354: nahi vādyārthināṃ nidrā ciraṃ netreṣu tiṣṭati // NarP_1,50.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:9358: rākṣasībhya iva sribhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati // NarP_1,50.232 //
GP12nardp1_u:9359: na śaṭhāḥ prānpuvantyarthānna klibā na ca māninaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9360: na ca lokaravā dīnā na ca svasvapratīkṣakāḥ // NarP_1,50.233 //
GP12nardp1_u:9364: athavā vidyayā vidyā hyanyathā nopapadyate // NarP_1,50.235 //
GP12nardp1_u:9366: vandhyeva yauvanavatī na tasya sāphalyavati bhavati // NarP_1,50.236 //
GP12nardp1_u:9368: jñātvā vedāṅgamādyaṃ tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate // NarP_1,50.237 //
GP12nardp1_u:9369: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:9376: nakṣatrakalpe nirdiṣṭaṃ jñātavyaṃ tadihāpi ca // NarP_1,51.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:9377: vedakalpe vidhānaṃ tu ṛgādī nāṃ munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:9386: viśeṣaḥ pṛthageteṣāṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkhāntareṣu ca // NarP_1,51.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:9388: vakṣyāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu // NarP_1,51.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9391: kṛtvā proktāni karmāṇi tadvarddhvāni karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9397: rekhāḥ proktāśca yāstisraḥ kartavyāstāḥ samā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9398: nyūnādhikā na karttavyā ityeva paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:9401: vandhyā duṣṭā ca dīnāṅgī mṛtavatsā ca yā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9402: yajñārthaṃ gomayaṃ tasyā nāharediti bhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:9404: taṣāṃ praharaṇārthāya mataṃ proddharaṇaṃ dvija // NarP_1,51.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:9407: āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve tathā pitṛgaṇā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9410: śubhade mṛṇmaye pātre prokṣyādbhistaṃ nidhāyapayet // NarP_1,51.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:9414: tebhyaḥ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya brahmāṇaṃ taddiśi nyaset // NarP_1,51.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:9416: yajamānaḥ pūrvataḥ syurdvijāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,51.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:9417: dyūte ca vyavahāre ca yajñakarmaṇi cedbhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9420: ṛtvijāṃ niyamo nāsti yathālābhaṃ samarcayet // NarP_1,51.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:9421: dve paritre tryaṅgule staḥ prokṣiṇī caturaṅgulā /
GP12nardp1_u:9424: sruvaṃ ṣaḍaṅgula proktaṃ srucaṃ sārddhatrayāṅgulam // NarP_1,51.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:9427: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni samudrāḥ saritastathā /
GP12nardp1_u:9429: vedikā vasrahīnā ca nagrā saṃprocyate dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9430: paristīryya tato darbheḥ paridadhyādimāṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,51.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:9438: sruve ca sarvakarmāṇi śubhānyapyaśubhāni ca // NarP_1,51.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:9440: agre dhūtena vaidhavyaṃ madhyaṃ caiva prajākṣayaḥ // NarP_1,51.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9441: mūle ca mriyate hotā tasmāddhāryaṃ vicārya tat /
GP12nardp1_u:9442: agniḥ sūryaśca somaśca viriñciranilo yamaḥ // NarP_1,51.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9446: anilo vṛddhidaḥ prokto yamo mṛtyuprado mataḥ // NarP_1,51.38 //

GP12nardp1_u:9912: hiraṇyayena naraṃ ca parame vyomanityapi // NarP_1,53.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:9914: yajadhvainamemasi ca snātvī gatvā pacāsthabhauḥ // NarP_1,53.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:9918: dadhartyādyā svavadbhiśca sasūveti ca dhiṣva ca // NarP_1,53.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:9944: anudātteta akhyātā bhādyutāttā itaḥ syamāt // NarP_1,53.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:9946: sadasraya udāttetaḥ kucādvedā udātta it // NarP_1,53.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:9958: bhvādyā ete ṣaḍadhikaṃ sahasraṃ dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9960: svariteto dviṣādyāstu catvāro dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9964: parasmaipadinaḥ proktā ṣumukhāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,53.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9967: ṣṭuñekastu samā khyātaḥ smṛte nārada śābdikaiḥ // NarP_1,53.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9977: dādayo dhātavo vedāḥ parasmaipadino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9981: ghṛmukhā dvādaśa tathā parasmaipatino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:9985: oditaḥ pūṅmukhāḥ sapta ātmanedapino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:9989: mṛṣādyāḥ svaritetastu dhātavaḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:9991: rādhoḥ karmaka evātra vṛddhau svādicurādike // NarP_1,53.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:9995: catvāriśacchataṃ cāpi divādau dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10003: vraścādaya udāttetaḥ proktāḥ pañcādhikaṃ śatam // NarP_1,53.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:10007: pṛṅ mṛṅ cātmanebhāṣau ṣaṭ parasmaipade ripeḥ // NarP_1,53.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:10010: svaritetaḥ ṣaṭ tataśca proktā milamukhā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10018: tato dvau kīrtitau vipra dhātavo daśa śābdikaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10025: curādyā dhātavo ñyantā ṣaṭrtriṃśadadhikaḥ śatam // NarP_1,53.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10027: carcādyā ādhṛṣīyāstu pyantā vā parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10029: padādyāstu daśa proktā dhātavo hyātmanepade // NarP_1,53.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10030: sūtrādyā aṣṭa cāpyatra ñyantā proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10035: stomādyāḥ ṣoḍaśa tathā andatasyaṃ nidarśanam // NarP_1,53.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10040: saṃkṣepo 'yaṃ samuddiṣṭo vistarastatra tatra ca // NarP_1,53.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:10042: vṛṅvṛñbhyāṃ ca vinaikāco 'janteṣu nihatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,53.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:10054: cādyā nipātā gavayaḥ prādyā digdeśakālajāḥ // NarP_1,53.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10055: śabdāḥ proktā hyanekārthāḥ sarvaliṅgā api dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:10058: śabdāḥ siddhā vaidikāstu laukikāścāpi nārada // NarP_1,53.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10064: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇa pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde niruktalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10090: ekaṃ daśa śataṃ caiva sahasrāyutalakṣakam // NarP_1,54.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10092: niravarva ca mahāpadmaṃ śaṅkurjaladhireva ca // NarP_1,54.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:10093: atyaṃ madhyaṃ parārddhaṃ ca saṃjñā daśaguṇottarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10094: kramādutkramato vāpi yogaḥ kāryottaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,54.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10100: tatkṛtiṃ ca tyajedvipra mūlena vibhajetpunaḥ // NarP_1,54.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:10103: procyate viṣamaṃ tvādyaṃ same dve ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:10109: lavā lavaghnāśca harā haraghnā hi savarṇanam /
GP12nardp1_u:10117: chedaṃ cāpi lavaṃ vidvanparivartya harasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10118: śeṣaḥ kāryo bhāgahāre kartavyo guṇanāvidhiḥ // NarP_1,54.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:10119: hārāṃśayoḥ kṛtī varge ghanau ghanavidhau mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10120: padasiddhyai pade kuryādathoravaṃ sarvataśca ravam // NarP_1,54.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:10121: chedaṃ guṇaṃ guṇaṃ chedaṃ vargaṃ mūlaṃ padaṃ kṛtim /
GP12nardp1_u:10122: ṛṇaṃ svaṃ svamṛṇaṃ kuryādṛśye rāśiprasiddhaye // NarP_1,54.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10123: atha svāṃśādhikone tu lavāḍhyo no haro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10130: eko 'sya vargo dalitaḥ saiko rāśiḥ paro mataḥ // NarP_1,54.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10134: eṣīsyānāmubhe vyakte gaṇite vyaktameva ca // NarP_1,54.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10136: dṛṣṭasya ca guṇārddho na yutaṃ vargīkṛtaṃ guṇaḥ // NarP_1,54.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:10138: bhaktaṃ tathā mūlaguṇaṃ tābhyāṃ sādhyotha vyaktavat // NarP_1,54.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:10142: bahurāśivadhaṃ bhakte phalaṃ svalpavadhena ca // NarP_1,54.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10148: kṣepā miśrahatāḥ kṣepoyogabhaktāḥ phalāni ca // NarP_1,54.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:10151: vyastaṃ gacchataṃ phalaṃ yadguṇavargaṃ bhacahi tat /
GP12nardp1_u:10152: vyekaṃ vyekaguṇāptaṃ ca prādhnaṃ mānaṃ guṇottare // NarP_1,54.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:10156: rāśyorantaravargeṇa dvighne ghāte yute tayoḥ // NarP_1,54.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10165: vyāsadhnaṃ prabhajedvipra jyā kāśaṃ jāyate sphuṭā /
GP12nardp1_u:10192: tāvatyeva niśā tasya viprendra parikīrtitā // NarP_1,54.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10232: yojanāni śatānyaṣṭau bhūkarṇauṃ dviguṇāḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,54.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10242: iṣṭanāḍīguṇā bhuktiḥ ṣaṣṭyā bhaktā kalādikam // NarP_1,54.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10243: gate śoddhyaṃ tathā yojyaṃ gamye tātkāliko grahaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10254: grahaṃ saṃśodhya mandoñcattathā śīghnādviśodhya ca // NarP_1,54.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10266: jyāṃ prohya śeṣaṃ tattvatāśvi hṝntaṃ tadvivaroddhṛm // NarP_1,54.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:10280: śai'yakoṭiphalaṃ kendre makarādau dhanaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:10281: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam /
GP12nardp1_u:10284: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam // NarP_1,54.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10287: labdhasya cāpaṃ liptādi phalaṃ śaidhryamidaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:10288: etadādau kujādīnāṃ caturthe caiva karmaṇi // NarP_1,54.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:10290: śairdhyaṃ mādyaṃ punarmāndyaṃ śairghyaṃ catvāryanukramāt // NarP_1,54.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10291: ajā dikendre sarveṣāṃ māndye śairghye ca karmaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:10292: dhanaṃ grahāṇāṃ liptādi tulādāvṛṇameva tat // NarP_1,54.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:10296: karkādau taddhanaṃ tatra makarādāvṛṇaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:10317: tithayaḥ śuklapratipado dvighnāḥ saikā na gāhatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10318: śeṣaṃ bavo bālavaśca kaulavastaitilo garaḥ // NarP_1,54.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:10326: tanmadhye timinā rekhā kartavyā dakṣiṇottata // NarP_1,54.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:10336: prohya śaṅkukṛte mūlaṃ chāyā śekuviparyayāt // NarP_1,54.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:10342: laṃbākṣajye tayośchāye laṃbākṣau dakṣimau sadā // NarP_1,54.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:10348: digbhedopakramaḥ śeṣastasya jyā trijyayā hatā // NarP_1,54.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:10367: bhāgayuktaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca vyayanāṃśaṃ tanuḥ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:10369: bhānau kṣayadhane kṛtvā madhyalagnaṃ tadā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10374: arkaṃ vidhurvidhuṃ bhūbhā chādayatyathā channakam // NarP_1,54.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10399: dṛṣṭvā hyādau kheṭabiṃbaṃ dṛgauñcye laṃbamīkṣya ca // NarP_1,54.166 //
GP12nardp1_u:10401: aste sāvayavā jñeyā gataiṣyāstithayo budhaiḥ // NarP_1,54.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:10415: tayute maṇḍale krāntyau tulyatve vai dhṛtābhidhaḥ // NarP_1,54.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:10421: yadi syādadhikā bhānoḥ krānteḥ pāto gatastadā // NarP_1,54.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10422: nyūnā cetsyāttadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10423: yadānyatvaṃ vidhoḥ krāntiḥ kṣepāccedyadi śuddhyati // NarP_1,54.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:10442: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde jyotiṣavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10456: śeṣā dinākhyāstūbhayaṃ timiḥ krūraḥ saumyaḥ pumān // NarP_1,55.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:10466: nṛpādaḥ kīṭapaśavo balāḍhyāḥ kendragāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:10468: raktaḥ śvetaḥ śukanibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmrapāṇḍurau // NarP_1,55.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10469: citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pītapiṅgau babhruḥ svacchaḥ prabhākriyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10472: jīvo jñānaṃ sukhaṃ śukraḥ kāmo duḥkhaṃ dineśajaḥ // NarP_1,55.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10473: nṛpau ravīndū netāsṛk kumāro jñaḥ kavījyakau /
GP12nardp1_u:10474: sacivo sūryajaḥ preṣyo mato jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:10479: klibau budhārkī śukrendū sriyau śeṣā narāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10481: kavījyau kujasūryauṃ ca vedo jño varṇapāḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10485: vasraṃ sthalaṃ navaṃ vahnikahataṃ madyadaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10494: jīvo jīvajñau sitajñau vyarkā vyārāḥ kramādamī // NarP_1,55.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:10500: dikṣu saumyejyayoḥ sūryārayoḥ saure sitābjayoḥ // NarP_1,55.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10504: krūrāḥ kṛṣṇe site saumyāḥ mataṃ kālabalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:10506: pāpāstu balinaḥ saumyā vivakṣāḥ kaṇṭakopage // NarP_1,55.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:10508: svāṃśe pāpāḥ parāṃśasthāḥ saumyālagnaṃ viyonijam // NarP_1,55.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10511: pārśve kukṣī tvapānāṅghrī meḍhramuṣkau tathā sphijau /
GP12nardp1_u:10512: pucchaṃ catuṣpadāṅgeṣu meṣādyā rāśayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,55.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10519: sthalāṃbu ca patiḥ kheṭo lagnādyāvanmite gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10520: tāvanta eva takhaḥ sthalajā jalajāstathā // NarP_1,55.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10521: antaḥsārā ravau saure durbhagāḥ kṣīriṇo vidhau /
GP12nardp1_u:10522: bhaume kaṇṭakino vṛkṣā ījye jñe saphalāphalau // NarP_1,55.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:10524: aśubharkṣe śubhaḥ kheṭaḥ śubhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kubhūmijam // NarP_1,55.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:10528: pāpayuktekṣite dyūne ruṣā prītyā śubhagrahaiḥ // NarP_1,55.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:10532: vyayakhago yuktau caikadṛṣṭyā nṛtyupradau tayoḥ // NarP_1,55.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:10534: mātṛṣvasṛpitṛvyākhyau vā padmeji same śubhau // NarP_1,55.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10535: pāpadṛṣṭe śubhe kṣīṇe tuṅge vā lagnageyame /
GP12nardp1_u:10538: yadā tadā garbhayutā nārī mṛtyumavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,55.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:10546: gurvakārai viṣamasthau vā yuñjanma pravadettadā // NarP_1,55.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:10551: mitho ravīndūrjñārkī vā paśyataḥ samagaṃ raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10552: vakro vāṅgavidhū oje jajñau yugmaujasaṃsthitau // NarP_1,55.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10554: same sitendū ojasthā jñārāṅgojyā nṛvīkṣitau // NarP_1,55.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:10573: vyayejo vāmanayanaṃ dakṣaṃ sūryo vināśayet // NarP_1,55.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10574: neṣṭā yogāḥ śubhairdṛṣṭāḥ pāpāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10581: mandeṅgasthe kujeste ca jñosphuji madhyage vidhau // NarP_1,55.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10583: sūryastaddṛṣṭigo vāpi jñeyo jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10585: kośādatau tu yamalau jāyete munisattama // NarP_1,55.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10587: lagnaminduṃ ca sārkenduṃ na paśyati yadā guruḥ // NarP_1,55.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:10591: pūrṇa iṇḍhau svabheśejñe śubhe muvyaṃvuje tanau // NarP_1,55.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10592: dyūnasthe vā vidhau yāteṅganā nārī prasūyate /
GP12nardp1_u:10593: abdhāṅgamanbhagaḥ pūrṇe jyo vā paśyati nārada // NarP_1,55.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:10602: bhāsamāne sare mārge sthire svarkṣāṃśage gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10604: gurudṛṣṭe tu dīrghāyuḥ paraṃ ca prāpyate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10609: tarugehe śubhe nīce naikasthadṛṣṭau lagnenduḥ // NarP_1,55.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10611: mandarkṣāṃśe vidhau turye mandadṛṣṭe 'bjage 'pi vā // NarP_1,55.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:10613: śīrṣe pṛṣṭodaye janma tadvadeva vinirdiśet // NarP_1,55.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10615: jīrṇoddhṛtaṃ gṛhaṃ mande sṛji dagdhaṃ na vā vidhau // NarP_1,55.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:10617: citrayuktaṃ navaṃ śukre dṛḍhe ramye gurau gṛham // NarP_1,55.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:10619: vṛṣe paścānmṛge siṃhe dakṣiṇe vasatirbhavet // NarP_1,55.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10628: śiṃśnāpāte ca vṛṣaṇau jaghane jānunī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10631: svarkṣāṃśe sthirayukte tu naija āgantuko 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10637: caturasraḥ piṅgadṛk ca paittiko 'lpakaco raviḥ // NarP_1,55.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:10638: vṛto vātakaphī prājño mandavāk śubhadṛk śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:10649: na ceddṛṣṭastadā mṛtyurjātasya bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:10650: kṣīṇe 'bje vyayage pāpairlagnāṣṭasthaiḥ śubhā na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:10661: lagne ravau tu śasreṇa savīryāsadbhiraṣṭagaiḥ // NarP_1,55.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10662: karkendvījyayute lagne kendre saumye ca bhārgave /
GP12nardp1_u:10667: svaccobje svarkṣagaiḥ saumyaiḥ savīryeṅgādhipe tanau // NarP_1,55.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10679: kavījyayoge saumyābjau lagne mṛtyau ca sveṣavaḥ // NarP_1,55.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:10681: sūryādhika bale paiṇḍaṃ nisargāñca vidhorbale // NarP_1,55.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:10683: gobjāstattvatithī sūryāstithiḥ svargā nakhāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:10685: piṇḍe nisarge ravocce no grahaḥ ṣaṭbhālpako yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:10687: aṃśonāḥ śantrubhe kāryā grahaṃ vakragatiṃ vinā /
GP12nardp1_u:10696: śeṣe ṣaṣṭyā hate bhakte hāreṇa ghaṭikādikam // NarP_1,55.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:10698: bhajedvarṣāṇi śeṣe tu guṇite dvādaśādibhiḥ // NarP_1,55.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:10704: yadaikālyaṃ tadāstāṃśāḥ svāgryāptonā ca bhūrguṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:10708: śeṣaṃ dviśatabhaktaṃ syurmāsāḥ śeṣā dinādikam // NarP_1,55.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:10714: lagnārkacandramadhye tu yo balī taddaśā purā // NarP_1,55.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:10715: tataḥ kendrādigānāṃ tu dvitryādau sabalasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10722: turyāṣṭagasya tu svargā guṇakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,55.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:10730: jīvikādiphalaṃ sarvaṃ daśāyāṃ tasya yojayet // NarP_1,55.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:10734: yasyāṣṭavargajaṃ cāpi phalaṃ pūrṇaśubhaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,55.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:10738: neṣṭamutkaṭamiṣṭaṃ tu svalpaṃ jñātvā balaṃ vadet // NarP_1,55.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:10740: sthire neṣṭaṣṭamadhyā ca horāyāstryaṃ śakaiḥ phalam // NarP_1,55.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:10743: prāgdhvāṅkṣā bandhu mṛtyāya tayordyūne raviḥ svabhāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10750: kendrāṣṭāyāntya ijyādvā jñajyāyāstatra sve kaveḥ // NarP_1,55.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10760: sātryaṅke san raveḥ śukrāddhīkhago digbhavārigaḥ // NarP_1,55.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:10786: sitāsṛjo gurau karke sārāje lagnage nṛpāḥ // NarP_1,55.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:10794: dhīsthau gurvidukavayo bhūmau ratryage budhairnṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:10796: kavikṣau tulayuramasthau vai bhūpaḥ kīrtimānbhavent // NarP_1,55.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10800: siṃher'ke meṣalagne 'je mṛge bhaume ghaṭe 'ṣṭame // NarP_1,55.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:10802: pātālage dharmage 'bje śubhadṛṣṭe yute mune // NarP_1,55.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:10809: sukhe guruḥ kheravīndūyamo lagne bhave karai /
GP12nardp1_u:10828: bhālā kendrasthitaiḥ saumyaiḥ pāpaiḥsarpa udāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,55.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:10832: dātā samṛddho dāmāsthaḥ pāśajo dhanaśīlayuk // NarP_1,55.195 //
GP12nardp1_u:10838: taujaḥ sakīrtiḥ sukhabhāk mānavo bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:10839: tyāgī yajvātmavān yūthe hiṃsro guhyādhipaḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10840: śaktau nīco 'laso niḥsvo daṇḍe priyaviyogabhāk // NarP_1,55.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:10842: durudharā caiva vidhau jñeyaḥ kemudrumo 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:10850: samando dhātukuśalaṃ tathā bhāḍaṃvidaṃ mune // NarP_1,55.204 //
GP12nardp1_u:10856: saśukre dyūtakrarheyo nṛtī dyūti samandake // NarP_1,55.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:10858: sabhārgavesamande lubdhakaḥ krūro naro bhavati nārada // NarP_1,55.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:10860: kavau sa mandamandākṣā va vaniśrayavittavān // NarP_1,55.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:10867: mando vā janmapaṃ naṣṭaṃ tathā ca mandakāgaṇe /
GP12nardp1_u:10868: bhaumārkāṃśe sauradṛṣṭe candre vā dīkṣito bhavet // NarP_1,55.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:10871: brāhmo dhanīmṛge bhogī raudre hiṃstraḥ śaṭho 'ghakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:10872: dānto rogī śubho 'dityāṃ puṣyaryajanmā kaviḥ sukhī // NarP_1,55.215 //
GP12nardp1_u:10873: dhūrtaḥ śaṭhaḥ kṛtaghno 'hau pāpaḥ sarvāśano bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10874: patre bhogī dhanī bhakto dātā priyavacā bhage // NarP_1,55.216 //
GP12nardp1_u:10875: dhanī bhogīnaroryamarkṣe steno dhṛṣṭo ghṛṇī kare /
GP12nardp1_u:10876: citrāṃbaraḥ sudṛktvāṣṭre na ca dharmadayāparaḥ // NarP_1,55.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:10877: dvīśe lubdhaḥ paṭuḥ krodhī maḍhaiyo āṭhanovideśagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10878: śākre dharmaparastuṣṭo mūle mānī dhanī sukhī // NarP_1,55.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:10879: āpye mānī dṛṣṭo vaiśve namraśca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10880: karṇe dhanī sukhī khyāto dātā śūro dhanī vasau // NarP_1,55.219 //
GP12nardp1_u:10882: budhne vaktā sukhī kāntaḥ pauṣṇe śūro dhanī śuciḥ // NarP_1,55.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:10883: kāmī śūraḥ kṛtajño 'je kāntastyāgī kṣamī vṛṣe /
GP12nardp1_u:10884: yugme srīdyūtaśāsrajñaḥ sraiṇo hrasvaḥ svabhe vidhau // NarP_1,55.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:10885: srīdviṭ krodhī harau mānī vikrāntaḥ sthiradhīḥ sukhī /
GP12nardp1_u:10886: dharmī ślakṣṇaḥ sudhīḥ ṣaṣṭe prājñaḥ prāṃśurdhanī ghaṭe // NarP_1,55.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:10887: rogī pūjyaḥ kṣatī kārairpye kaviḥ śilpījyabhe dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10891: khyātaḥ srīdviṭ dhanī tīkṣṇojñaḥ kaviḥ śaiṇḍiko dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10892: pūjyo lubdho 'dhanasakho meṣādau bhāskare janau // NarP_1,55.224 //
GP12nardp1_u:10893: niḥsvor'kabhe bhūmiputre bhūmiputre dhanī cāndre svabhedanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10894: baudhe kṛtajño jaive tu khyātaḥ śaukre 'nyadārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.225 //
GP12nardp1_u:10901: sārthaḥ prājñaḥ samaḥ khyātiḥ srīji'torkādibhe mṛgau /
GP12nardp1_u:10920: kaviḥ sukhī budhāṃśe tu naṭacaurajñaśilpinaḥ // NarP_1,55.238 //
GP12nardp1_u:10922: krodhī nidhīśo mātyo vā nṛpo hiṃsro suto hareḥ // NarP_1,55.239 //
GP12nardp1_u:10923: jīvāṃśe hāsyavidyodhā balī mantrī ca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10926: vargottame khe parabhe pala muktaṃ śubhaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,55.241 //
GP12nardp1_u:10927: puṣṭaṃ madhyaṃ laghu jñeyaṃ yadi cāṃśapatirbalī /
GP12nardp1_u:10930: meṣe dhanī taimirakaḥ siṃhe rātryandha eva ca // NarP_1,55.243 //
GP12nardp1_u:10933: trige budho vikramī ca vimukhaḥ pīḍito bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:10937: lābhe bahudhano mānī patito kho 'vyaye ravau /.
GP12nardp1_u:10938: mūkodho badhiraḥ preṣyo jege khāñcājage dhanī // NarP_1,55.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:10944: kṣudrāeṃ'gahīno vyayage candre proktaṃ phalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.250 //
GP12nardp1_u:10947: vidvān dhanī ca pravaraḥ paṇḍitaḥ sacivoriyuk /
GP12nardp1_u:10954: alaso lagnage mande dharmātsvoñcagate nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.255 //
GP12nardp1_u:10962: nṛpaśca mitrabhāstheṣu kheṭe vrekādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,55.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:10964: khyāto mahodyamī cātitejā dhīmāndhanī balī // NarP_1,55.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:10977: tejasvī ca naraḥ khāye triṃśāṃse sṛjisaṃsthite /
GP12nardp1_u:10978: āmayī vā svabhāryāyāṃ viṣamaḥ pāradārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.267 //
GP12nardp1_u:10987: sukhejño cāru ceṣṭāṅgau candrārkkaucetkujādigau mūlatrikoṇasvarkṣocce kaṇṭhasthāstu ca ye grahāḥ // NarP_1,55.272 //
GP12nardp1_u:10989: śubhaṃ vargottame janma vesisthāne vasadgṛhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.273 //
GP12nardp1_u:10993: praveśe bhāskarakujau bhṛgvījyo madhyagau tathā // NarP_1,55.275 //
GP12nardp1_u:10994: candrārkī phala dāvantye sadā jñaḥ phaladāyakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10997: ravau bhīner'kajaḥ srīghnaḥ putrasthastu tathā kujaḥ // NarP_1,55.277 //
GP12nardp1_u:11005: pāpe dhīsthe vidhau kṣīṇajanmā sutakalatriṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11007: tau cetseṃdusriyā sārddhaṃ puṃścalo jāyate naraḥ // NarP_1,55.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11009: nṛsriyo stu śubhairdṛṣṭau tau dvau pariṇatāṅgakau // NarP_1,55.283 //
GP12nardp1_u:11015: karkālyaṃ śagate kendre pāpayukte tu guhyaruk // NarP_1,55.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11017: candre khe 'stāṅgate bhaume vikalo veśiger'kaje // NarP_1,55.287 //
GP12nardp1_u:11021: saumyā dṛṣṭā na vāyatridhīgatāḥ pāpakhecarāḥ // NarP_1,55.289 //
GP12nardp1_u:11023: lagne gurau dyune mande vātarogādito bhavet // NarP_1,55.290 //
GP12nardp1_u:11024: sukhe 'ste vā kuje jīve lagne vārkiyutodaye /
GP12nardp1_u:11025: kujena vātmaje dyūne saṃjñeṃ'tye 'bje ca sonmadaḥ // NarP_1,55.291 //
GP12nardp1_u:11031: puñjanau tu phalaṃ puṇyasrīṇāṃ yogyaṃ vadecca tat // NarP_1,55.294 //
GP12nardp1_u:11039: bālyaduṣṭā tathā dāsī sādhvī māyāvatī tvarā // NarP_1,55.298 //
GP12nardp1_u:11042: duṣṇavāk punarbhūḥ saguṇā vijñā khyātā sphujidgrṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:11043: baudhe samā yā klīvā ca satī guṇavatī calā // NarP_1,55.300 //
GP12nardp1_u:11045: vācāṭā kulaṭā siṃhe rāgī pundhīragamyatā // NarP_1,55.301 //
GP12nardp1_u:11047: dāsī nīcaratā sādhvī mānde duṣṭā napatyakā // NarP_1,55.302 //
GP12nardp1_u:11049: dṛggaiḥ mithoṃśe śukrārkī śaukre cedvā ghaṭāṃśake // NarP_1,55.303 //
GP12nardp1_u:11051: śūnye kāpuruṣo dyūne bale klīvo na sadṛśi // NarP_1,55.304 //
GP12nardp1_u:11053: tatsṛṣṭā madage sūrye strībālavidhavā kuje // NarP_1,55.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11057: mithoṃśagaiḥ sitārau tu kuruto 'nyaratāṃ striyam // NarP_1,55.307 //
GP12nardp1_u:11059: saurārarkṣe lagnagate seṃduśukre tu vandhakī // NarP_1,55.308 //
GP12nardp1_u:11062: mandarkṣe vāṃśake dyūne vṛddhau mūrkhaḥ patiḥ striyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11063: strīlolaḥ krodhanaḥ kauje baudhe vidvāṃśca naipuṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.310 //
GP12nardp1_u:11067: jñedvoḥ kalāsu nipuṇā sukhitā ca guṇānvitā // NarP_1,55.312 //
GP12nardp1_u:11071: vaidhavyaṃ ca mṛtistasyā svayaṃsatsvarthageṣu tu // NarP_1,55.314 //
GP12nardp1_u:11089: mṛtyuścātha mṛge candre karke mande jalodarāt // NarP_1,55.323 //
GP12nardp1_u:11093: striyāṃ sapāpe 'bje dyūne site meṣe ravau tanau // NarP_1,55.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11094: maraṇaṃ strīkṛte gehe hyatha turye kuje ravau /
GP12nardp1_u:11123: svoccasthoṃ'ge vyaye saumyabhāge mokṣo balānyataḥ // NarP_1,55.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11124: ādhāne janmā jñāne tu vṛkṣatāṃ lagnato vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:11151: cipiṭāsyo hi saṃvīto nausthaḥ ratryarthaṃvrajañjale // NarP_1,55.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11152: śvā naro jaṃbukaṃ gṛdhraṃ gṛhītvā rauti śālmalau /
GP12nardp1_u:11169: bhāṇḍī romaścavāḥ śyāmaḥ kirīṭī phalayantradhṛk // NarP_1,55.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11176: iti śrīnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne jātakanirūpaṇannāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:11180: caitraśuklapratipadi yo vāraḥ sa nṛpaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:11184: adhamo ravijo vācyo jñātvā caiṣāṃ balābalam // NarP_1,56.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:11194: śubhor'kaḥ śiśire tāmraḥ kuṅkumābhā vasaṃtike // NarP_1,56.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:11200: śaśaraktanibhe bhānau saṃgrāmo na cirādbhuvi // NarP_1,56.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:11203: arke śyāme kīṭabhayaṃ bhasmābhe rāṣṭrajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11226: yāmyaśṛṅgonnato neṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ śukle pipīlikā // NarP_1,56.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:11230: kujādyairnihate śṛṅge maṇḍale vā yathākramam // NarP_1,56.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:11236: kuje trayodaśe ṛkṣe vakrite vā caturdaśe // NarP_1,56.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:11250: triṣūttarāsu rohiṇyāṃ nairṛte śravaṇe mṛge // NarP_1,56.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:11283: dvibhāṭajodimāstasya pañcamaikādaśāstrimādhavaḥ śubhado jyeṣṭo nṛṇāṃ madhyaphalapradaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11284: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:11286: śubhapradau pauṣamādhau madhyamau phaālguno madhuḥ // NarP_1,56.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:11288: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnara // NarP_1,56.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:11300: hṛdayeśasya nidhanaṃ śubhaṃ syātsaṃyutaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,56.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:11302: iti dvijātimadhyāṃ tu gonṛpastrīsukhaṃ mahat // NarP_1,56.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:11311: saumya mārge ca tisṛṣu caranvīthiṣu bhārgavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11314: pūrvasyāṃ diśi meghastu śubhadaḥ pitṛpañcake // NarP_1,56.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:11318: undayāstamanaṃ yāti tadā jalamayī mahī // NarP_1,56.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:11327: mukhe caikaṃ gude dve ca trīṇi ke nayane dvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:11328: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi vāmahaste catuṣṭayam // NarP_1,56.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:11329: vāmapāde tathā trīṇi dakṣiṇe trīṇe bhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11331: rogo lābhastathā hānirlābhaḥ saukhyaṃ ca bandhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:11332: āyāsaḥ śreṣṭhayātrā ca dhanalābhaḥ kramātphalam // NarP_1,56.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:11336: amṛtyutāṃ gatastatra kheṭastatra kheṭatve parikalpitaḥ // NarP_1,56.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:11340: parveśāstu tathā satyadevā khyāditaḥ kramāt // NarP_1,56.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:11343: tadvadeva phalaṃ saumye śleṣmapīḍā ca parvaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:11358: no śaktā lakṣituṃ devāḥ kiṃ punaḥ prākṛtā janāḥ // NarP_1,56.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:11360: śubhāśubhānyaiḥ kālasya grāhayāmo hi lakṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:11366: nakṣatrasaṃsthitā divyā bhaumā ye bhūmisaṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,56.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:11385: vikacākhyā gurusutā veṣṭā yāmye sthitā api /
GP12nardp1_u:11390: śukrajā ṛkṣasadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubhadāyakāḥ // NarP_1,56.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:11396: cāndramārkṣaṃ gurormānamiti mānāni vai navaḥ // NarP_1,56.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:11408: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvo yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca // NarP_1,56.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:11416: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso 'nalaḥ // NarP_1,56.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:11426: tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet // NarP_1,56.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:11428: ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam // NarP_1,56.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:11430: madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe // NarP_1,56.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:11432: mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ // NarP_1,56.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:11434: varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane // NarP_1,56.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:11435: cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11438: nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ // NarP_1,56.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:11440: yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā // NarP_1,56.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:11442: tatpakṣau daiva pitrākhyau śuklakṛṣṇau tathāpare // NarP_1,56.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:11443: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11452: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī // NarP_1,56.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:11455: tyājyāḥ syustāsu tithiṣu kramātpañca ca sarvadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11456: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣamasaṃjñikā // NarP_1,56.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:11458: ṣaṣaaṭyāṃ tailaṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ māsaṃ kṣauraṃ kalestithau // NarP_1,56.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:11460: derśe ṣaṣṭyāṃ pratipadi dvādaśyāṃ pratiparvasu // NarP_1,56.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:11462: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntāvekādaśyāṃ ca parvasu // NarP_1,56.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:11464: yaḥ karoti daśamyāṃ ca snānamāmalakairnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:11467: amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11468: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā // NarP_1,56.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:11476: caitre bhādrapade caiva tṛtīyā śuklasaṃjñitā // NarP_1,56.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:11478: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tvasitāṣṭamī // NarP_1,56.150 //
GP12nardp1_u:11480: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā // NarP_1,56.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:11482: bhādre kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ maghāminduḥ kare raviḥ // NarP_1,56.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:11485: tithirvāratraye tvekā hyadhikā dve ca nindite /
GP12nardp1_u:11486: sūryāstamanaparyantaṃ yasminvāre tu yā tithiḥ // NarP_1,56.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:11490: raviḥ sthiraścaraścandraḥ krūro vakrokhilo budhaḥ // NarP_1,56.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:11492: abhyakto bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavānbhavet // NarP_1,56.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:11494: jīve naivaṃ site hānirmande sarvasamṛddhayaḥ // NarP_1,56.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:11498: tatkarma balahīnasya duḥkhenāpi na siddhyāti // NarP_1,56.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:11502: dūrvāvarṇo vudho jīvaḥ pītaśvetastu bhārgavaḥ // NarP_1,56.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:11520: adhomukhaṃ tu navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:11524: tiryaṅmukhākhyaṃ navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.173 //
GP12nardp1_u:11528: ūrddhāsyaṃ navakaṃ bhānāṃ proktamatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:11532: sādhāraṇaṃ dvidaivatyaṃ vahnibhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // NarP_1,56.177//
GP12nardp1_u:11542: darśāṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paśūnāṃ na kadācana // NarP_1,56.182 //
GP12nardp1_u:11546: agre vṛddhyai trayaṃ lakṣmye saumyapārśve ca pañcakam // NarP_1,56.184 //
GP12nardp1_u:11548: śriyai puṣṭyai trayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ syāccakre lāṅgalāhvaye // NarP_1,56.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:11552: gale trayaṃ kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśodare // NarP_1,56.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:11554: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakaṃ yadvījoptāviti cintayet // NarP_1,56.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:11578: krūraviddho yuto vāpipuṣyo yadi balānvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:11584: yā dṛśyante dīptatārāḥ svagaṇe yogatārakāḥ // NarP_1,56.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:11607: vyāgaghāte nava śūle tu pañca nāḍyo hi garhitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11611: tatra ravārjūrike cakre kathitaṃ mūrdhni bhaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:11619: parītā viparītā vā viṣyirneṣṭā tu maṅgale /
GP12nardp1_u:11620: mukhe pañcagale caikā vakṣasyekādaśa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:11621: nābhau catasraḥ ṣaṭ kaṭyāṃ tisraḥ pucchākhyanājikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11623: kaṭyāmunmattatā nābhau cyutiḥ pucche dhruvaṃ jayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11627: aryamā bhagasaṃjñaśca vijñeyā daśa pañca ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11635: yeṣu ṛkṣeṣu yatkarma kathitaṃ nikhilaṃ ca tat /
GP12nardp1_u:11636: taddaivatye muhūrte 'pi kāryaṃ yātrādikaṃ sadā // NarP_1,56.229 //
GP12nardp1_u:11638: śūlo 'ṣṭame ca daśame śāniraṣṭādaśe tataḥ // NarP_1,56.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:11646: dhiṣṇye tāvati satyatra duṣṭayogaḥ patatyasau // NarP_1,56.234 //
GP12nardp1_u:11661: hastarkṣaṃ ca khārvidau candrabhaṃ dasrabhaṃ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:11662: saumye mitrabhamācāryaṃ tiṣyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ bhṛgoḥ sute // NarP_1,56.242/
GP12nardp1_u:11665: jayāsaumye gurau riktā śanaupūrṇeti no śubhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11666: nandā tithiḥ śukravāre saumye bhadrā kuje jayā // NarP_1,56.244 //
GP12nardp1_u:11667: riktā mande gurorvāre pūrṇā siddhāhvayā amī /
GP12nardp1_u:11669: ṣaṣṭī gurau tṛtīyā jñe 'ṣṭamī śukre śanaiścare /
GP12nardp1_u:11670: navamī pañcamī bhaume dagdhayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,56.246 //
GP12nardp1_u:11672: budhe śraviṣṭāryamabhe gurau jyeṣṭā bhṛgordine // NarP_1,56.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:11681: anuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ghorādyāḥ sukhadāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11690: bhuśuḍī ca gadākhaḍgau daṇḍa iṣaavāsatomarau // NarP_1,56.256 //
GP12nardp1_u:11692: annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ sayūṣaṃ ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.257 //
GP12nardp1_u:11696: catuḥ pāde tilenāge suptaḥ krāntiṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,56.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:11697: dharmāyurvṛṣṭiṣu samaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:11698: āyudhaṃ vāhanāhārau yajjātīyaṃ janasya ca // NarP_1,56.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:11700: andhakaṃ mandasaṃjñaṃ ca madhyasaṃjñaṃ sulocanam // NarP_1,56.261 //
GP12nardp1_u:11706: medhyā viṣuvati proktāḥ puṇyanāḍyastu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,56.264 //
GP12nardp1_u:11710: naraḥ prāpnoti tadrāśau śītāṃśoḥ sādhvasādhu ca // NarP_1,56.266 //
GP12nardp1_u:11714: vratodvāhādikeṣveva dvayaṃ neṣṭaṃ tu tatkramāt // NarP_1,56.268 //
GP12nardp1_u:11723: tryāyāriṣu kujaḥ śreṣṭho janmanā cenna vidhyate /
GP12nardp1_u:11735: niṣphalau tau grahau svena śatruṇā ca vilokitau /
GP12nardp1_u:11736: nīcarāśigataḥ svasya śatroḥ kṣetragato 'pi vā // NarP_1,56.279 //
GP12nardp1_u:11740: maṇirmuktāphalaṃ vidrumākhyaṃ maraka taṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11742: dūryyaṃ bhāskarādīnāṃ tuṣṭya dhāryaṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,56.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11747: janma saṃpadvipat kṣema pratyariḥ sādhako vadhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11748: mitraṃ paramamitraṃ ca janmabhāttu punaḥ puna // NarP_1,56.285 //
GP12nardp1_u:11750: śākaṃ guḍaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ satilaṃ kāñcanaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11752: kṛṣṇe balavatī tārā śuklapakṣe balū śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:11770: kanyā lagne vidheyaṃ ca pauṣṭikākhilamaṅgalam // NarP_1,56.295 //
GP12nardp1_u:11772: tulāyāmakhilaṃ karma tulābhārāśrite ca yat // NarP_1,56.296 //
GP12nardp1_u:11790: ante tucchaphale lagne sarvasminnevameva hi // NarP_1,56.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11792: kalpyāmadindau balini saptame balino grahāḥ // NarP_1,56.306 //
GP12nardp1_u:11798: lagnodbhavaṃ phalaṃ dhatte dhanātīto dvitīyakam // NarP_1,56.309 //
GP12nardp1_u:11802: doṣādduṣṭo hi kālastamapi mārṣṭuṃ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_1,56.311 //
GP12nardp1_u:11807: rugṇā patipriyā duḥkhī putriṇī bhogamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11810: tārakā na hitā māsā madhūrjaśucipauṣakāḥ // NarP_1,56.315 //
GP12nardp1_u:11815: ādyā niśaścatasrastu tyājyā hyapi samāḥ paraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11819: prasiddhe prathame garbhe tṛtīye vā dvitīyake /
GP12nardp1_u:11820: māse puṃsavanaṃ kāryaṃ sīmantaṃ ca yathā tathā // NarP_1,56.320 //
GP12nardp1_u:11821: caturthe māsi ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame vā tadīśvare /
GP12nardp1_u:11830: sīmantinīṃ vā tadgarbhaṃ balī hṝnti na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11838: candrātārābalopete divase ca śiśoḥ pituḥ // NarP_1,56.329 //
GP12nardp1_u:11840: ṣaṣṭe māsyaṣṭame vāpi puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu pañcame // NarP_1,56.330 //
GP12nardp1_u:11841: saptame māsi vā kāryaṃ navānnapraśanaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:11846: pūrvārddhe saumyakheṭena saṃyukte vīkṣitepi vā // NarP_1,56.333 //
GP12nardp1_u:11860: abhyakte sandhyayornāre niśi bhuktvā na vāhave // NarP_1,56.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11861: notkaṭe bhūṣite naiva yāne na navame 'hni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11867: navame saptame vāpi pañcame divase 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:11870: āśiṣo vācanaṃ kāryaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyāṅganādibhiḥ // NarP_1,56.345 //
GP12nardp1_u:11876: rājñā mekādaśe maiñjībandhanaṃ dvādaśe viśām // NarP_1,56.348 //
GP12nardp1_u:11888: upanīto balāḍhyaśca jyeṣṭhe vidhividāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,56.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11889: śuklapakṣe dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā pañcamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11890: trayodaśī ca daśamī saptamī vratabandhane // NarP_1,56.355 //
GP12nardp1_u:11899: vārau tu madhyamau caiva vrate 'nyau ninditau matau /
GP12nardp1_u:11900: tridhā vibhajya divasaṃ tatrādau karma daivikam // NarP_1,56.360 //
GP12nardp1_u:11901: dvitīye mānuṣaṃ kāryaṃ tṛtīye ḥṃśe ca paitṛkam /
GP12nardp1_u:11902: svanīcage tadaṃśe vā svāribhe vā tadaṃśake // NarP_1,56.361 //
GP12nardp1_u:11904: svādhiśatrugṛhasthe vā tadaṃśasthe 'tha vā vratī // NarP_1,56.362 //
GP12nardp1_u:11906: svoccasaṃsthe tadaṃśe vā svarāśau rāśige gaṇe // NarP_1,56.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11907: śākheśe vā gurau śukre kendrage vā trikoṇage /
GP12nardp1_u:11909: paramoccagate jīve śākheśe vātha vā sate /
GP12nardp1_u:11912: gurau bhṛgau vā śākheśe vidyādhanasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.366 //
GP12nardp1_u:11914: śaākhādhipatilagnaṃ ca durlabhaṃ tritayaṃ vrate // NarP_1,56.367 //
GP12nardp1_u:11920: lagne tu nidhane saumyaiḥ saṃyute vā nirīkṣite // NarP_1,56.370 //
GP12nardp1_u:11932: na karoti śiśuṃ niḥsvaṃ sarvataḥ kṣayarogiṇam // NarP_1,56.376 //
GP12nardp1_u:11938: caturthī vā śubhāḥ proktā aṣṭāvete galagrahāḥ // NarP_1,56.379 //
GP12nardp1_u:11951: ghūmrāye maraṇaṃ siṃhe jayaḥ śuni ca rogitā /
GP12nardp1_u:11952: dhanalābho vṛṣe 'tyantaṃ duḥkhī bhavati gardabhe // NarP_1,56.386 //
GP12nardp1_u:11959: sthito dhvaje vṛṣāye vā naṣṭācetpūrvato vraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:11966: pratipatparvariktā mā cāṣṭamī ca dinatrayam // NarP_1,56.393 //
GP12nardp1_u:11969: sukhaṃ tatrāpi bhāminyāṃ śīlavatyāṃ sthitaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11970: tasyāḥ sacchīlarlā dhastu sulagnavaśataḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.395 //
GP12nardp1_u:11980: mṛtaputrātha vā kanyā kulaṭā vā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.400 //
GP12nardp1_u:11984: vīkṣitāḥ pṛcchatāṃ nṝṇāṃ kanyālābho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.402 //
GP12nardp1_u:11990: pāpadṛṣṭo 'tha vā randhre na saṃbandho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.405 //
GP12nardp1_u:11998: tadā kuryātpitā tasyāḥ pradānaṃ prītipūrvakam // NarP_1,56.409 //
GP12nardp1_u:12000: varāya ca rūpavatīṃ kanyāṃ dadyādyavīyasīm // NarP_1,56.410 //
GP12nardp1_u:12001: saṃpūjya prārthayitvā ca śacīṃ devīṃ guṇāśrayām /
GP12nardp1_u:12006: evaṃvidhāṃ kumārīṃ tāṃ pūjānte prārthayediti // NarP_1,56.413 //
GP12nardp1_u:12008: vivāhe bhāgyamārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dehi me // NarP_1,56.414 //
GP12nardp1_u:12012: madhyamā kārtiko mārgaśīrṣo vai ninditāḥ pare // NarP_1,56.416 //
GP12nardp1_u:12014: vivāho devatānāṃ ca pratiṣṭāṃ copanāyanam // NarP_1,56.417 //
GP12nardp1_u:12016: na gurau siṃharāśisthe siṃhāṃśakagatepi vā // NarP_1,56.418 //
GP12nardp1_u:12018: buddhaḥ pañcadinaṃ pakṣaṃ guruḥ pakṣaṃ ca sarvataḥ // NarP_1,56.419 //
GP12nardp1_u:12021: na janmamāse janmarkṣe na janmadivase 'pi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12026: nākhile tridinaṃ neṣṭaṃ tridyuspṛk ca kṣayaṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.423 //
GP12nardp1_u:12028: saṃdhyāyāṃ tridinaṃ tadvanniśīthe sapta eva ca // NarP_1,56.424 //
GP12nardp1_u:12030: vyatīpātaṃ vaidhṛtiṃ ca saṃpūrṇaṃ parighārddhakam // NarP_1,56.425 //
GP12nardp1_u:12034: cetpūjā yatnataḥ kāryā durbala grahayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.427 //
GP12nardp1_u:12038: tithirekaguṇā vāro dviguṇastriguṇaṃ ca bham // NarP_1,56.429 //
GP12nardp1_u:12040: tato manahūrto balavāṃstato lagnaṃ balādhikam // NarP_1,56.430 //
GP12nardp1_u:12042: tato navāṃśo balavāndvādaśāṃśo balī tataḥ // NarP_1,56.431 //
GP12nardp1_u:12052: tṛtīyaḥ pāpaṣaḍvargo bhṛguḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ kujo 'ṣṭamaḥ // NarP_1,56.436 //
GP12nardp1_u:12065: evaṃ tau na yutau dṛṣṭau mutyurvadhvāḥ karagrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:12066: tyājyāḥ sūryasya saṃkrānteḥ pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,56.443 //
GP12nardp1_u:12070: uccage śubhasaṃyukte tallagnaṃ sarvadā tyajet // NarP_1,56.445 //
GP12nardp1_u:12072: śubhatrayayutaṃ lagnaṃ na tyajettuṅgago yadi // NarP_1,56.446 //
GP12nardp1_u:12079: ugraṃ ca saṃdhitritayaṃ gaṇḍātaṃ trividhaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:12086: uccage nīcage vāpi mitrabhe śatrurāśige // NarP_1,56.453 //
GP12nardp1_u:12090: sūryeṇa saṃyute candre dāridyaṃ bhavati sphuṭam // NarP_1,56.455 //
GP12nardp1_u:12092: daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā yukte sāpatyaṃ bhārgaveṇa tu // NarP_1,56.456 //
GP12nardp1_u:12094: ketunā saṃyute candre nityaṃ kaṣṭaṃ daridratā // NarP_1,56.457 //
GP12nardp1_u:12098: svoccago vā svarkṣago vā mitra kṣetragatopi vā // NarP_1,56.459 //
GP12nardp1_u:12102: sa rāśiḥ śubhasaṃyukto lagnaṃ vā śubhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,56.461 //
GP12nardp1_u:12104: daṃpatyordvādaśaṃ lagnaṃ rāśirvā yadi lagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.462 //
GP12nardp1_u:12124: yāvacca śaśinā bhuktvā muktabhaṃ dagdhakāṣṭavat // NarP_1,56.472 //
GP12nardp1_u:12128: krūraviddhaṃ yutaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ nikhilaṃ naiva maṅgalam // NarP_1,56.474 //
GP12nardp1_u:12130: ete navāṃśāḥ śubhadā vṛṣabhasyāṃśakāḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.475 //
GP12nardp1_u:12132: anye navāṃśā na grāhyā yataste kunavāṃśakāḥ // NarP_1,56.476 //
GP12nardp1_u:12143: bṛhaspatiḥ kendragataḥ śukro vā yadi vā budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12144: eko 'pi doṣanicayaṃ haratyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.482 //
GP12nardp1_u:12145: tiryakpañcorddhūgāḥ pañca rekhā dve dve ca koṇayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12148: purataḥ pṛṣṭator'kādyā dinarkṣaṃ lattayanti yat // NarP_1,56.484 //
GP12nardp1_u:12152: saurāṣṭre sālvadeśe tu lattitaṃ bhaṃ vivarjayet // NarP_1,56.486 //
GP12nardp1_u:12154: bāhlike kurudeśe cānyasmindeśe na dūṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.487 //
GP12nardp1_u:12156: madhyadeśe vivarjyāni na dṛṣṭānītareṣu ca // NarP_1,56.488 //
GP12nardp1_u:12159: doṣaduṣṭaṃ sadā kālaṃ sannimārṣṭuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12160: api dhāturato grāhyaṃ doṣālpatvaṃ guṇādhikam // NarP_1,56.490 //
GP12nardp1_u:12174: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ bhinnaṃ rāśyaikatvaṃ yayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.497 //
GP12nardp1_u:12177: dvitīye madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tṛtīye navake nṛbham /
GP12nardp1_u:12188: dvirdādaśe trikoṇe ca na kadācitṣaḍaṣṭake // NarP_1,56.504 //
GP12nardp1_u:12205: prācyā na ca kaliṅgānāṃ mukhyaṃ godhūlikaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:12214: na caikajanyayoḥ puṃsorekajanye tu kanyake // NarP_1,56.517 //
GP12nardp1_u:12216: divājātastu pitaraṃ rātrau tu jananīṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.518 //
GP12nardp1_u:12218: sutaḥ sutā vā niyataṃ śvasuraṃ hṝnti mūlajaḥ // NarP_1,56.519 //
GP12nardp1_u:12220: jyeṣṭāntyapādajau jyeṣṭaṃ bālo hṝnti na bālikā // NarP_1,56.520 //
GP12nardp1_u:12222: saindrī dhavāgrajaṃ hṝnti devaraṃ tu dvidaivajā // NarP_1,56.521 //
GP12nardp1_u:12226: saṃtyajya hyatiśukre 'pi yātrā vaivāhikī śubhā // NarP_1,56.523 //
GP12nardp1_u:12231: dineṣu yasya devasya yā titistatra tasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12238: śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca kartturna nidhanodaye // NarP_1,56.529 //
GP12nardp1_u:12240: pañcāṣṭake śubhe lagne naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.530 //
GP12nardp1_u:12245: caturthe sukhadāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāḥ kheṭāśca duḥkhadāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12246: glānidāḥ pañcame krūrāḥ saumyāḥ putrasukhapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.533 //
GP12nardp1_u:12247: ṣaṣṭe śubhāḥ śatrudāḥ syuḥ pāpāḥ śabrukṣayaṅkarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12248: vyādhidāḥ saptame pāpāḥ saumyāḥ śubhaphalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.534 //
GP12nardp1_u:12250: dharme pāpā ghnanti saumyāḥ śubhadā maṅgalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.535 //
GP12nardp1_u:12256: guṇādhikatare lagne doṣaḥ svalpataro yadi // NarP_1,56.538 //
GP12nardp1_u:12261: sitaṃ raktaṃ ca haritaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:12262: madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyakarasaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.541 //
GP12nardp1_u:12266: atyantavṛddhiradhike hīne hāniḥ same samam // NarP_1,56.543 //
GP12nardp1_u:12268: prātardṛṣṭe jale vṛddhiḥ samaṃ paṅke kṣayaḥ kṣaye // NarP_1,56.544 //
GP12nardp1_u:12274: āyāmeṣu caturdikṣu prāgādiṣu ca satsvapi // NarP_1,56.547 //
GP12nardp1_u:12286: paścime dakṣiṇe vāpi kapāṭaṃ sthāpayedgṛhe // NarP_1,56.553 //
GP12nardp1_u:12298: akārādiṣu bhāgṣu dikṣu prāgādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,56.559 //
GP12nardp1_u:12301: sādhyavargaḥ puraḥ sthāpya pṛṣṭataḥ sādhakaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:12302: vyatyaye nāśanaṃ tasya ṛṇamadhyaṃ dhanācchubham // NarP_1,56.561 //
GP12nardp1_u:12304: vibhejetsaptabhiḥ śeṣaṃ sādhakasya dhanaṃ tadā // NarP_1,56.562 //
GP12nardp1_u:12308: viṣamāyaḥ śubhaghāyaiva samāyo nirdhanāya ca // NarP_1,56.564 //
GP12nardp1_u:12310: ātmakṣayaḥ saptamarkṣe bhavatyeva hi bhartṛbhāt // NarP_1,56.565 //
GP12nardp1_u:12320: sabalo mukhagehānāmeṣa doṣo na vidyate // NarP_1,56.570 //
GP12nardp1_u:12322: gṛhamadhye hastamātre garte nyāsāya vinyaset // NarP_1,56.571 //
GP12nardp1_u:12329: śakuṃ tridhā vibhajyāndyaṃ caturasraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:12330: aṣṭāsraṃ ca tṛtīyāsau manvasraṃ mṛdumavraṇam // NarP_1,56.575 //
GP12nardp1_u:12336: śubhekṣite 'tha vā yukte lagne śaṅkuṃ vinikṣipet // NarP_1,56.578 //
GP12nardp1_u:12341: tāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍvidhāḥ śālāḥ pratyekaṃ daśaṣaḍvidhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12342: dhruvaṃ dhānyaṃ jayaṃ nandaṃ kharaḥ kāntaṃ manoramam // NarP_1,56.581 //
GP12nardp1_u:12343: sumukhaṃ durmukhaṃ krūraṃ śatruṃ svarṇapradaṃ kṣayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12344: ākrandaṃ vipulākhya ca vijayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,56.582 //
GP12nardp1_u:12352: pratīcyāṃ bhojanagṛhaṃ vā yavyāṃ dhānyamadiram // NarP_1,56.586 //
GP12nardp1_u:12358: dhvajo dhūmrotha siṃhaḥ śvā saurameyaḥ kharo gajāḥ // NarP_1,56.589 //
GP12nardp1_u:12368: pāñcālamānaṃ vaidehaṃ kauravaṃ ca kujanyakam // NarP_1,56.594 //
GP12nardp1_u:12374: avantimānaṃ viprāṇāṃ gāndhāraṃ kṣatriyasya ca // NarP_1,56.597 //
GP12nardp1_u:12378: paśuśālāśca śālānāṃ dhvajāyepyatha vā gaje // NarP_1,56.599 //
GP12nardp1_u:12388: sūryaḥ śaśī mṛgākāśau vāyuḥ pūṣā ca nairṛtiḥ // NarP_1,56.604 //
