GP12nardp1_u:12394: ekāntarā syuḥ prāgādyāḥ parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.607 //
GP12nardp1_u:12396: mitrotha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharāhvayaḥ // NarP_1,56.608 //
GP12nardp1_u:12400: tanmadhye viṃśatirbāhyā dvipadāste tu sarvadā // NarP_1,56.610 //
GP12nardp1_u:12401: aryamā ca vivasvāṃśca mitraḥ pṛthvī dharāhvayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12402: brahmaṇaḥ pārito dikṣu catvārastripadāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.611 //
GP12nardp1_u:12408: tāmbūlaṃ ca tataḥ kartā prārthayedvāstupūruṣam // NarP_1,56.614 //
GP12nardp1_u:12412: dadyāttadagre viprebhyo bhojanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ // NarP_1,56.616 //
GP12nardp1_u:12414: ārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,56.617 //
GP12nardp1_u:12418: gṛhaṃ na praviśedevaṃ vipadāmākaraṃ hi tat // NarP_1,56.619 //
GP12nardp1_u:12424: yātrā śuklapratipadi nirddhanāya kṣayāya ca // NarP_1,56.622 //
GP12nardp1_u:12427: na mandendudine prācīṃ na vrajeddakṣiṇaṃ gurau /
GP12nardp1_u:12434: digrāśayastu kramaśo meṣādyāśca punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,56.627 //
GP12nardp1_u:12436: lagnastho bhāskaraḥ prācyāṃ diśi yāturlalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.628 //
GP12nardp1_u:12440: lagnātsaptamagaḥ sauriḥ pratīcyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.630 //
GP12nardp1_u:12446: tasya bhaṅgaprado rājñasta dvargo 'pi vilagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.633 //
GP12nardp1_u:12450: pratiśukrakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ hṝntuṃ śaktā grahā na hi // NarP_1,56.635 //
GP12nardp1_u:12452: eteṣāṃ pañcagotrāṇāṃ pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.636 //
GP12nardp1_u:12454: dvijakṣobhe nṛpakṣobhe pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.637 //
GP12nardp1_u:12462: yāne sthirodaye neṣṭo bhavyayuktekṣitaḥ svayam // NarP_1,56.641 //
GP12nardp1_u:12466: tābhyāṃ tayorikendreṣu yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.643 //
GP12nardp1_u:12468: śubhavārgotha vā lagne yātuḥ śatrukṣayastadā // NarP_1,56.644 //
GP12nardp1_u:12470: tayorīśasthite rāśau yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.645 //
GP12nardp1_u:12474: mūrtiḥ kośo dhanvinaśca vāhanaṃ mantrasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,56.647 //
GP12nardp1_u:12478: na nighnato hi vyāpāraṃ saumyāḥḍha puṣṇantyariṃ vinā // NarP_1,56.649 //
GP12nardp1_u:12479: śukro 'staṃ ca na puṣṇāti mūrtiṃ mṛtyuṃ ca candramāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12488: yoge 'pi yāyināṃ kṣemamadhiyoge jayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.654 //
GP12nardp1_u:12496: lagne śukre ravau lābhe candre bandhusthite yadā // NarP_1,56.658 //
GP12nardp1_u:12498: svoccasaṃsthe site lagne svocce candre ca lābhage // NarP_1,56.659 //
GP12nardp1_u:12500: trikoṇe kendragāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāstryāyārigā yadi // NarP_1,56.660 //
GP12nardp1_u:12504: trikhaḍāyeṣu mandārau balavantaḥ śubhā yadi // NarP_1,56.662 //
GP12nardp1_u:12506: svoñcasthe lagnage jīve candre lābhagate yadi // NarP_1,56.663 //
GP12nardp1_u:12507: gato rājā ripūnhati pinākī tripuraṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12510: jīvaṃ lagnagate śukre kendre vāpi trikoṇage // NarP_1,56.665 //
GP12nardp1_u:12512: lagnage jñe śubhe kendre dhiṣṇye copakule gataḥ // NarP_1,56.666 //
GP12nardp1_u:12514: śubhi trikoṇe kendrasthe lābhe candre 'thavā ravī // NarP_1,56.667 //
GP12nardp1_u:12515: śatrūnhanti gato rājā hyandhakāraṃ yathā raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12516: svakṣetrage śubhe kadre trikoṇoyagate gataḥ // NarP_1,56.668 //
GP12nardp1_u:12518: indau svasthe gurau kendre mantraḥ sapraṇavo gataḥ // NarP_1,56.669 //
GP12nardp1_u:12522: śubhe kendre trikoṇasthe candre vargottame gataḥ // NarP_1,56.671 //
GP12nardp1_u:12524: mitrabhe 'tha gurau kendre trikoṇasthe 'tha vā site // NarP_1,56.672 //
GP12nardp1_u:12525: śatrūnhṝnti gato rājā bhujaṅgān garuḍo yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12528: ye nṛpā yāntyarīñjetuṃ teṣāṃ yogairnṛpāhvayaiḥ // NarP_1,56.674 //
GP12nardp1_u:12535: asamāpte na kurvīta yātrāṃ martyo jijīviṣuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12537: vastrādeḥ skhalite krodhe durukte na vrajennṛpaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12540: sajjikā paramānnaṃ ca kāñjika ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.680 //
GP12nardp1_u:12542: kulmāṣāṃśca tilānnaṃ ca dadhi kṣaudraṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ // NarP_1,56.681 //
GP12nardp1_u:12543: mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca tatsāraṃ pāyasaṃ ca khagaṃ mṛgam /
GP12nardp1_u:12546: haviṣyaṃ kṛśarānnaṃ ca mudgānnaṃ yavapiṣṭikam // NarP_1,56.683 //
GP12nardp1_u:12562: prāṇināṃ prāṇarūpaṃ taṃ dvibāhuṃ daṇḍapāṇikam // NarP_1,56.691 //
GP12nardp1_u:12568: aprayāṇe svayaṃ kāryā prekṣayā bhūbhujastathā // NarP_1,56.694 //
GP12nardp1_u:12572: dinānyekatra na vasetsaptaṣṭ vā paro janaḥ // NarP_1,56.696 //
GP12nardp1_u:12575: utpāteṣu trividheṣu saptarātraṃ tu na vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:12580: kṛṣṇaṃ tyaktvā prayāṇe tu kṛkalāsena vīkṣitaḥ // NarP_1,56.700 //
GP12nardp1_u:12584: dṛṣṭamātreṇa yātrāyāṃ vyastaṃ sarvaṃ praveśane // NarP_1,56.702 //
GP12nardp1_u:12598: vedamaṅgalaghoṣāḥ syuḥ yā yināṃ kāryasiddhidāḥ // NarP_1,56.709 //
GP12nardp1_u:12600: smṛtvā dvitīye viprāṇāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ nivartayet // NarP_1,56.710 //
GP12nardp1_u:12612: divā vā yadi vā rātrau praveśo maṅgalapradaḥ // NarP_1,56.716 //
GP12nardp1_u:12614: sthiralagne sthirāṃśe ca naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.717 //
GP12nardp1_u:12620: kṛtvārkaṃ vāmato vidvānbhṛṅgāraṃ cāgrato viśet // NarP_1,56.720 //
GP12nardp1_u:12622: kendrage vā śuklapakṣe cātivṛṣṭiḥ śubhekṣite // NarP_1,56.721 //
GP12nardp1_u:12630: pravarṣaṇaṃ bhṛguḥ kuryādviparīte na varṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.725 //
GP12nardp1_u:12632: tadā vṛṣṭiṃ prakurvanti na te cetpratilomagāḥ // NarP_1,56.726 //
GP12nardp1_u:12638: candrejye jñetha vā śukre kendrenbītirvinaśyati // NarP_1,56.729 //
GP12nardp1_u:12642: siṃhe bhinne kujo vṛṣṭirabhinne karkaṭe tathā // NarP_1,56.731 //
GP12nardp1_u:12644: ahirbudhnyaṃ pūrvaśasyaṃ paraśasyā ca revatī // NarP_1,56.732 //
GP12nardp1_u:12646: guroḥ saptamarā tisthaḥ pratyaggo bhṛgujo yadā // NarP_1,56.733 //
GP12nardp1_u:12656: udayāstamaye kāle vivarṇor'ketha vā śaśī // NarP_1,56.738 //
GP12nardp1_u:12658: prāṅmukhasya tu kūrmasya navāṅgeṣu dharāmimām // NarP_1,56.739 //
GP12nardp1_u:12670: nābhyādiṣu navāṅgeṣu pāpairduṣṭaṃ śubhaiḥ śubham // NarP_1,56.745 //
GP12nardp1_u:12671: devatā yatra nṛtyanti patanti prajvalanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12672: muhū rudanti gāyanti prasvidyanti hasaṃti ca // NarP_1,56.746 //
GP12nardp1_u:12673: vamantyagniṃ tathā dhūmaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo jalam /
GP12nardp1_u:12675: evamādyā hi dṛśyante vikārāḥ pratimāsu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12678: gāndharvaṃ dehadigdhūmaṃ bhūmikaṃpaṃ divā niśi // NarP_1,56.749 //
GP12nardp1_u:12679: anagnau ca sphuliṅgāśca jvalanaṃ ca vinendhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:12682: jantavo dvitriśiraso jāyante vāpi yoniṣu // NarP_1,56.751 //
GP12nardp1_u:12686: akāle puṣpitā vṛkṣā dṛśyante phalitā yadi // NarP_1,56.753 //
GP12nardp1_u:12690: madhyādbhayaṃ yaśo mṛtyuḥ kṣayaḥ kīrtiḥ sukhāsukham // NarP_1,56.755 //
GP12nardp1_u:12691: aisvaryaṃ dhanahāniṃ ca madhucchannaṃ ca vālmikam /
GP12nardp1_u:12694: ityetatkathitaṃ vipra jyautiṣaṃ te samāsataḥ // NarP_1,56.757 //
GP12nardp1_u:12695: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi cchandaḥ śāstramanuttamam // NarP_1,56.758 //
GP12nardp1_u:12703: sarvago magaṇaḥ prokto mukhalo yagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12704: madhyalo ragaṇaśvaiva prāntyagaḥ sagaṇo mataḥ // NarP_1,57.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:12714: lakṣma bhinnaṃ yasya pādacatuṣke viṣamaṃ hi tat // NarP_1,57.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12718: tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padairgāthāḥ śṛṇu saṃjñā yathottaram // NarP_1,57.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12722: śakkarī sātipūrvā ca aṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛte // NarP_1,57.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12726: pāde sarvagurau pūrvīllaghuṃ sthāpya guroradhaḥ // NarP_1,57.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12729: naṣṭāṅkārddhe same laḥ syādvipam saiva sorddhagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12741: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde saṅkṣiptacchandovarṇanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12755: vīryeṇa saṃmataḥ putro mama bhūyāditi sma ha /
GP12nardp1_u:12758: atiṣṭanmārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,58.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:12764: tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhām // NarP_1,58.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12766: tasnin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkule // NarP_1,58.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:12768: na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānirupajāyate // NarP_1,58.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12772: evaṃ vidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca nārada // NarP_1,58.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12776: yathā khe ca tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati sutastaṃva // NarP_1,58.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:12778: tejasā tasya lokāṃstrīnyaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam // NarP_1,58.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:12779: evaṃ labdhvā varaṃ devo vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12781: atha rūpaṃ paraṃ vipra bibhratīṃ svena tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12785: sā tu kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam /
GP12nardp1_u:12789: sa tu mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12790: na śaśāka niyantuṃ taṃ vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,58.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:12794: śukre nirmathyamāne 'syāṃ śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ // NarP_1,58.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12797: tathā rūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalanniva tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12799: taṃ gaṅgāṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ merupṛṣṭhe svarūpiṇīm /
GP12nardp1_u:12800: abhyetya snāpayāmāsa vāriṇā svena nārada // NarP_1,58.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12808: divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣa ca mārutaḥ // NarP_1,58.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12810: taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ // NarP_1,58.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12813: dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devā vāsāṃsi cābhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12816: āraṇe yastadā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:12818: utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ // NarP_1,58.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12820: bṛhaspatiṃ sa vavre ca vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavit // NarP_1,58.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12824: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12828: na tvasya ramate buddhi rāśrameṣu munīśvara // NarP_1,58.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12832: mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu me // NarP_1,58.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:12834: śṛtvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣiruvāca tam // NarP_1,58.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12837: yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:12838: śataṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam // NarP_1,58.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12840: uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaram // NarP_1,58.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:12841: sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena narādhipaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12843: praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:12844: uktaśca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ tathā gacchetyavismitaḥ // NarP_1,58.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12846: ārjavenaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhāya kṣaṇāttvayā // NarP_1,58.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12847: na draṣṭavyā viśeṣā hi viśeṣā hi prasaṃginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12848: ahṝṅkāro na kartavyo yājye tasminnarādhipe // NarP_1,58.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:12849: sthātavyaṃ vasathe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12852: evamuktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,58.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12866: darśayitvāsane sthāpya rājānaṃ ca vyajijñapat // NarP_1,58.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:12867: śrutvā rājā śukaṃ prāptaṃ vārastrīḥ sa nyayuṅkta ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12868: sevāyai tasya bhāvasya jñānāya munisatama // NarP_1,58.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:12876: krīḍantyaśca hasaṃtyaśca gāyantyaścaiva tāḥ śukam // NarP_1,58.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:12879: dhyānastha eva satataṃ na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12880: pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvā vai śukaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsya ca // NarP_1,58.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12882: pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ // NarP_1,58.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:12884: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtvā śaucamanantaram // NarP_1,58.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12887: tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayāmāsa nārada // NarP_1,58.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12888: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyabhāge śukapralobhanaṃ nāmāṣṭañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12892: puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇyantaḥ purāṇi ca // NarP_1,59.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:12897: pādyaṃ nivedya prathamaṃ sārghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat /
GP12nardp1_u:12898: sa ca tāṃmantrataḥ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ // NarP_1,59.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:12907: tatra tvaṃ gaccha tūrṇaṃ vai sa te hṛdayasaṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12908: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca sarvaṃ chetsyatyasaṃśayam // NarP_1,59.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12912: kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā // NarP_1,59.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12929: kimavaśyaṃ tu vastavyamāśrameṣu na vā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:12934: ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12937: kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate // NarP_1,59.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:12939: āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ hi prathamāśrame // NarP_1,59.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12945: saṃpaśyannaiva lipyeta jale vāricarago yathā // NarP_1,59.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12947: vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvandvaḥ śubhasaṃgataḥ // NarP_1,59.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:12948: atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā /
GP12nardp1_u:12950: jyotiścātmani nānyatra ratnaṃ tatraiva caiva tat /
GP12nardp1_u:12951: svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ taddraṣṭuṃ susamāhitarcatasā // NarP_1,59.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12952: na bibheti paro yasmānna bibheti parācca yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12953: yaśca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate sa tu // NarP_1,59.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:12954: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12nardp1_u:12957: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:12959: tyaktva kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvamaśnute // NarP_1,59.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12960: yadā śrāvye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāvyayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12961: samo bhavati nirdvudvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12962: yadā stuti ca rnidāṃ ca samatvena ca paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12963: kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,59.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:12965: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:12968: tamaḥ parigataṃ veśya yathā dīpena dṛśyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12969: tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣitum // NarP_1,59.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12971: yañcānyadapi vettavyaṃ tattvato vetti tadbhavān // NarP_1,59.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12975: jñānaṃ divyaṃ samādīptaṃ tenāsi vidito vidito mama // NarP_1,59.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12977: adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tañca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase // NarP_1,59.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:12979: utpanne cāpi vijñā ne nādhigacchanti tāṅgatim // NarP_1,59.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12984: nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti vastuṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:12985: nautsukyaṃ nṛtyagīteṣu na rāga upajāyate // NarP_1,59.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12986: na bandhuṣu nibandhaste na bhayeṣvasti te bhayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12988: ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cānye 'pi manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12989: āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārge akṣayaṃ cāpyanāmayam // NarP_1,59.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12996: śaiśiraṃ girimāsādya pārāśaryaṃ dadarśa ca // NarP_1,59.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13003: samāliṅgya sutaṃ vyāsaḥ svapārśvasthaṃ cakāra ca // NarP_1,59.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13004: tataḥ pailādayo viprā vedān vyāsādadhītya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13012: bho bho maharṣe bāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate // NarP_1,60.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13027: divyaṃ te cakṣurutpannaṃ svasthaṃ te niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13028: tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ satye vyavasthitaḥ // NarP_1,60.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13031: dvāvetau pratyayaṃ yātau divaṃ cādhaśca gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13032: pithivyāmantarikṣe ca yataḥ saṃyānti vāyavaḥ // NarP_1,60.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13037: apānaśca tato jajñe prāṇaścāpi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:13039: pṛtharkkṃmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13040: prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuśceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak // NarP_1,60.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13043: prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13045: āvaho nāma so 'bhyeti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan /
GP12nardp1_u:13046: udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvatsomādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ // NarP_1,60.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13052: saṃnīyamānā bahudhā yena nīlā mahāghanāḥ // NarP_1,60.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13054: yo 'sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasā // NarP_1,60.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:13055: caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13056: yena vegavatā rugṇāḥ kriyante tarujā rasāḥ // NarP_1,60.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13057: pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13063: ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyurjīvatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13068: yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśāmantaṃ prapedire // NarP_1,60.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:13071: parīvaho nāma varo vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13072: evamete diteḥ putrā marutaḥ paramādbhutāḥ // NarP_1,60.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13082: tato vyāse gate snātuṃ śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,60.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13084: tatra svādhyāyasaṃsaktaṃ śukaṃ vyāsasutaṃ mune // NarP_1,60.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13086: utthāya satkṛtastena brahmaputro hi kārṣṇinā // NarP_1,60.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13087: tataḥ provāca viprendra śukaṃ vidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13088: kiṃ karoṣi mahābhāga vyāsaputra mahādyute // NarP_1,60.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:13093: tadvadasva mahābhāga yathā ta jjñānamāpnuyām // NarP_1,60.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13096: nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,60.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13099: mānuṣyamasukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati /
GP12nardp1_u:13100: nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṃgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,60.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13104: kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārthamudyatau // NarP_1,60.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13107: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:13108: ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ hitam // NarP_1,60.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13109: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvānsa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13112: ātmabhūtairatadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca // NarP_1,60.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13113: sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo na cireṇādhigacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13115: yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:13117: nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit /
GP12nardp1_u:13128: dvandvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu varāko ramate muniḥ // NarP_1,60.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:13138: alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ // NarP_1,60.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13144: pārakyamadhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte // NarP_1,60.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13146: anarthe kiṃ prasaktastvaṃ svamarthaṃ nānutiṣṭasi // NarP_1,60.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13150: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvāṃ gacchantamanuyāsyataḥ // NarP_1,60.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13151: vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13153: nibandhinī rajjureṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13154: chitvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,60.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13156: na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lohaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava // NarP_1,60.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13160: tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvaṃ nadīṃ taret // NarP_1,60.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13161: tyaktvā dharmamadharmaṃ ca hyubhe satyānṛte tyaja /
GP12nardp1_u:13170: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajastathā // NarP_1,60.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13175: trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkha jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13176: ya idaṃ veda tattvena sasa veda prabhavāpyayau // NarP_1,60.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:13180: loke vihitamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati // NarP_1,60.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:13190: tataḥ karma samādatte punaranyannavaṃ bahu // NarP_1,60.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13196: saṃyamena ca saṃbandhānnivṛttyā tapaso balāt // NarP_1,60.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:13197: samprāptā bahavaḥ siddhiṃ avyābādhāṃ sukhodayām // NarP_1,60.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:13198: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13204: divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam // NarP_1,61.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13211: nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13212: asyābhāvena yujyetaṃ tañcāsya tu nivartate // NarP_1,61.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13213: guṇairbhūtāni yujyante tathaiva ca na yujyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13214: sarvāṇi naitadekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate // NarP_1,61.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13215: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13216: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ mahānarthe prapadyate // NarP_1,61.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13220: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaścābhipravarddhate // NarP_1,61.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13222: etadvijñāya sāmarthyaṃ na vānyaiḥ samatāmiyāt // NarP_1,61.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13224: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāsaṃ na mṛdhyetpaṇḍitaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,61.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13230: sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // NarP_1,61.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:13236: jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimiṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭate // NarP_1,61.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13238: ādityo hyastamabhyeti punaḥ punarudeti ca // NarP_1,61.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13240: iṣṭāniṣṭā manuṣyāṇāṃ mataṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ // NarP_1,61.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13242: yadi syānna parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam // NarP_1,61.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13244: dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ saṃtaḥ prahīnāśca svakarmabhiḥ // NarP_1,61.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13248: vañcanāyāṃ ca lokeṣu sasukheṣveva jīyate // NarP_1,61.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13253: tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati mānavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13258: āyuṣmān jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ piteva saḥ // NarP_1,61.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13266: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhamapyubhayaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,61.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13268: duḥkhamarthā hi tyajyante pālane ca na te sukhāḥ // NarP_1,61.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13270: anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikā narāḥ // NarP_1,61.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13271: atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ santoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13272: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ // NarP_1,61.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13274: anto nāsti pipāsāyāstuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham // NarP_1,61.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13278: bhūteṣu bhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhyā tamasaḥ param // NarP_1,61.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13279: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:13284: śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca paramaṃ tathā // NarP_1,61.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13287: viprayogaśca sarvasya na vācā na ca vidyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:13289: vicaredasamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13293: nainaṃ prajñā suniyataṃ trāyate nāpi pauruṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:13301: kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvamiha paśyasi /
GP12nardp1_u:13302: annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣyāśca bhakṣitāḥ // NarP_1,61.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13305: dhāraṇe vā visarge ca na kartuṃ vidyate 'vaśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13310: garbhasya saha jātasya saptamīmīdṛśīṃ daśām // NarP_1,61.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13311: prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13312: nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,61.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13316: te cāpi vividhā vaidyāḥ kuśalā saṃmatauṣadhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13318: te pibanti kaṣāyāṃśca sarpīṣi vividhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13319: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgairnāgā ivottamāḥ // NarP_1,61.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:13321: śvāpadāśca daridrāśca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te // NarP_1,61.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13323: ākramya roga ādatte paśūnpaśupaco yathā // NarP_1,61.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13325: srotasā mahasā kṣipraṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā // NarP_1,61.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13326: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13327: svabhāvā hyativartante ye nirmuktāḥ śarīriṣu // NarP_1,61.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13329: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tadvartate tathā // NarP_1,61.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13333: apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate // NarP_1,61.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13335: svaṃ svaṃ ca punaranyeṣāṃ na kañcidatigacchati // NarP_1,61.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13339: manujāśca gataśrīkāḥ śataśo vividhāḥ striyāḥ // NarP_1,61.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13341: idamanyatparaṃ paśya nātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi // NarP_1,61.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13342: dharmaṃ cāpi tyajā dharmaṃ tyaja satyānṛtāṃ dhiyam /
GP12nardp1_u:13343: sarvaṃ tyaktvā svarūpasthaḥ sukhī bhava nirāmayaḥ // NarP_1,61.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13345: yena devāḥ parityajya bhartyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,61.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13351: tataḥ pitrā samāgamya praṇamya ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13354: kṣaṇaikaṃ sthīyatāṃ putra iti ca krośa durmanāḥ // NarP_1,61.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13356: mokṣamevānusaṃcitya gata eva paraṃ padam // NarP_1,61.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:13357: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ekaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13361: punaḥ papraccha taṃ vipra śukābhipatanaṃ munim // NarP_1,62.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:13368: kutra te nivasaṃtīha saṃśayo me mahānayam // NarP_1,62.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13373: tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvānādityena virocite // NarP_1,62.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13375: na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo na ca darśanam // NarP_1,62.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13378: prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ samprekṣya bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13386: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13393: tamo hyaṣṭavidhaṃ tyaktvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ // NarP_1,62.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13397: saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte ca rukmarūpyamaye śubhe // NarP_1,62.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13403: na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ // NarP_1,62.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13414: sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ gataṃ śukam /
GP12nardp1_u:13415: śaśaṃsurmunayaḥ siddhā gatiṃ tasmai sutasya tām // NarP_1,62.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13427: so 'nunīto bhagavatā vyāso rudreṇa nārada // NarP_1,62.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13428: kimu tvaṃ tāmyasi mune putraṃ prati samākulaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13429: paśyasi vipra nāyāntaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ nijāntire // NarP_1,62.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13431: śvāśramaṃ sa śuko brahmabhūto lokāṃścacāra ha // NarP_1,62.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13434: tatra dṛṣṭvā tu tau devau tapyamāno mahattapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13435: svayaṃ ca tatra tapasi sthitaḥ śukamanusmaran // NarP_1,62.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13437: śvetadvīpaṃ gatastāta yatra tvamagamaḥ purā // NarP_1,62.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13439: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutivimṛgyo hi devadevo janārdanaḥ // NarP_1,62.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13448: yaṃ bhāntamanubhāntyete lokāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,62.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13475: ṛbhave suvratākhyāya sudhāmne cājitāya ca // NarP_1,62.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13487: ghṛtārciṣe viṣṇave te 'nantāya kapilāyaya ca // NarP_1,62.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13498: vidyāmāpnuhi bhaktiṃ ca jñānī tvaṃ mama rūpadhṛk // NarP_1,62.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13499: yadrūpaṃ mama dṛṣṭaṃ prāk śvetadvīpe tvayā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:13502: varalokānyathā vāyuryathā ravaṃ savitā tathā // NarP_1,62.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13504: bhaktirhi durlabhā loke mayi sarvaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,62.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13508: kartā bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tadadhīṣva bhuvaṃ vraja // NarP_1,62.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13510: tvadviyogena khinnātmā taṃ prasādaya matpriyam // NarP_1,62.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13513: atha taṃ svantike dṛṣṭvā pārāśaryyaḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp1_u:13514: putraṃ prāpya prahṛṣṭātmā tapaso nivavarta ha // NarP_1,62.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13525: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne mokṣadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13536: teṣāṃ samāgame bhadrā kā kathā lokapāvanī // NarP_1,63.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13541: nārado bhārgavaśreṣṭha punaḥ papraccha tānmunīn // NarP_1,63.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13544: samārādhyaḥ sa evātra sarvaiḥ sarvārthakāṅkṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13548: dīkṣaṇaṃ prātarādyaṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syādyattaducyatām // NarP_1,63.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:13550: prīyeta paramātmā vai tadbrūta mama mānadāḥ // NarP_1,63.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13555: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:13560: patistatra śivohyeko jīvāstu paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,63.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:13574: pāśāḥ pañca tathā tatra prathamau malakarmajau // NarP_1,63.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13580: ityetau prathamau cātha māyeyādyān śṛṇudvija // NarP_1,63.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13582: patirjayati sarveṣāmeko bījaṃ vibhuḥ param // NarP_1,63.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13583: manasyati na codeti nivṛttiṃ ca prayacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13584: varvarti dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tattejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ param // NarP_1,63.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13585: śakto mayā harau bhukto paśugaṇasya hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13590: kṛtyaṃ kurvanti tenedaṃ sarvānugrāhakaṃ mune // NarP_1,63.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13598: yatra kriyā hi nyagbhūtā jñānākhyodrekamaśnute // NarP_1,63.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13600: nādo binduśca sakalaḥ sadākhyaṃ tattvamāśritau // NarP_1,63.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13601: vidyeśāḥ punaraiśaṃ tu mantrā vidyābhidhaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13602: imāni caiva tattvāni śuddhādhveti prakīrtitam // NarP_1,63.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13606: tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ tu śivākhyaṃ citraśaktikam // NarP_1,63.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13608: cijjaḍānugrahārthāya kṛtvā rūpāṇi vai prabhuḥ // NarP_1,63.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13610: muktiṃ ca viśveṣāṃ svavyāpāre samarthetām // NarP_1,63.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13618: nityaikā ca śivā śaktyā hyanādinidhanā satī // NarP_1,63.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13619: sādhāraṇī narāṇāṃ vai bhuvanānāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13621: viśvī sūkṣmā parā māyā vikṛtaiḥ parattu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:13622: karmāṇyāvekṣya vidyeśo māyāṃ vikṣobhya śaktibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13624: sṛjatyādo kālatattvaṃ nānāśaktimayī ca sā // NarP_1,63.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:13626: sūte hyanantaraṃ māyā śaktiṃ niyamanātmikām // NarP_1,63.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13628: anantaraṃ ca sā māyā nityā viśvavimohinī // NarP_1,63.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13630: ekatastu nṛṇāṃ yena kalayitvā malaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,63.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13634: pradarśanātha vai puṃso viṣayāṇāṃ ca sā punaḥ // NarP_1,63.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13635: prakāśarūpaṃ vidyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ sūte kalaiva hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13636: vidyā tvāvaraṇaṃ bhitvā jñānaśakteḥ svakarmaṇā // NarP_1,63.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13638: karoti bhogyaṃ yānāsau karaṇena pareṇa vai // NarP_1,63.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:13640: bhogye bhogaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ tatparaṃ karaṇaṃ tu sā // NarP_1,63.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13643: bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca svenaiva vidyākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
GP12nardp1_u:13644: yadyarkavatprakāśā dhīḥ karmatvāñca tathāpi hi // NarP_1,63.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13649: kiṃ ca pradhānacaritaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvaṃ bhavettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13654: yena bhogyāya janitā bhidyaṅge puruṣe punaḥ // NarP_1,63.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13658: kalaiva praścādavyaktaṃ sūte bhogyāya cāsya tu // NarP_1,63.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13661: ādhāro 'pi ca yasteṣāṃ tadavyaktaṃ ca gīyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13662: traya eva guṇā hyaṣāmavyaktādeva saṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,63.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13668: sattvā dviguṇabhedena sa punastrividho bhavet // NarP_1,63.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13670: tatra taijasato jñānendriyāṇi manasā saha // NarP_1,63.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13674: icchārūpaṃ ca saṃkalpavyāpāraṃ tatra vai manaḥ // NarP_1,63.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13676: bahiḥ karaṇabhāvena svocitena yataḥ sadā // NarP_1,63.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13681: jñānendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā /
GP12nardp1_u:13682: grāhyāśca viṣayā hyeṣāṃ jñeyāḥ śabdādayo mune // NarP_1,63.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13686: karaṇāni ca siddhinā na kṛtiḥ karaṇairvinā // NarP_1,63.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13689: tanmātrāṇi tu khavāyustejo 'mbhaḥ kṣmeti pañca vai /
GP12nardp1_u:13692: rūpaṃ triṣu rasaścaiva dvayorgandhaḥ kṣitau tathā // NarP_1,63.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13694: pākaśca saṃgrahaścaiva dhāraṇaṃ ceti kathyate // NarP_1,63.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:13696: bhāsvadagnau jale śuklaṃ kṣitau śuklādyanekadhā // NarP_1,63.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:13697: rūpaṃ triṣu rasoṃ'bhaḥ su madhuraḥ ṣaḍidhaḥ kṣitau /
GP12nardp1_u:13700: bhūtasya tu viśeṣo 'yaṃ viśeṣarahitaṃ tu tat // NarP_1,63.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:13706: hṛdi paṅktau dṛśoḥ pitte tejastaddharmadarśanāt // NarP_1,63.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:13712: deheṣu karmavaśataḥ sarveṣu vicaranti hi // NarP_1,63.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13724: bindurekaḥ praviśati yadā garbhe dvayātmakaḥ // NarP_1,63.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:13731: evaṃ tatra sthito garbhe prāgjanmotthaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:13736: tataḥ krameṇa sa śiśurvardhamāno dinedine // NarP_1,63.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:13741: āhāraścaiva nidrā ca bhayaṃ maithunameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13742: paśvādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇamitīritam // NarP_1,63.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:13750: yajate śivaṃ mantraiśca ravapareṣāṃ hitāya saḥ // NarP_1,63.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:13760: yo yasminnāśrame tiṣṭandīkṣāṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // NarP_1,63.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:13762: kṛtānyapi na karmāṇi bandhanāya bhavanti hi // NarP_1,63.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:13766: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ dīkṣāṃ prāpya yo nācarennaraḥ // NarP_1,63.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:13775: kṛte 'pi viphalaṃ tasya prāyaścittaṃ pade pade /
GP12nardp1_u:13776: kāyena manasā vācā gurubhaktiparasya ca // NarP_1,63.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:13780: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13785: divyaṃ bhāvaṃ yato dadyātkṣiṇuyā dduritāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13786: ato dīkṣeti sā proktā sarvāgamaviśāradaiḥ // NarP_1,64.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13790: strīmantrāstu dviṭhāntāḥ syuḥ puṃmantrā huṃphaḍantakāḥ // NarP_1,64.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13792: pundaivatāstu mantrā syurvidyāḥ strīdaivatā matāḥ // NarP_1,64.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:13796: agnīṣomātmakā hyevaṃ mantrā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,64.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13798: saumayāścaiva prabudhyante vāme vahati māruteḥ // NarP_1,64.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13803: japto yadi sa vai devaṃ prabuddhaḥ kṣiprasiddhidaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13804: anayā mālayā japto duṣṭamantro 'pi siddhyati // NarP_1,64.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13805: krūre karmāṇi cāgneyāḥ saumyāḥ saumya phalapradāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13814: kumāro 'tha yuvā prauḍho vṛddho nistriṃśakastathā // NarP_1,64.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13821: doṣā hyete samākhyātā vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13822: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā tridhā vā svarasaṃyutam // NarP_1,64.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13824: caturddhā pañcadhā vāpi sa mantraśchinnasaṃjñakaḥ // NarP_1,64.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13826: sa tu ruddho manujñeyo hyatiklaśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13830: asau parāṅmukho jñeyo bhajatāṃ cirasiddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13832: sa mantro badhiraḥ proktaḥ kaṣṭenālpaphalapradaḥ // NarP_1,64.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13834: netrahīnastu vijñeyaḥ kleśenāpi na siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13836: haṃseṃdurvā sakāro vā phakāro varma vā puna // NarP_1,64.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13837: māprā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13838: evaṃ madhye dvayaṃ mūrghni yasminnasralakārakau // NarP_1,64.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13839: na vidyete sa mantrastu staṃbhitaḥ siddhirodhakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:13840: agniḥ pavanasaṃyukto manoryasya tu mūrddhani // NarP_1,64.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13841: sa sārṇo dṛśyate yastu sa mantro dagdhasaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13843: trastaḥ sa mantro vijñeyo mukhe tāravivarjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13844: hakāraḥ śaktirathavā bhīto mantraḥ sa eva hi // NarP_1,64.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:13846: malinastu sa vijñeyo hyatikleśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13847: dārṇo yasya manormadhye mūrdhni krodhayugaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13848: asraṃ cāsti sa mantrastu tiraskṛta udīritaḥ // NarP_1,64.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13851: tryakṣaro haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ kīrtitastu saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13854: yasya madhye sthitaṃ cāsraṃ sa mantro mūrcchitaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13856: mantrasyādau ca madhye ca mūrdhni cāsracatuṣṭayam // NarP_1,64.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13857: jñātavyo bhrānta ityeṣa yaḥ syādaṣṭā daśākṣaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13858: punarviśativarṇo vā yo mantraḥ smarasaṃyutaḥ // NarP_1,64.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13866: śikhā varma ca yasyānte netramasraṃ ca dṛśyate // NarP_1,64.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13867: śiva śaktyārṇahīno vā nirbījaḥ sa manuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13869: sa manuḥ siddhihīnaḥ syānmandaḥ paṅktyakṣaro manuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13870: kūṭa ekākṣaro mantraḥ sa evokto niraṃśakaḥ // NarP_1,64.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13872: ṣaḍvarṇo bījahīno vā sārddhasaptākṣaro 'pi vā // NarP_1,64.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13876: yo mantro dantavarṇastu mohitaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,64.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13878: kṣudhārtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mantrasiddhivivarjitaḥ // NarP_1,64.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13882: ekona triṃśadarṇo vā mantro hīnāṅgakaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13886: vrīḍitaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakarmasu na kṣamaḥ // NarP_1,64.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13889: ye mantrāste tu vijñeyāḥ sthānabhraṣṭā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:13890: trayodaśārṇā ye mantrāstithyarṇāśca tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,64.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13892: śataṃ sārddhaśataṃ vāpi śatadvayamathāpi vā // NarP_1,64.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13894: ye mantrā varṇasaṃkhyākā niḥsnehāste prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,64.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13898: tadvarddhvaṃ caiva ye mantrāḥ stotrarūpāstu te smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,64.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13899: evaṃ vidhāḥ samākhyātā manavo doṣa saṃyutāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13904: yaṃ kañcidapi vā mantraṃ tasya syuḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ // NarP_1,64.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13905: savyapāṣṇi gude sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ ca dhvajopari /
GP12nardp1_u:13908: tadagre sarahasyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi nārada // NarP_1,64.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13911: suṃdaraḥ sumukhaḥ śāntaḥ kulīnaḥ sulabho vaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:13914: tattvaniṣkāsane dakṣo vinayī ca suveṣavān // NarP_1,64.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:13923: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde catuḥṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13941: catuṣke cettadā pūrvaṃ yatra nāmākṣaraṃ sthitam // NarP_1,65.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13945: tadā pūrvoktarītyā tu kramāddveyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,65.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13947: turīye ceñcatuṣke tu tadaivaṃ gaṇayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,65.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13957: anye 'pyatra prakārā hi saṃti vai bahavoṃ mune // NarP_1,65.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13959: evaṃ saṃśodhya mantraṃ tu śuddhe kāle sthale tathā // NarP_1,65.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:13964: kṛtvā svasti vidhānaṃ tu maṇḍalādi ca tuṣṭimān /
GP12nardp1_u:13965: guruḥ śiṣyeṇa sahitaḥ śuciryāgagṛhaṃ viśet // NarP_1,65.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13972: tatra saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra bhānoḥ kalāṃ yajet /
GP12nardp1_u:13977: vahnerdaśa kalāḥ proktāḥ procyante 'tha raveḥ kalāḥ // NarP_1,65.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13979: suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // NarP_1,65.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13980: athendrośca kalā jñeyā hyamṛtā mānadā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13981: pūṣā tuṣṭiśca puṣṭiśca ratiśca dhṛtisaṃjñikāḥ // NarP_1,65.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13991: vedyāṃ saṃveśya saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇīsthena vāriṇā // NarP_1,65.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13993: nyāsajālena saṃśodhya mūrdhni vinyasya pallavān // NarP_1,65.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13998: atha śiṣyasya śirasi hastaṃ datvā gurustataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14001: tataḥ sacandanaṃ hastaṃ datvā śiṣyasya mastake // NarP_1,65.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14013: raviṃ śivāṃ śivaṃ caiva yadā madhye tu śaṅkaram // NarP_1,65.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14014: raviṃ gaṇeśamaṃbāṃ ca hariṃ cātha yadā śivām /
GP12nardp1_u:14016: śivaṃ śivāṃ raviṃ viṣṇuṃ ravau madhyagate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14017: gaṇeṣaṃ viṣṇumaṃbāṃ ca śivaṃ ceti yathākramam // NarP_1,65.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14019: brāhme muhūrtte hyutthāya kṛtvācā vaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,65.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:14035: tatpadaṃ darśitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14037: cakṣurunmīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14039: yasya vāgamṛtaṃ hṝnti viṣaṃ saṃsārasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,65.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14041: oṃ namaste nātha bhagavān śivāya gururūpiṇe // NarP_1,65.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14053: iti stutvā tataḥ sarva gurave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14055: yatkaromi jagannātha tadastu tava pūjanam // NarP_1,65.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14073: prātaḥ samutthāya tava priyārthaṃ saṃsārayātrāṃ tvanuvartayiṣye // NarP_1,65.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14077: ajapākhyāṃ tu gāyatrīṃ jīvojapati sarvadā // NarP_1,65.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14081: nirābhāsaśca dharmaśca jñānaṃ ceti tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,65.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14097: saśriye ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca viṣṇave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:14109: praramādye ca gurave sahasraṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14115: brahmaivāhaṃ na saṃsārī nityamukto na śokabhāk // NarP_1,65.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:14119: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde pañcaṣaṣṭimo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14125: iti bhūmiṃ tu saṃprārthya vihareñca yathāvidhi // NarP_1,66.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14127: gacchantu ṛṣayo devāḥ piśācā ye ca guhyakāḥ // NarP_1,66.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14129: iti tālatrayaṃ datvā śiraḥ prāvṛtya vāsasā // NarP_1,66.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14131: malaṃ visṛjya saucaṃ tu mṛdādbhiḥ samupācaret // NarP_1,66.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:14132: ekā liṅge gude tisro daśa vāmakare mṛdaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14133: karayoḥ sapta vai dadyātritrivaraṃ ca pādayoḥ // NarP_1,66.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14136: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14137: śriyaṃ prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dehi vanaspate // NarP_1,66.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14143: devāgāraṃ tato gatvā nirmālyamapasārya ca // NarP_1,66.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14145: asreṇa pātraṃ saṃprokṣya mūlena jvālayeñca tam // NarP_1,66.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:14149: iti nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā nijeśvaram // NarP_1,66.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:14151: gatvā tīrthaṃ namaskṛtya snānīyaṃ ca nidhāya vai // NarP_1,66.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14155: praviśya nābhimātre tu mṛdaṃ vāmakarasya ca // NarP_1,66.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:14156: maṇibandhe hastatale tadagre ca tathā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14159: talasthāṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tanmantraiḥ pravilepayet // NarP_1,66.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14164: dhārāṃ ca brahmarandhreṇa praviśantīṃ nijāṃ tanum /
GP12nardp1_u:14167: tataḥ śrautoktavidhinā snātvā mantrī samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,66.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:14171: brahmāṇḍodaratīrthāni karaiḥ spṛṣṭāni te raveḥ // NarP_1,66.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14172: tena satyena me deva dehi tīrthaṃ divākara // NarP_1,66.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:14173: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:14180: mūlena caikādaśadhā tatra saṃmantrya bhāvayet // NarP_1,66.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:14186: iti natvā samārundhya saptacchidrāṇi sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,66.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14190: catvāro manavaste 'tra kathyante tāntrikā mune // NarP_1,66.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14192: mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāmāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:14194: kṣālayanti ca tāṃ sparśādāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:14195: yanme keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yañca mūrddhani /
GP12nardp1_u:14198: santoṣaḥ kṣāntirāstikyaṃ vidyā bhavatu vo namaḥ // NarP_1,66.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14200: pibeddhiruddhaṃ no kuryādeṣāṃ tu niyato vidhiḥ // NarP_1,66.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14201: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni dakṣāṅghrau tāni bhūsure /
GP12nardp1_u:14206: athavā bhasmanā snāto rajobhiścaiva vākṣamaḥ // NarP_1,66.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14207: atha sandhyādikaṃ kuryān sthitvā caivāsane śubhe /
GP12nardp1_u:14208: keśavena tathā nārāyaṇena mādhavena ca // NarP_1,66.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14218: hariṇā viṣṇunāṃsau ca vaiṣṇavācamanaṃ tvidam // NarP_1,66.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14227: tilakaṃ ca tataḥ kuryādbhāle suṣṭhu gadākṛti /
GP12nardp1_u:14228: nandakaṃ hṛdaye śaṅkhacakre caiva bhujadvaye // NarP_1,66.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:14230: karṇamūle pārśvayośca pṛṣṭe nābhau kakudyapi // NarP_1,66.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14232: agnihotrodbhavaṃ bhasma gṛhītvā tryaṃbakeṇa tu // NarP_1,66.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14236: śaivaṃ śāktastrikoṇā bhaṃ nārīvadvā samācaret // NarP_1,66.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14237: kṛtvā tu vaidikīṃ saṃdhyāṃ tāntrikīṃ ca samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:14248: prakṣālyāntargataṃ tena kalmaṣaṃ tajjalaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14252: tataśca hastau prakṣālya prāgvadācamya mantravit // NarP_1,66.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14256: dattvārghaṃ triranenātha devaṃ ravigataṃ smaret // NarP_1,66.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14263: varaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca dadhānāṃ nṛkaroṭikām /
GP12nardp1_u:14269: gurupaṅktiṃ ca saṃtarpyaṃ sāṃgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14272: viṣvaksena ca śaileyaṃ vaiṣṇavaḥ paritarpayet // NarP_1,66.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14273: evaṃ saṃtarpya viprendra dattvārdhyaṃ ca vivasvate /
GP12nardp1_u:14278: sarasvatīṃ vāmabhāge dakṣe vighneśvaraṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:14279: kṣetrapālaṃ tathā vāme dakṣe gaṅgāṃ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14280: vāme ca yamunāṃ dakṣe dhātāraṃ vāmatastathā // NarP_1,66.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:14286: vṛṣabhaśca mahākālaḥ śaivā vai dvārapālakāḥ // NarP_1,66.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:14287: brāhmayādyā mātaro 'ṣṭau tu śaktyo dvāḥsthitāḥ svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:14288: seṃduḥ svanāmāgharṇādyā ṅenamoṃtā ime smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,66.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:14296: śrīdharo medhayā yukto hṛṣīkiśaśca harṣayā // NarP_1,66.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14301: śārṅgī tu prabhayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī yuktastu satyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:14304: pāśī virajayā yukto kuśī viśvāsamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14306: nindī smṛtyā samāyukto naro vṛddhyā samanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14308: kṛṣṇo buddhyā yutaḥ satyo bhuktyā muktyātha sātvataḥ // NarP_1,66.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:14312: balī tu parayā yukto balānujaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,66.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:14314: haṃsaḥ prabhāsamāyukto varāho niśayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14315: vimalo dhārayā yukto nṛsiṃho vidyutā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14317: amṛtādyā ca gāyatrī chando viṣṇuśca devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:14324: eka maulau mukhe caika dvika netre dvikaṃ śrutau // NarP_1,66.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14325: nasordvayaṃ kapole ca dvayaṃ dve dviradacchade /
GP12nardp1_u:14326: ekaṃ tu rasanāmūle grīvāyāmekameva ca // NarP_1,66.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14328: ṭatavargauṃ pādayostu paphau kuṅkṣidvaye nyaset // NarP_1,66.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:14329: pṛṣṭhavaṃśe vamityuktaṃ nābhau bhaṃ hṛdaye tu mam /
GP12nardp1_u:14330: yādisaptāpi dhātusthā haṃ prāṇe laṃ tathātmani // NarP_1,66.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:14331: kṣaṃ krodhe kramato nyasya viṣṇu pūjākṣamo bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:14332: pūrṇodaryā tu śrīkaṇṭho hyananto vijarānvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:14339: akrūra āsyayā yukto mahāseno vidyayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14356: śvetorasko vidāriṇyā bhṛguḥ sahajayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14359: yatra svīśapadaṃ noktaṃ tatra sarvatra yojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14362: halo bījāni coktāni svarāḥ śaktaya īritāḥ // NarP_1,66.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:14368: vighneśaśca hriyā yukto vighnarājaḥ śriyā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14372: kāntyā yukto dvidantastu kāminyā gajavakrakaḥ // NarP_1,66.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14389: muṃhī subhagayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī durbhagayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14396: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni tataḥ smaret // NarP_1,66.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14398: patnyāśliṣṭaṃ raktatanuṃ trinetraṃ gaṇape bhavet // NarP_1,66.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:14400: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistatedhikāḥ // NarP_1,66.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14401: dīpikā recikā cāpi mocikā ca parābhidhā /
GP12nardp1_u:14404: smṛtirmedhā tataḥ kāntirlakṣmīrddhṛtiḥ sthirā sthitiḥ // NarP_1,66.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:14406: kāmiko varadā vātha hlādinī prītisaṃyutā // NarP_1,66.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:14407: dīrghā tīkṣṇā tathā raudrā proktā nidrā ca tandrikā /
GP12nardp1_u:14408: kṣudhā ca krodhinī paścākriyākārī samṛtyukā // NarP_1,66.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:14419: namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ huṃ vauṣaṭ phaṭ jātaya īritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14422: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saṃdhyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14426: trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ vā vāmabhāge prakalpya ca // NarP_1,67.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:14427: sampūjyā sreṇa saṃkṣālya hṛdādhāraṃ nidhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14428: tatrāgnimaṇḍalaṃ cedvā pātraṃ saṃkṣālya cāsrataḥ // NarP_1,67.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14441: netraṃ madhye dikṣu cāsraṃ trikoṇe pūjayettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14449: tāraḥ kārṃmamahāṃste tu tato jalacarāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14450: varma phaṭ hṛdayaṃ pāñcajanyāya hṛdayaṃ maneḥ // NarP_1,67.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14462: cintayitveṣṭadevaṃ ca tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet // NarP_1,67.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14465: gāruḍī gālinī caiva mukhye mudre prakīrtite /
GP12nardp1_u:14479: jātīphalaṃ ca kaṅkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca jalānvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14486: vidhinā sthāpitāyāṃ vā pratimāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,67.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14488: nirmitā śubhadā gehe pūjanāya dine dine // NarP_1,67.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:14489: vakrāṃ dagdhāṃ khaṇḍitāṃ ca bhinnamūrddhadṛśaṃ punanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14490: spaṣṭāṃ vāpya ntyajādyaiśca pratimāṃ naiva pūjayet // NarP_1,67.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14492: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya dhyātvā devaṃ yathoditam // NarP_1,67.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14498: taveyaṃ hi mahāmūrtistasyāṃ tvāṃ sarvagaṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14503: sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru tasyāṃ tvaṃ bhaktānugrāhakāraka // NarP_1,67.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14507: mūrtauṃ vā yajñasaṃpūrtyai sthito bhava maheśvara // NarP_1,67.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:14509: svatejaḥ pañjareṇāśu veṣṭito bhava sarvataḥ // NarP_1,67.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14511: tasmai te parameśāya svāgataṃ svāgataṃ ca me // NarP_1,67.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14515: tasmai me paraṇābjāya pādyaṃ śuddhāya kalpyate // NarP_1,67.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14521: madhuparkamidaṃ deva kalpayāmi prasīda me // NarP_1,67.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14528: sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi yathāśaktyādareṇa ca // NarP_1,67.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:14535: tailādidūṣitaṃ jīrṇaṃ sacchidraṃ malinaṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14537: yajñasūtrāya tasmai te yajñasūtraṃ prakalpaye // NarP_1,67.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14541: gṛhāṇa parama gandha kṛpayā parameśvara // NarP_1,67.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:14545: ketakīṃ kuṭajaṃ kundaṃ bandhūkaṃ kesaraṃ japām /
GP12nardp1_u:14548: śaktau dūrvārkamandārān gaṇeśe tulasīṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14552: kadalī badarī dhātrī tintiṇī bījapūrakam // NarP_1,67.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14554: eteṣāṃ tu phalaiḥ kuryāddevatāpūjanaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,67.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14555: śuṣkaistu nārcayeddevaṃ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairapi // NarP_1,67.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14557: chinnabhinnānyapi mune na dūṣyāṇi jagurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:14559: sarvadā tulasī śuddhā bilvapatrāṇi vai tathā // NarP_1,67.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14565: āghreyaṃ devadeveśa dhūpaṃ bhaktyā gṛhāma me // NarP_1,67.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:14568: annaṃ caturvidhaṃ svādu rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14569: bhaktyā gṛhāṇa me deva naivedyantuṣṭidaṃsadā // NarP_1,67.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:14574: saiva prācī tu vijñeyā tato 'nyā vidiśo daśa // NarP_1,67.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14589: idro vahniryamo rakṣo varuṇaḥ pavano vidhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14592: vājī vṛṣo haṃsakūrmauṃ vāhanāni vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:14593: vajraṃ śaktiṃ daṇḍakhaḍgau pāśāṃ kuśagadā api /
GP12nardp1_u:14598: dakṣiṇe sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā tatra saṃskāramācaret // NarP_1,67.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14606: devaṃ saṃyojayenmūrtauṃ tato vahniṃ visarjayet // NarP_1,67.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14608: karmāntare 'pi saṃprāpte sānnidhyaṃ kuru sādaram // NarP_1,67.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14616: ityaṣṭadikṣu datvā ca punarbhūtabaliṃ caret // NarP_1,67.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14625: japtvā mantraṃ yathāśakti devatāyai nivedayet // NarP_1,67.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:14627: siddhirbhavatu me deva tvatprasādāttvayi sthitā // NarP_1,67.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14628: tataḥ parāṅmukhaṃ cārghaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14630: manasā vacasā ceti praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ // NarP_1,67.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14631: bāhubhyāṃ ca sajānubhyāṃ śirasā vacasāpi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:14638: vācā hastābhyāṃ ca padbhyā mudareṇa tataḥ param // NarP_1,67.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:14640: tatsarvaṃ ca tato brahmarpaṇaṃ bhavatu ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,67.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:14641: māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ viṣṇave ca samarpaye /
GP12nardp1_u:14649: tatsarvaṃ tāvakī pūjā bhūyādbhūtyai ca me prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14652: anyathā śaraṇaṃ nāsti tvameva śaraṇaṃ mama // NarP_1,67.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:14655: dāso 'yamiti māṃ matvā kṣamasva jagatāṃ pate /
GP12nardp1_u:14656: āvāhanaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmi visarjanam // NarP_1,67.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:14657: pūjāṃ caiva na jānāmi tvaṃ gatiḥ parameśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:14658: saṃprārthyaivaṃ tato mantrī mūlānte ślokamuñcaret // NarP_1,67.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:14659: gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ jagadīśa jaganmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:14660: yanna brahmādayo devā jānanti ca sadāśivaḥ // NarP_1,67.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14662: nidhāya devaṃ sāṃgaṃ ca svīyadṛtsarasīruhe // NarP_1,67.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:14669: agrāhyaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam // NarP_1,67.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:14671: pūjā pañcavidhā tatra kathitā nāradākhilaiḥ // NarP_1,67.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14672: āturī sautikī trāsī sādhanā bhāvinī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14673: daurbodhī ca kramādāsāṃ lakṣaṇāni śṛṇuṣaava me // NarP_1,67.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:14674: rogādiyukto na srāyānna japenna ca pūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14675: vilokya pūjāṃ devasya mūrtiṃ vā sūryyamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,67.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14677: roge nivṛtte snātvātha natvā saṃpūñcedgurum // NarP_1,67.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:14679: pūjāvicchedadoṣo me māstviti prārthayecca tam // NarP_1,67.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:14680: dvijānapi ca saṃpūjya yathāśaktyā pratoṣya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14683: sūtakaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ jātākhyaṃ mṛtasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,67.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:14684: tatra snātvā mānasīṃ tu kṛtvā saṃdhyāṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14686: nivṛtte sūtake prāgvatsaṃpūjya ca guruṃ dvijān /
GP12nardp1_u:14688: eṣā tu sautikī proktā trāsī cātha nigadyate /
GP12nardp1_u:14692: puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ phalairvāpi manasā vā yajedvibhum /
GP12nardp1_u:14693: sādhanābhāvinī hyeṣā daurbodhīṃ śṛṇu nārada // NarP_1,67.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:14694: striyo vṛddhā stathā bālā mūrkhāstaistu yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:14695: yathājñānakṛtā sā tu daurbodhīti prakīrtitā // NarP_1,67.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:14697: devapūjāvihīno yaḥ sa gacchennarakaṃ dhruvam // NarP_1,67.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:14699: deve niveditaṃ paścādbhuñjīta svagaṇaiḥ svayam // NarP_1,67.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14703: na sāṃgaśayikaṃ tasya durmaterjāyate phalam // NarP_1,67.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14704: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde devapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭittamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14712: sarvānte janamuñcārya tato me vaśamānaya // NarP_1,68.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14717: ṛṣiṃ śirasi vakre tu chandaśca hṛdi devatām /
GP12nardp1_u:14718: guhye bījaṃ padoḥ śaktiṃ nyasetsādhakasattamaḥ // NarP_1,68.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14719: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena yaṃ ca bījādinā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14722: gāmādyaṃ caiva bhūrlokaṃ nābhyantaṃ pādayornyaset // NarP_1,68.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14723: gīmādyaṃ ca bhuvarlokaṃ kaṇṭhāntaṃ nābhito nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:14728: kṣāntaṃ vinyasya mūlena vyāpakaṃ racayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,68.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14732: bhāladeśe mukhe kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhyūrujānuṣu // NarP_1,68.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14736: tanno dantiḥ pracovarṇā dayāditi vadetpunaḥ // NarP_1,68.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14738: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyedevaṃ hṛdaṃbuje // NarP_1,68.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:14748: bhūpuraṃ tadbahiḥ kṛtvā gameśaṃ tatra pūjayet // NarP_1,68.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:14750: agrā tejovatī satyā navamī vidhnanāśinī // NarP_1,68.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14755: śriyaṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ caiva gaurīṃ gaurī patiṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14756: ratiṃ ratipatiṃ pāścānmahīpūrva ca potriṇam // NarP_1,68.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14774: keśareṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni patreṣvaṣṭau tu mātaraḥ // NarP_1,68.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14784: godugdhena gavāṃ lābho dadhnā sarvasamṛddhimān // NarP_1,68.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14786: vāsāṃsi labhate hutvā kusuṃbhakusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,68.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14788: mūlenādau caturvāraṃ pratyekaṃ ca pratarpayet // NarP_1,68.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14792: devena sahitāṃ śaktiṃ śaktyā ca sahitaṃ tu tam // NarP_1,68.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14806: ardhyaṃ dadyāttu mūlānte ṅeṃte gaṇapatiṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,68.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:14808: stutvā natvā visṛjyātha yajeccandramasaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:14812: evaṃ vrataṃ yaḥ kurute samyaksaṃvatsarāvadhi // NarP_1,68.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:14816: evaṃ kṛte 'pi pūrvoktaṃ phalamāpnoti niścitam // NarP_1,68.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14822: dyūte vivāde samare vyavahāre jayaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14823: bījaṃ varāho binddhāḍhyau manvindvānnau kalau tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14830: padaiḥ sarvaṇa mantreṇa pañcāṅgāni prakalpayet // NarP_1,68.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14836: vakratuṇḍābhidho bījaṃ vaṃ śaktiḥ kavacaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14838: kṛtvā ṣaḍaṅgamantrārṇānbhrūmadhye ca gale hṛdi // NarP_1,68.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14839: nāmau liṅge pade nyasyākhilena vyāpakaṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:14844: mūrtiṃ mūrtena saṃkalpya tasyāmāvāhya pūjayet // NarP_1,68.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:14846: yajedvidyāṃ vidhātrīṃ ca bhogadāṃ vipraghātinīm // NarP_1,68.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:14854: brahmacārī haviṣyāśī satyavāk ca jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,68.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14856: dāridṣaṃ tu parābhūya jāyate dhanadopamaḥ // NarP_1,68.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:14858: aṣṭottaraśataṃ nityaṃ hutvā prāgvatphalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.76/
GP12nardp1_u:14860: apūpairvatsare sa syātsamṛddheḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,68.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:14862: haviṣā pā yasānnena naivedyaṃ parikalpayet // NarP_1,68.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14869: vacāṃ niṣkārddhabhāgaṃ ca tadarddhaṃ vā manuṃ japet /
GP12nardp1_u:14870: viśodhya cūrṇaṃ prasṛtau gavāṃ mūtre vinikṣipet // NarP_1,68.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:14886: sakalaṃ pravadedevaṃ kumārī vā kumārakaḥ // NarP_1,68.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:14888: anye 'pi mantrā devarṣe santi tantre gaṇeśituḥ // NarP_1,68.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:14889: kintvatra yanna sādhyaṃ syātrriṣu lokeṣu sādhakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14892: śaṭhebhyaḥ paraśiṣyebhyo vañcakebhyo 'pi mā vada // NarP_1,68.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14895: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde gaṇeśamantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14903: devabhāgo muniśchando gāyatrī devatā raviḥ // NarP_1,69.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14905: satyāya hṛdayaṃ paścādbrahmaṇe śira īritam // NarP_1,69.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14908: netro jvālā mano huṃ phaṭsvāhāntā manavo gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14909: punaḥ ṣaḍarṇairhrī lakṣmyāḥ kṛtvāntaḥ sthaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgakam // NarP_1,69.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14911: ādityaṃ ca raviṃ paścādbhānuṃ bhāskarameva ca // NarP_1,69.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:14912: sūryaṃ ca mūrdhni vadane hṛdi guhye ca pādayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14933: bhrūmadhye ca tathā bhāle brahmaraṅghre nyasetkramāt // NarP_1,69.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:14941: prathamaṃ pīṭhayajane dharmādīnāṃ sthale yajet // NarP_1,69.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14945: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā // NarP_1,69.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:14948: svarā bījāni śaktīnāṃ tadādyāḥ pūjayettuḥ tāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14953: navārṇāya ca manave mūrtiṃ saṃkalpayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,69.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:14956: saṃpūjya madhye vādityaṃ raviṃ bhānuṃ ca bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:14959: uṣāṃ prajñāṃ prabhāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tato brahmādikānyajet // NarP_1,69.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14960: purato 'ruṇamabhyarcya somaṃ jñaṃ ca guruṃ bhṛgum /
GP12nardp1_u:14965: samāhito dineśāya dadyādardhyaṃ dine dine // NarP_1,69.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14967: vidhāya maṇḍalaṃ bhānoḥ pīṭhaṃ pūrvavadarcayet // NarP_1,69.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14973: kuṅkumaṃ rojanāṃ rājīṃ candanaṃ raktacandanam // NarP_1,69.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14979: sudhābījaṃ candanena dakṣe karatale likhet // NarP_1,69.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14984: dṛṣṭiṃ cādhāya manasā pūjayitvā raviṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14985: sādhakena svakaikyena mūlamantraṃ dhiyā japan // NarP_1,69.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14987: dattvā puṣpāñjaliṃ bhūyo japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // NarP_1,69.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:14989: tena tuṣṭo dineśo 'smai dadyādvittaṃ yaśaḥ sukham // NarP_1,69.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14995: evaṃ manuṃ japanvipro duḥkhaṃ naivāpnuyātkvacit // NarP_1,69.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:15003: chandaḥ paṅktistu somo 'sya devatā parikīrtitā // NarP_1,69.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:15012: rohiṇī kṛttikā caiva revatī bharaṇī puraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15013: rātrirārdrā tato jyetsnā kalā hārasamaprabhā // NarP_1,69.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:15027: paścime maṇḍale sthitvā pūjādravyaṃ ca madhyame // NarP_1,69.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:15057: ityeka rviśatiḥ proktā mūrtayo bhūsutasya vai // NarP_1,69.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:15068: ācamya deśakālau ca smṛtvā kāmya samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:15071: dharātmajaṃ nasorakṣṇoḥ kujaṃ bhaumaṃ lalāṭake // NarP_1,69.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:15073: aṅgārakaṃ śikhāyāṃ ca sarvāṅge ca mahīsutam // NarP_1,69.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:15078: nābhau hṛdi śirasyāraṃ vakre bhūmijameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:15085: trikoṇeṣu ca sampūjya bahiraṣṭau ca mātṛkāḥ // NarP_1,69.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:15090: maṅgalāya tato mantrī idaṃ mantradvayaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,69.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:15092: sutārthinī prapannā tvāṃ gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15094: mahīsuta mahābhāga gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:15098: kumāraṃ śaktihastaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ praṇamāmyaham // NarP_1,69.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:15108: saubhāgyasukhado nityaṃ bhava me dharaṇīsuta // NarP_1,69.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:15114: āpnuvanti śivaṃ sarve sadā pūrṇamanorathāḥ // NarP_1,69.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15116: prāpnuvanti sukhaṃ tasmai namo dharaṇisūnave // NarP_1,69.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15118: pūjitaḥ sukhasaubhāgyaṃ tasmai kṣmāsūnave namaḥ // NarP_1,69.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:15137: bhaumasyaiṣā tu gāyatrī japtuḥ sarveṣṭasiddhidā // NarP_1,69.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:15139: phaāntaḥ karṇendusaṃyukto budho ṅeṃte hadantimaḥ // NarP_1,69.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:15141: paṅktiśchaido devatā tu budhaḥ sarveṣṭado nṛṇām // NarP_1,69.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:15143: vande budhaṃ sadā bhaktyā pītāmbaravibhūṣaṇam // NarP_1,69.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:15150: tasyāśu grahajā pīḍā naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15159: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena ghṛtenānnena vā hunet // NarP_1,69.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:15161: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayediṣṭamātmanaḥ // NarP_1,69.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:15165: sa viṃśatiśataṃ śīghraṃ vāsāṃsi labhate mahīm // NarP_1,69.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:15167: vasraṃ me dehi śukrāya ṭhadvayānto dhruvādikaḥ // NarP_1,69.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:15169: daityejyo devatā bījaṃ dhruvaḥ śaktirvasupriyā // NarP_1,69.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:15173: ayutaṃ prajapenmantraṃ daśāṃśaṃ juhuyād ghṛtaiḥ // NarP_1,69.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:15177: manavo 'mo sadā gopyā na deyā yasya kasyacit // NarP_1,69.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15178: bhaktiyuktāya śiṣyāya deyā vā nijasūnave // NarP_1,69.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:15179: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde mantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:15187: aṣṭākṣaro manuścāsya sādhyo nārāyaṇo muniḥ // NarP_1,70.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:15188: chandaḥ proktaṃ ca gāyatrī devatā viṣṇukhyayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15189: oṃ bījaṃ yaṃ ca tathā śaktirviniyogo 'khilāptaye // NarP_1,70.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:15191: vīrolkāya śikhā proktā dyulkāya kavacaṃ matam // NarP_1,70.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:15201: gale nābhau hṛdi kucapārśvapṛṣṭeṣu tatparāḥ // NarP_1,70.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:15211: athavā vai namontena nyasedityapare jaguḥ // NarP_1,70.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:15216: pāde liṅge hṛdi mukhe mūrdhni vakṣasi hṛtsthale /
GP12nardp1_u:15227: kakudyapi nyasenmantrī mūrtīrdvādaśa vai kramāt // NarP_1,70.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:15228: dhātrā tu keśavaṃ nyasyāryamṇa nārāyaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15229: mitreṇa mādhavaṃ nyasya govindaṃ varuṇena ca // NarP_1,70.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:15232: vāmanaṃ ca tathādraṇa pūṣṇā śrīdharameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:15234: tvaṣṭrā yutaṃ padmanābhaṃ dāmodaraṃ ca viṣṇunā /
GP12nardp1_u:15235: dvādasārṇaṃ tato mantraṃ samaste śirasi nyaset // NarP_1,70.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:15239: pītāṃbarānte śrīvatsāṃ kitavakṣaḥ sthaleti ca // NarP_1,70.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:15243: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ vibhum // NarP_1,70.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:15249: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa svātmaśuddhirbhaved dhruvam // NarP_1,70.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:15253: tathā ca nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pañcalakṣajapādbhavet // NarP_1,70.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:15257: evaṃ japtvā tataḥ prājño daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:15260: vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yogā tataḥ parā /
GP12nardp1_u:15261: prahvī satyā tatheśānanugrahā navamī matā // NarP_1,70.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:15262: tāro namano bhagavate viṣṇave sarvabhū tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15263: tātmane vāsudevāya sarvātmeti padaṃ vadet // NarP_1,70.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:15267: ādau cāṅgāni saṃpūjya mantrāṇāṃ keśareṣu ca // NarP_1,70.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:15280: raktaṃ vighnaṃ tathāgneye śyāmamāryaṃ ca rākṣase /
GP12nardp1_u:15281: durgāṃ śyāmāṃ vāyukoṇe senānyaṃ pītamaiśvare // NarP_1,70.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:15290: bhāratyā sahitaṃ yo vai dhyāyeddvevaṃ parātparam /
GP12nardp1_u:15293: śaśtraṃ saṃmantrya mantreṇa śabrūnhatvā nivartate // NarP_1,70.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:15297: gāruḍena ca saṃyojya pañcārṇena japettadā // NarP_1,70.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:15309: śanaiśvara dine samyak spṛṣṭvā śvatthaṃ ca pāṇinā // NarP_1,70.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:15311: pañcaviṃśatidhā japtvā nityaṃ prātaḥ pibejjalam // NarP_1,70.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:15317: medhāṃ kavitvaṃ vāksiddhiṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,70.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:15325: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto vāsudevāya kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,70.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:15329: devatā vāsudevastu bījaṃ śaktirdhruvaśca hṛt // NarP_1,70.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:15331: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśorāsye gale dorhṛdaye punaḥ // NarP_1,70.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:15332: kukṣau nābhau dhvaje jānudvaye pādadvaye tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:15335: pādādārabhya mūrddhānaṃ nyāsaṃ saṃhārakaṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,70.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:15337: bīvaṃ prāṇaṃ tathā cittaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,70.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:15339: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:15345: pīṭhe pūrvodite mantrī mūrti saṃkalpya mūlataḥ // NarP_1,70.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:15349: tṛtīyāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ proktā dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ // NarP_1,70.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:15356: tāraḥ kāmo ramā paścān ṅeṃtaḥ syātpuruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15358: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chandaḥ prokto 'tha devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:15371: evamārādhya deveśaṃ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:15372: putrānpautrānyaśaḥ kāntiṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:15375: śrīkārākhyo hariḥ prokto devatā sakaleṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,70.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15383: bāhuyugme tathā bāhūṃrājanya iti vinyaset // NarP_1,70.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:15385: nyasetpādadvaye mantrī padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata // NarP_1,70.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:15386: cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ karāgreṣvatha vinyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:15397: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto varāheti tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15398: rūpāya bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ syāllohitakāmikā ca ye /
GP12nardp1_u:15399: bhūpatitvaṃ ca me dehi dadāpaya śucipriyā // NarP_1,70.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15403: śikhā tejo 'dhipataye viśvarūpāya varma ca // NarP_1,70.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:15408: āṃ hrīṃ svarṇanibhaṃ jānvoradho nābheḥ sitaprabham /

GP12nardp1_u:15473: tāraḥ kāmo ramā bījaṃ hṛdante puruṣottamaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:15484: praṇavādau ca ṅentaṃ ca bhagavatīti padaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15493: evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ pāyasena tu // NarP_1,70.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15495: mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya gūlena tasyāṃ vasumatīṃ yajet // NarP_1,70.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:15497: dikpātreṣu ca sampūjya koṇapatreṣu tatkalāḥ // NarP_1,70.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:15498: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭā ca vidyānāṃ taiśca tatkalāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15502: dharaṇyā vallabhaḥ sa syātsukhī jīvecchataṃ samā /
GP12nardp1_u:15504: tāraḥ kāmo ramā bījaṃ hṛdante puruṣottamaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:15522: tato me siddhirābhāsya bhavamante ca varma phaṭ // NarP_1,70.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:15531: kāmadāyeti huṃ procya nyasedvama tataḥ param /

GP12nardp1_u:15537: hanayugmaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ bandhanāni tato vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:15548: anena vyāpakaṃ kṛtvā jagannāthaṃ smaret sudhīḥ // NarP_1,70.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:15558: śaṅkhapāśeṣu cāpāni musalaṃ nandakaṃ gadām // NarP_1,70.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:15566: smarāya dhīmahītyuktvā tanno viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt // NarP_1,70.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:15568: kalpayedāsanaṃ pīṭhe pūrvokte vaiṣṇave sudhīḥ // NarP_1,70.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:15574: pūjayedvanamālāyai hṛdantena gale ca tām // NarP_1,70.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:15579: lakṣmī sarasvatī caiva dhṛtiḥ prītistataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:15584: dalāgreṣu yajecchaṅkhaṃ śārṅgaṃ cakramasiṃ gadām // NarP_1,70.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:15588: śārṅgāya saśayānte ca varmāstraṃ vahnivallabhā // NarP_1,70.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:15597: huṃ phaṭ svāhā ca khaḍgāya namaḥ khaḍgārcane manuḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:15606: musalāya namaḥ prokto mantro susalapūjane // NarP_1,70.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:15608: huṃ phaṭe svāhā ca pāśāya namaḥ pāśārcane manuḥ // NarP_1,70.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:15609: tārādyā manavo hyete tataḥ śakrādikānyajet // NarP_1,70.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:15611: māsamātraṃ tu kusumaiḥ pūjayitvā hayārijaiḥ // NarP_1,70.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:15618: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12nardp1_u:15633: śriyaṃ hriyaṃ dhṛtiṃ puṣṭiṃ koṇapatreṣu pūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:15635: kṛṣṇo rudro mahāghoro bhīmo bhīṣaṇa ujjvalaḥṛ /
GP12nardp1_u:15644: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādheyedakhilepsitān // NarP_1,71.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:15646: viṣṇuṃ jvalantaṃ bhṛgvīśo jalaṃ padmāsanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,71.13 //

GP12nardp1_u:15669: bāhvoḥ kaṇṭhe ca cibuke cauṣṭau gaṇḍe pravinyaset /

GP12nardp1_u:15671: padāni tu mukhe mūrdhri nasi cakṣuṣi karṇayoḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:15674: ugrādīni padānī ha mṛtyumṛtyuṃ namāmyaham // NarP_1,71.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:15676: hṛdi nābhau ca kaṭyādipādāntaṃ navasu nyaset // NarP_1,71.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:15682: hṛdayādbhrūyugāntaṃ tu netratraye ca mastake // NarP_1,71.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:15685: nyāsasyāsya tu māhātmyaṃ jānātyeko hariḥ svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:15686: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyecca nṛhariṃ hṛdi // NarP_1,71.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:15693: hastau ca bhūmisaṃlagnau kaṃpamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15694: mukhaṃ vijṛṃbhitaṃ kṛtvā lelihānāṃ ca jihvikām // NarP_1,71.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:15700: hastāvadhomukhau kṛtvā nābhideśe prasārya ca // NarP_1,71.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:15702: hastāvūrddhvamukhau kṛtvā tale saṃyojya madhyame // NarP_1,71.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:15703: anāmāyāṃ tu vāmāyāṃ tuvāmāyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tu vinikṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:15704: tarjanyau pṛṣṭato lagnau aṅguṣṭau tarjanīśritau // NarP_1,71.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:15706: cakramudrā tathā kṛtvā tarjanībhyāṃ tu madhyame // NarP_1,71.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:15708: etā mudrā nṛsiṃhasya sarvamantreṣu saṃmatāḥ // NarP_1,71.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:15714: saumye kārye smaretsaumyaṃ krūraṃ krūre smaredbudhaḥ // NarP_1,71.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:15720: śrīkāmaḥ satataṃ dhyāyetpūrvoktaṃ nṛhariṃ sitam // NarP_1,71.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:15730: khaḍgaṃ śūlaṃ ca bāṇaṃ ca nṛhariṃ rudrarūpiṇam // NarP_1,71.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:15738: śaṅkhacacakradharau dvau tu dvau ca bāṇaghanurddharau // NarP_1,71.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:15740: pāśāṅkuśadharau dvau ca dvau ripormukuṭārpitau // NarP_1,71.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:15746: halaṃ ca muśalaṃ caiva abhayaṃ cāṅkuśaṃ tathā // NarP_1,71.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:15748: vāmabhāge karaiḥ śaṃṅkhaṃ kheṭaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlakam // NarP_1,71.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:15749: agniṃ ca varadaṃ śaktiṃ kuṇḍikāṃ ca tataḥ param /

GP12nardp1_u:15763: śatroḥ senānirodhena yatnaṃ kuryāñca sādhakam // NarP_1,71.71 //

GP12nardp1_u:15802: atha yantrāntaraṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada siddhidam /

GP12nardp1_u:15843: vinyasyaivaṃ tu pañcāṅgaṃ svātmarakṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,71.111 //

GP12nardp1_u:15847: athavā rāmamantrānte paraṃ kṣadvitayaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,71.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:15849: keśavaḥ pātu pādau me jaṅghe nārāyaṇo 'vatu // NarP_1,71.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:15850: mādhavo me kaṭiṃ pātu govindo guhyameva ca /

GP12nardp1_u:15852: ūrū trivikramaḥ pātu hṛdayaṃ pātu me naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15853: śrīdharaḥ pātu kaṇṭhaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśo mukhaṃ mama // NarP_1,71.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:15855: evaṃ vinyasya cāṅgeṣu japakāle tu sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,71.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:15861: givindo dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candraprabho mahān // NarP_1,71.120 //

GP12nardp1_u:15871: sa bāhyābhyantare dehamavyāddāmo daro hariḥ // NarP_1,71.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:15873: praviṣṭo 'haṃ na me kiñcidbhayamasti kadācana // NarP_1,71.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:15874: evaṃ rakṣāṃ vidhāyātha durddharṣo jāyate naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15877: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namaste viśvabhāvana // NarP_1,71.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:15879: itthaṃ saṃprārthya japtvā ca paṭitvā visṛjedvibhum // NarP_1,71.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:15880: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī jāyate sampadāṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:15885: ṣaḍvīrghāḍhye na kurvīta ṣaḍaṅgāni viśāladhīḥ // NarP_1,71.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:15886: tato dhyāyeddhṛdi vibhuṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ candraśekharam // NarP_1,71.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:15888: vahnīndutīvrakaranetra pinākapāṇe śītāṃśuśekhara rameśvara pāhi viṣṇo // NarP_1,71.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:15894: vadeddhorataraṃ te tu tanurūpaṃ ca ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,71.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:15900: chandasī ca tathā ghoranṛsiṃho devatā mataḥ // NarP_1,71.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15906: jaṃ bījaṃ haṃ tathā śaktirviniyogo 'khilāptaye // NarP_1,71.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:15908: raudraṃ dhyāyennṛsiṃhaṃ tu śatruvakṣo vidāraṇam // NarP_1,71.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:15916: pūrvoktāni ca sarvāṇi kāryāṇyāyānti siddhatām // NarP_1,71.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:15917: tāro namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya hṛñca te /
GP12nardp1_u:15920: tamo grasadvayaṃ paścātsvāhānte cābhayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,71.150 //
GP12nardp1_u:15921: ātmanyante ca bhūyiṣṭā dhruvo bījāntimo manuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15923: tāro nṛsiṃhabījaṃ ca namo bhagavate tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15924: narasiṃhāya tāraśca bījamasya yadā tataḥ // NarP_1,71.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:15926: bījaṃ varāharūpāya tāro bīja nṛsiṃhataḥ // NarP_1,71.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:15927: rūpāya tāra svaṃ bījaṃ vāmanānte ca rūpataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15929: bījaṃ kṛṣṇāya tārānte bījaṃ ca kalkine tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15930: jayadvayaṃ tataḥ śālagrāmānte ca nivāsine // NarP_1,71.155 //
GP12nardp1_u:15934: chando 'tijagatī proktaṃ devatā kathitā manoḥ // NarP_1,71.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:15936: ṣaḍūdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni ca bhāvayet // NarP_1,71.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:15944: tāro māyā ramā kāmo bījaṃ krodhapadaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,71.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:15955: bako hariḥ sahasrānte mūrte ehyehi śabdataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15992: paramahaṃsa viśveśa viśvānte tu viḍaṃbana // NarP_1,71.186 //
GP12nardp1_u:15994: hṛṣīkeśa ca svacchanda niḥśeṣajīva vinyaset // NarP_1,71.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:15996: laṃpaṭānte khecarīti siddhyateṃ tu pradāyaka // NarP_1,71.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:15999: māla paṇḍitamuṇḍeti matsya kūrmaṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:16002: rāmatraya tato viṣṇurūpānte dhara eva ca // NarP_1,71.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:16004: niviṣṭavahnijāyānte svadhā caiva tato vaṣaṭ // NarP_1,71.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:16011: astratāro 'cyutāstraṃ ca tāro vācā sudeva phaṭ /
GP12nardp1_u:16012: tāramāyāmūrteḥ phaṭ vaḥ kāmaḥ svarādimaḥ // NarP_1,71.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:16014: māyāviśvātmane ṣaṭ ca tāraḥ saucaṃ turātmane // NarP_1,71.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:16017: hraḥ hiraṇaayagarbharūpa dhāraṇānte ca phaṭ dhruvaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16019: kṣaiṃ nṛsiṃharūpadhārin oṃ klaṃ ślaśca svarādikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16022: tāro varmatrayaṃ saṃkaraṃ vaṃ cāmukamastakam // NarP_1,71.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:16025: ṣaḍdīrghāḍyāṃ svabījaṃ ca kṣapitānte tu kalmaṣa /
GP12nardp1_u:16028: nṛsiṃhānte tataḥ kālātmane svāhā dhruvastataḥ // NarP_1,71.204 //
GP12nardp1_u:16033: śveto varṇa udāttaśca svaraḥ prokto manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16034: kṣetraṃ ca paramātmā tu viniyogo 'khilātpaye // NarP_1,71.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:16038: tāraḥ kṣāṃ ca sahasrānte kṣaraśabdādvijṛṃbhitam // NarP_1,71.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:16040: māraḥ kṣīṃ ca mahātenuṃ prabhānte vikareti ca // NarP_1,71.210 //
GP12nardp1_u:16044: nakha sparśāddivyasiṃha namo 'stu bhagavan hariḥ // NarP_1,71.212 //
GP12nardp1_u:16046: anena ca śikhā proktā kavacaṃ tadanantaram // NarP_1,71.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:16047: tāraḥ kṣaiṃ ca suvarṇaṃ te madamattapadaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16049: tāraḥ rkṣau ca sahasrākṣa viśvasrākṣa viśvarūpapadaṃ vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:16056: evaṃ dhyātvā japenmantrī sahasraṃ pāyena caga // NarP_1,71.218 //
