GP12nardp1_u:22392: pañcamyāṃ tu viśeṣeṇa prāgvaddhomaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,90.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:22394: annājyābhyāṃ ca niyataṃ hutvānnāḍhyo bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,90.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:22395: yadyaddhi vāñchitaṃ vastu tattatsarvaṃ tu sarvadā /
GP12nardp1_u:22400: juhuyānnityaśo bhaktyā sahasraṃ vikacaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,90.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:22401: sa tu kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ putrānprāpnuyānnātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:22408: śālibhiḥ kṣīrasiktābhiḥ saptamīṣu śataṃ hutam // NarP_1,90.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:22412: nirātaṅko mahābhogaḥ śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati // NarP_1,90.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:22420: taddineṣu japedvidyāṃ nityaśaḥ salilaṃ spṛśan // NarP_1,90.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:22424: piṣṭaṃ ca sādhyapādottharajasā ca samanvitam // NarP_1,90.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:22427: evaṃ dinaiḥ saptabhistu sādhyo vaśyo bhaveddṛḍham /
GP12nardp1_u:22428: tathāvidhāṃ puttalikāṃ kuṇḍamadhye nikhanya ca // NarP_1,90.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:22439: avāpnoti hutairājyaiḥ ratnai ratnaṃ ca sādhakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:22440: śālipiṣṭamayīṃ kṛtvā puttalīṃ sasitāṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,90.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:22442: tanmanāśca divārātrau vidyājaptāṃ tu bhakṣayet // NarP_1,90.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:22452: phaṇidaṣṭamṛtānāṃ tu mukhe saṃtāḍya jīvayet // NarP_1,90.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:22462: homāllakṣmīṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ nidhimāyuryaśo labhet // NarP_1,90.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:22466: acalāṃ labhate lakṣmīṃ bhoktā ca bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,90.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:22470: nityaṃ nityārcanaṃ kuryāttathā homaṃ ghṛtena vai // NarP_1,90.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:22476: trijaptābhiḥ pibettoyaṃ tathā vāksidvaye śivam // NarP_1,90.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:22482: anayā vidyayā loke yadasādhyaṃ na tatkvacit // NarP_1,90.164 //
GP12nardp1_u:22486: kamalaiḥ kairavai raktaiḥ sitaiḥ saugandhikotpalaiḥ // NarP_1,90.166 //
GP12nardp1_u:22488: homātsaptasu vāreṣu tanmaṇḍalata eva vai // NarP_1,90.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:22490: mallayuddhe śastrayuddhe vāde dyūtahnaye 'pi ca // NarP_1,90.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:22496: prokteṣu staṃbhanaṃ śatrorbhaṅgo vā bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,90.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:22502: tenāsya vijayo bhūyānnidhanenāpi vā punaḥ // NarP_1,90.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:22504: patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ kāṇḍairmūlaiścāpi hunetkramāt // NarP_1,90.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:22506: arātidiṅmukho bhūtvā kuṇḍe tryasre vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,90.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:22526: vidyāṃ saṃsādhya pūrvaṃ tu paścāduktānaśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,90.186 //
GP12nardp1_u:22528: saṃpūjya devatāṃ viprakumārīṃ kanyakāṃ tu vā // NarP_1,90.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:22530: tathāvidhaṃ kumāraṃ vā saṃsthāpyabhyarcya vidyayā // NarP_1,90.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:22534: tato devyā samāviṣṭe tasminsaṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,90.190 //
GP12nardp1_u:22536: prajapaṃstāṃ tataḥ pṛcchedabhīṣṭaṃ kathayecca sā // NarP_1,90.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:22538: janmāntarāṇyatītāni sarvaṃ sā pūjitā vadet // NarP_1,90.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:22544: suvarṇaṃ samavāpnoti nidhiṃ vā vasudhāṃ tu vā // NarP_1,90.195 //
GP12nardp1_u:22546: dhānyāni vividhānyāśu subhagaḥ sa bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,90.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:22550: caturvidhaṃ tu pāṇḍityaṃ bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,90.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:22560: tathā guḍūcyā homena pāyasena tilena ca // NarP_1,90.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:22574: arddhendukuṇḍe niyataṃ vaśagā ripavo mune // NarP_1,90.210 //
GP12nardp1_u:22582: taddine syādapasmārī vairī bhavati niścitam // NarP_1,90.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:22593: lakṣatrayaṃ kṛte proktaṃ tretāyāṃ dviguṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:22594: dvāpare triguṇaṃ proktaṃ kalautattu caturguṇam // NarP_1,90.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:22597: evaṃ krameṇa sarvāsāṃ yā yā saṃkhyā japasya sā /
GP12nardp1_u:22598: kāryā siddhyai tu vidyāyāstataḥ kuryātprayogakān // NarP_1,90.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:22599: dviguṇo hi japaḥ kāryaḥ kāmeśvaryā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:22600: siddhe mantre prayogāṃstu vidadhīta yathā tathā // NarP_1,90.223 //
GP12nardp1_u:22604: kāryaḥ siddhyai tu vidyāyāḥ prayogānsādhayettataḥ // NarP_1,90.225 //
GP12nardp1_u:22610: havanādi daśāṃśena kāryaṃ proktakrameṇa hi // NarP_1,90.228 //
GP12nardp1_u:22628: proktena vidhinā kāryo vidyāsiddhyai munīśvara // NarP_1,90.237 //
GP12nardp1_u:22631: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde nityāpaṭalakathanaṃ nāma navatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:22635: yaṃ samārādhya manujo bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,91.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:22647: hṛdi vaktreṃ'sayorūrvoḥ kaṇṭhe nābhau dvipārśvayoḥ // NarP_1,91.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:22648: pṛṣṭhe hṛdi tathā mūrdhni vadane netrayornasoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:22655: paścādanena mantreṇa kurvīta vyāpakaṃ sudhīḥ // NarP_1,91.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:22663: vyāghrakṛtiṃ vasānaṃ ca viśvādyaṃ viśvarūpakam // NarP_1,91.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:22669: vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī kalapadādikā // NarP_1,91.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:22677: mūrtiṃ mūlena saṃkalpya tatrāvāhya yajecchivam // NarP_1,91.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:22691: tato nandimahākālau gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,91.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:22695: itthaṃ saṃpūjayeddevaṃ sahasraṃ nityaśo japet // NarP_1,91.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:22697: dvisahasraṃ japan rogānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,91.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:22707: smerāsyaṃ svakaraiḥ śūlaṃ kaṃpālaṃ varadābhaye // NarP_1,91.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:22731: evaṃ yo bhajate mantrī devaṃ śaṃbhumumāpatim // NarP_1,91.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:22750: amṛte tejo mālini tṛptāyeti padaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:22751: tadante brahmaśiḥse śirogaṃ jvalitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,91.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:22754: saiṃ saiṃ haumiti saṃbhāṣya parato toṃ guhyaśaktaye /
GP12nardp1_u:22755: netramuktaṃ ślīpaśuṃ huṃ phaḍante netraṃ śaktaye // NarP_1,91.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:22759: īśānaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ śaśinī prathamā kalā // NarP_1,91.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:22763: marīciḥ kathitā vipra caturthī ca sadāśive // NarP_1,91.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:22769: vidyā dvitīyā kathitā tanno rudraḥ padaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,91.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:22773: athorasi kalā nyasyedaṣṭau mantrī yathāvidhi // NarP_1,91.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:22779: mṛtyurnigaditā ṣaṣṭhī namaste astu tatparam // NarP_1,91.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:22785: syājjyeṣṭhāya namo rakṣā dvitīyā parikīrtitā // NarP_1,91.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:22787: namaḥ saṃyamanī ṣaṣṭhī kathitā tadanantaram // NarP_1,91.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:22789: namo vṛddhistvaṣṭamī syādbalānte ca sthirā kalā // NarP_1,91.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:22793: manonmanyai namaḥ paścājjvarā proktā trayodaśī // NarP_1,91.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:22797: sadyojātaṃ prapadyāmi siddhiḥ syātprathamā kalā // NarP_1,91.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:22798: sadyojātāya vai bhūyo namaḥ syād vṛddhirīritā /
GP12nardp1_u:22801: medhā syātpañcamī proktā kalābhūyo bhavasva mām // NarP_1,91.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:22802: prājñā samīritā ṣaṣṭhī bhavānte syātprabhā kalā /
GP12nardp1_u:22803: udbhavāya namaḥ paścātsudhā syādaṣṭamī kalā // NarP_1,91.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:22807: tataḥ samāhito bhūtvā dhyāyedevaṃ sadāśivam // NarP_1,91.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:22817: īśānaṃ trīkṣaṇaṃ śubhramaiśānyāṃ diśi pūjayet // NarP_1,91.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:22821: khaṭvāṅgaṃ niśitaṃ śūlaṃ kapālaṃ bibhrataṃ karaiḥ // NarP_1,91.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:22833: iti saṃpūjya deveśaṃ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,91.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:22851: ṛṣaiḥ kaholo devyādigāyatrī chanda īritam // NarP_1,91.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:22867: sudhāvaṭatitānpūrvā payaḥ sarpiḥ payo haviḥ // NarP_1,91.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:22875: asādhyaroge kṣveḍārtauṃ mohe dāhe mahābhaye // NarP_1,91.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:22895: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍayugme sanāsike // NarP_1,91.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:22923: nityaṃ sahasramaṣṭārddhaṃ parāṃ vindati vākchriyam // NarP_1,91.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:22953: arddhanārīśvaraḥ prokto devatā jagatāṃ patiḥ // NarP_1,91.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:22967: pīḍitāṅge smṛtaṃ tattatpīḍāṃ śamayati dhruvam // NarP_1,91.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:22968: praṇavo hṛdayaṃ paścān ṅeṃtaḥ paśupatiḥ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:22969: tāro namo bhūtapadaṃ tato 'dhipataye dhruvam // NarP_1,91.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:22979: bhūyo maṇḍalamadhye syātkaṭayugmaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,91.173 //
GP12nardp1_u:22987: māyā sphuradvayaṃ bhūyaḥ prasphuradvitayaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,91.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:22993: śikhā daśabhirākhyātā navabhiḥ kavacaṃ matam // NarP_1,91.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:23018: piṅgordhvakeśāndadhataṃ kapālaṃ ca gadāṃ smaret // NarP_1,91.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:23020: caruṇā ghṛtasiktena tataḥ kṣetre samarcayet // NarP_1,91.194 //
GP12nardp1_u:23028: sopadeśaṃ bṛhatpiṇḍe kṛtvā rātriṣu sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,91.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:23029: smṛtvā yathoktaṃ kṣetreśaṃ tasya haste baliṃ haret /
GP12nardp1_u:23031: kāntiṃ medhāṃ balāyogyaṃ tejaḥ puṣṭiṃ yaśaḥ śriyam /
GP12nardp1_u:23047: anena balinā hṛṣṭo baṭukaḥ parasainyakam // NarP_1,91.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:23053: hṛdayaṃ dīptaphaṭ proktaṃ jvalaphaṭ śira īritam // NarP_1,91.210 //
GP12nardp1_u:23054: śikhājvālini phaṭ proktā vahaphaṭ kavacaṃ matam /
GP12nardp1_u:23061: pañcākṣarodite pīṭhe mūrtiṃ mūlena kalpayet // NarP_1,91.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:23067: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi divyaṃ māheśvaraṃ stavam // NarP_1,91.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:23068: yasya pāṭhena pūjāyāṃ siddhyanti manavo 'khilāḥ // NarP_1,91.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:23086: vivāsase nivāsāya viśveṣāṃ pataye namaḥ // NarP_1,91.227 //
GP12nardp1_u:23096: te tu lokopakārāya jñātavyāḥ siddhidāyakāḥ // NarP_1,91.232 //
GP12nardp1_u:23100: śāktāḥ saurāśca gāṇeśāḥ śaivāḥ proktāḥ śubhāvahāḥ // NarP_1,91.234 //
GP12nardp1_u:23103: devatārādhanaṃ bhaktyā kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // NarP_1,91.235 //
GP12nardp1_u:23104: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde maheśamantrakathanaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23109: punarapyāha suprīto jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam // NarP_1,92.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23115: tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva sarvajñastvaṃ yato mataḥ // NarP_1,92.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23123: na veda tasmātpṛccha tvaṃ bahukalpavidāṃ varam // NarP_1,92.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23128: purāṇānāṃ vibhāgaṃ me sākalye nānukīrtaya // NarP_1,92.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23129: yasmiñ śrute śrutaṃ sarvaṃ jñātaṃ kṛte kṛtam // NarP_1,92.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23131: kiyanti ca purāṇāni kiyatsaṃkhyāni mānataḥ // NarP_1,92.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23138: tataḥ sanātano viprāḥ śrutvā nāradabhāṣitam // NarP_1,92.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23139: nārāyaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā provācātha vidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23143: tubhyaṃ samabhidhāsyāmi yatproktaṃ brahmaṇā purā // NarP_1,92.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23145: ekadā brahmaṇaḥ putro marīcirnāma viśrutaḥ // NarP_1,92.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23152: sarvajña sarvakalyāṇa sarvādhyakṣa namo 'stu te // NarP_1,92.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23154: lakṣaṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ caṃ vaktāraṃ pṛcchakaṃ tathā // NarP_1,92.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23167: brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca vāyavīyaṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,92.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:23169: āgneyaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca brahmavaivarttaliṅgake // NarP_1,92.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:23170: vārāhaṃ ca tathā skāndaṃ vāmanaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23171: mātsyaṃ ca gāruḍaṃ tadvadbrahmāṇḍākhyamiti triṣaṭ // NarP_1,92.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:23172: ekaṃ kathānakaṃ sūtraṃ vaktuḥ śrotuḥ samāhvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:23178: devānāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca yatrotpattiḥ prakīrtitā /
GP12nardp1_u:23179: prajāpatīnāṃ ca tathā dakṣādīnāṃ munīśvara // NarP_1,92.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:23187: varṇanaṃ yatra pātālasvargāṇāṃ ca pradṛśyate // NarP_1,92.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:23189: pārvatyāśca tathā janma vivāhaśca nigadyate // NarP_1,92.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:23198: yogānāṃ ca samākhyānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāpi varṇanam /
GP12nardp1_u:23209: śṛṇoti yaḥ purāṇaṃ tu brahmaṃ sarvaṃ jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,92.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:23212: tatsarvaṃ labhate vatsa purāṇasyāsya kīrtanāt // NarP_1,92.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:23213: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brāhmapurāṇetihāsakathanaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23217: mahatpuṇyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ mudā // NarP_1,93.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23224: dānānāṃ kīrtanaṃ yatra vratānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:23231: suvratasya kathā paścādvṛtrasya ca vadhastathā // NarP_1,93.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23233: sukalākhyānakaṃ caiva dharmākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,93.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23247: gayāyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya ca puṇyakam // NarP_1,93.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23265: gautamākhyānakaṃ caiva śivagītā tataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,93.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23269: parvatākhyānakaṃ pūrvaṃ gaurthai proktaṃ śivena vai // NarP_1,93.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:23271: sagarasya kathā puṇyā tataḥ paramudīritam // NarP_1,93.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:23285: parīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhṛguṇā śrīviṣṇorvaibhavasya ca // NarP_1,93.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:23287: pañcakhaṇḍayutaṃ pādmaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti narottamaḥ // NarP_1,93.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:23295: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde padmapurāṇānukramaṇikāvarṇanaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23298: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:23313: narakoddhārakaṃ karma gaditaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,94.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23323: tatastu yauvane proktā līlā dvāravatībhavā // NarP_1,94.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23328: kalijaṃ caritaṃ proktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ layasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23331: ataḥ paraṃ tu sūtena śaunakādibhirādarāt // NarP_1,94.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23333: nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyā vratāni niyamā yamāḥ // NarP_1,94.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23339: yo naraḥ paṭhate bhaktyā yaḥ śṛṇoti ca sādaram // NarP_1,94.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23341: tallikhitvā ca yo dadyādāṣāḍhyāṃ ghṛtadhenunā // NarP_1,94.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:23343: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma vimānenārkavarcasā // NarP_1,94.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23346: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde viṣṇupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23354: sargādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra proktaṃ vipra savistaram // NarP_1,95.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23355: manvantareṣu vaṃśāśca rājñāṃ ye yatra kīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23360: vratādīnāṃ ca pūrvo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,95.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23362: śivasya saṃhitoktā vai vistareṇa munīśvara // NarP_1,95.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23364: sa tu sarvātmanā yasyāstīre tiṣṭhati saṃtatam // NarP_1,95.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23365: idaṃ brahmā hārīridaṃ sākṣāccedaṃ paro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23366: idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam // NarP_1,95.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23369: ye vasaṃtyuttare kūle rudrasyānucarā hi te /
GP12nardp1_u:23370: vasaṃti yāmyatīre ye lokaṃ te yānti vaiṣṇavam // NarP_1,95.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23372: saṃgamāḥ pañca ca triṃśannadīnāṃ pāpanāśanī // NarP_1,95.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:23376: catuḥśatāni tīrthāni prasiddhāni ca saṃti hi // NarP_1,95.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23378: saṃti cānyāni revāyāstīrayugme pade pade // NarP_1,95.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23382: śrāvaṇyāṃ yo dadedbhaktyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine // NarP_1,95.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23385: niyamena haviṣyāśī sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23387: so 'pi sarvapurāṇasya phalaṃ śravaṇajaṃ labhet // NarP_1,95.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23388: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāyupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23396: tatra tu prathamaskandhe sūtarṣīṇāṃ samāgame // NarP_1,96.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23397: vyāsasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23402: dvitīyo 'yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā // NarP_1,96.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23406: satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23408: ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ // NarP_1,96.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23410: brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23422: kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ // NarP_1,96.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23424: bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,96.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23430: saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,96.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23432: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // NarP_1,96.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23440: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23456: purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // NarP_1,97.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23462: asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // NarP_1,97.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23472: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,97.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23478: mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // NarP_1,97.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23480: sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,97.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23485: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23489: purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,98.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23503: manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,98.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23508: khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23513: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // NarP_1,98.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23519: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // NarP_1,98.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23521: yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // NarP_1,98.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23523: kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,98.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23526: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23532: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,99.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23540: nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,99.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23545: jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23546: ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // NarP_1,99.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23564: gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // NarP_1,99.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23570: varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // NarP_1,99.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23574: tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,99.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23577: śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // NarP_1,99.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23578: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23584: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // NarP_1,100.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23585: sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23586: ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // NarP_1,100.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23587: purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23588: tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // NarP_1,100.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23590: tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // NarP_1,100.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23594: pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,100.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23595: saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:23596: pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,100.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23598: śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // NarP_1,100.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23602: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // NarP_1,100.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23603: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
GP12nardp1_u:23608: guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // NarP_1,100.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23609: taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23613: yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23615: sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:23617: paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,100.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23618: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23621: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:23654: rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // NarP_1,101.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23656: kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhe vṛtte kṛṣṇasya dvijasaṃskṛtiḥ // NarP_1,101.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23661: paṭhitaṃ ca śrutaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ cābhivanditam /
GP12nardp1_u:23668: so 'pi kṛṣṇaprasādena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,101.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23669: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne brahmavaivartapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyāḥ // 101 //
GP12nardp1_u:23681: yogākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ kalpākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,102.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23682: liṅgodbhavastadaṃbā ca kīrtitā hi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23703: tryaṃbakasya ca māhātmyaṃ purāṇaśravaṇasya ca // NarP_1,102.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23707: phaālgunyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ yo dadyādbhaktyā dvijātaye // NarP_1,102.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23709: yaḥ paṭecchṛṇuyādvāpi laiṅgaṃ pāpāpahaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,102.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23714: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde liṅgapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23717: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23719: mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:23721: vyāso hi viduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:23727: gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23732: ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā // NarP_1,103.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23744: ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam // NarP_1,103.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23751: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23756: purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:23757: lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,104.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23760: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23761: yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ // NarP_1,104.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23783: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23791: ityeṣa kathitaḥ skānde khaṇḍo māheśvaro 'dbhutaḥ // NarP_1,104.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23820: tato mārgasya māhātmye vidhānaṃ snānajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:23829: vanānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,104.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:23844: somārkā dīni tīrthāni trayodaśa tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23849: ataḥ paraṃ brahmakhaṇḍaṃ marīce śṛṇu puṇyadam // NarP_1,104.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:23850: yatra vai setumāhātmye phalaṃ snāne kṣaṇodbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23869: chatrānandā tathā śāntā śrīmātā ca mataṅginī // NarP_1,104.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:23870: puṇyadā ca samākhyātā yatra devyaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23889: śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ śarmadaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,104.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:23936: ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam ///
GP12nardp1_u:23949: śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // NarP_1,104.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:23973: kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,104.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:23991: lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // NarP_1,104.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:23997: caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // NarP_1,104.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:24001: karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // NarP_1,104.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:24004: indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24008: śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:24022: ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // NarP_1,104.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:24032: rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,104.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:24036: ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // NarP_1,104.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:24048: rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // NarP_1,104.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:24050: rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // NarP_1,104.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:24060: aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // NarP_1,104.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:24067: bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24068: sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // NarP_1,104.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:24072: pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,104.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:24078: nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // NarP_1,104.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:24090: someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // NarP_1,104.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:24096: varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // NarP_1,104.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:24128: kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // NarP_1,104.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:24136: mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // NarP_1,104.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:24140: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:24146: kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // NarP_1,104.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:24176: ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // NarP_1,104.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:24179: mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // NarP_1,104.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:24180: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24200: marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,105.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24211: māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24214: gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // NarP_1,105.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24219: sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:24220: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // NarP_1,105.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24221: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:24225: dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,105.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24226: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24229: śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24234: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // NarP_1,106.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24236: tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // NarP_1,106.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24240: tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // NarP_1,106.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24248: vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,106.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24250: uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // NarP_1,106.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24252: nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // NarP_1,106.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:24256: pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // NarP_1,106.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24258: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // NarP_1,106.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24266: ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // NarP_1,106.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24268: ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // NarP_1,106.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24275: brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NarP_1,106.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24276: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24279: atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:24280: yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // NarP_1,107.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24300: tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,107.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24330: vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,107.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24338: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,107.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24340: viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,107.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24341: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24344: marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:24350: pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24353: mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // NarP_1,108.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24371: rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // NarP_1,108.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24375: tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // NarP_1,108.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24377: pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // NarP_1,108.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24387: yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // NarP_1,108.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24391: pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // NarP_1,108.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24409: kīrtitaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,108.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24411: sauvarṇahaṃsayugmāḍhyaṃ viprāya sa divaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,108.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24412: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde gāruḍānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24418: caturtha upasaṃhāraḥ pādāścatvāra eva hi // NarP_1,109.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24423: eṣa vai prathamaḥ pādo dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:24450: kārtavīryasya caritaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24455: indrasya tu stavaḥ puṇyaḥ śukreṇa parikīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24462: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ manūnāṃ ca caritaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24467: śaivasyātha purasyāpi varṇanaṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24470: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24472: catuṣpādaṃ purāṇaṃ te brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtakam // NarP_1,109.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24474: brahmāṇḍaṃ yaccaturlakṣaṃ purāṇaṃ yena vaṭhyate // NarP_1,109.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24478: mattaḥ śrutvā purāṇāni lokebhyaḥ pracakāśire // NarP_1,109.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24480: mayācedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu vasiṣṭāya puroditam // NarP_1,109.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24484: ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,109.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24488: sa yādi brahmaṇo lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,109.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24490: purāṇāni tu saṃkṣepācchrotavyāni ca vistarāt // NarP_1,109.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24492: kathayedvā vidhānena neha bhūyaḥ sa jāyate // NarP_1,109.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24496: deyaṃ kadāpi sādhūnāṃ dveṣiṇe na śaṭhāya ca // NarP_1,109.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24498: nirmatsarāya śucaye deyaṃ sadvaiṣṇavāya ca // NarP_1,109.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24499: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brahmāṇḍapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24503: marūcaye yathā proktaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // NarP_1,110.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24504: adhunā tu mahābhāga tithīnāṃ vai kathānakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24506: yasminmāse tu yā puṇyā tithiryena uvāsitā /
GP12nardp1_u:24507: yadvidhānaṃ ca pūjādestatsarvaṃ vada sāṃpratam // NarP_1,110.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24509: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tithīnāṃ te vrataṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:24512: śuklapakṣe samagraṃ vai tadā sūryodaye sati // NarP_1,110.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24518: maṅgalyā ca pavitrā ca lokadvayamukhāvahā // NarP_1,110.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24522: tataḥ krameṇa devebhyaḥ pūjā kāryā pṛthakpṛthak // NarP_1,110.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24524: savastraṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca tato dadyāddijātaye // NarP_1,110.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24527: ārogyadaṃ nṛṇāṃ vipra tasminneva dine mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24530: atha jyeṣṭhe site pakṣe pakṣatyāṃ divasodaye // NarP_1,110.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24538: evaṃ bhaktyā samabhyacya dattvā viprāya dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,110.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24554: idaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra deva devasya śūlinaḥ // NarP_1,110.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24560: samarpya gurave bhaktyā śivaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,110.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24569: itthaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra sarvasiddhyālayo naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24570: jāyate bhuvi durgāyāḥ prasādānnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,110.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24578: naktaṃ viṣṇvarcanaṃ homaiḥ sauvarṇīṃ hutabhuktanum // NarP_1,110.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24580: evaṃ kṛtvā dhanairdhānyaiḥ samṛddho jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,110.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24588: karmaṇā laukikenāpi saṃtuṣṭo hi maheśvaraḥ // NarP_1,110.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24590: vaiśākhe tu sitādyāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ viśvavihāriṇam // NarP_1,110.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24592: evaṃ śucisitādyāyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ jagatāṃ gurum // NarP_1,110.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:24596: vratāni tubhyaṃ proktāni bhuktimuktipradāni ca // NarP_1,110.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24598: bhojane tu haviṣyānnaṃ sāmānyata udāhṛtam // NarP_1,110.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:24599: iti śrībṛhannanāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsapratipadvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24602: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi dvitīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24603: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā brahmaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,111.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24607: asminneva dine vipra bālendumuditaṃ pare // NarP_1,111.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24609: atha vāsmindine bhaktyā dasrāvabhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,111.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24611: pūrṇayātrāvrate hyasmindadhnā vāpi ghṛtena ca // NarP_1,111.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24619: bhojayitvā dvijān bhaktyā bhāskaraṃ lokamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,111.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24621: tasyāṃ rathaṃ samāropya rāmaṃ saha subhadrayā // NarP_1,111.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24631: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmada // NarP_1,111.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24635: āśvine māsi vai puṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā // NarP_1,111.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24639: puṣṭipravarddhanaṃ cātra bhaginyā bhojanaṃ gṛhe // NarP_1,111.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24640: vastrālaṅkārapūrvaṃ tu tasmai deyamataḥ param // NarP_1,111.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24641: yasyāṃ tithau yamunayā yamarājadevaḥ saṃbhojito nijakarātsvasṛsauhṛdena /
GP12nardp1_u:24642: tasyāṃ svasuḥ karatalādiha yo bhunakti prāpnoti ratnadhanadhānyamanuttamaṃ saḥ // NarP_1,111.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24653: samarpya deve bhaktyaiva sa mūrtiṃ pradadeddvije /
GP12nardp1_u:24654: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra sākṣātsūrya ivoditaḥ // NarP_1,111.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24656: iha kāmānvarāmbhuktvā yātyante brahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,111.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24662: prasādya praṇameccaiva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ patito bhuvi // NarP_1,111.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24666: proktaṃ tadeva kṛṣṇāsu karttavyaṃ vidhikovidaiḥ // NarP_1,111.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24668: pūjyate hi dvitīyāsu brahmacaryyādi pūrvavat // NarP_1,111.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24669: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsadvitīyāvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24672: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tṛtīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24675: sauvarṇā rājatīṃ vāpi tāmnīṃ vā mṛṇyayīṃ dvija // NarP_1,112.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24679: dvijabhāryā bhartṛmatīḥ kanyakāṃ vā sulakṣaṇāḥ // NarP_1,112.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24683: dhātujāṃ mṛnmayīṃ vā tu nikṣipecca jalāśaye // NarP_1,112.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24687: strīṇāṃ yathā tathā nānyā vidyate bhuvanatraye // NarP_1,112.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24692: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24693: śukle pūrvāhnike grāhye kṛṣṇe caiva tapastatha // NarP_1,112.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24694: dvāparaṃ hi kalirbhādre pravṛttāni yugāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:24697: yadvā gaṅgāṃbhasi snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // NarP_1,112.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24702: atha jyeṣṭhatṛtīyā tu śuklā raṃbheti nāmataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24706: dadāti vittaṃ putrāṃśca matiṃ dharme śubhāvahām /
GP12nardp1_u:24708: keśavaṃ tu salakṣmīkaṃ sastrīke tu dvijer'cayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24715: putrāndehi dhanaṃ dehi saubhāgyaṃ dehi suvrate // NarP_1,112.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24716: anyāṃśca sarvakāmānme dehi dehi namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp1_u:24717: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśīṃ bhavānīṃ bhavasaṃyutām // NarP_1,112.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24719: evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇi kṛtvā nārī vrataṃ śubham // NarP_1,112.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24723: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ tatra bhavānyāḥ pratipūjayet // NarP_1,112.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24728: pratimāṃ gurave dattvā dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:24732: tatastu kāñcane pātre rājate cāpi tāmrake /
GP12nardp1_u:24733: vaiṇave mṛnmaye vāpi vinyasyānnaṃ sadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,112.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24734: saphalaṃ ca savastraṃ ca dvijāya pratipādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24741: bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadyādviprebhyo devituṣṭaye // NarP_1,112.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24742: evaṃ yā kurute nārī vrataṃ saubhāgyavarddhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24743: sā tu devīprasādena saubhāgyaṃ labhate dhruvam // NarP_1,112.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24744: yadā tṛtīyā bhādre tu hastarkṣasahitā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:24745: hastagaurīvrataṃ nāma taduddiṣṭaṃ hi śauriṇā // NarP_1,112.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24746: tathā koṭīśvarī nāma vrataṃ proktaṃ pinākinā /
GP12nardp1_u:24749: upavāsena kartavyaṃ varṣe varṣe tu nārada // NarP_1,112.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24752: tatpakkena tu nirmāya devyā mūrtiṃ suśomanām /
GP12nardp1_u:24759: iti te kathitaṃ vipra koṭilakṣeśvarīvratam // NarP_1,112.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24769: vāyanāni ca pañcaiva tābhyo dadyācca bhojayet // NarP_1,112.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24773: gītavādyayutā nadyāṃ gaurīṃ tāṃ tu visarjayet // NarP_1,112.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:24774: āhūtāsi mayābhadre pūjitā ca yathā vidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24775: mama saubhāgyadānāya yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ tvayā // NarP_1,112.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24776: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ bhaktyā dvija devīprasādataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24785: devīlokaṃ samāsādya modate ca tayā saha // NarP_1,112.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:24791: prasannā diśati svīyaṃ lokaṃ tu vratatoṣitā // NarP_1,112.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:24794: sarvāsu ca tṛtīyāsu vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24795: devīpūjā viprapūjā dānaṃ homo visarjanam // NarP_1,112.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:24798: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsatṛtīyāvratakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24806: vaiśākhasya caturthyāṃ tu prārthyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇāhvayam // NarP_1,113.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24808: prāpya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ lokaṃ modate bahukalpakam // NarP_1,113.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24810: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca yuthebhyo dattvā svargaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,113.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24821: śrāvaṇasya caturthyāṃ tu jāti candrodaye mune // NarP_1,113.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24827: evaṃ vrataṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā modakameva ca // NarP_1,113.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24835: haimaṃ nirmāya gaṇapaṃ tāmrapātropari sthitam // NarP_1,113.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24842: tataḥ saṃprārathya vighneśamūrtiṃ sopaskarāṃ mune // NarP_1,113.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24844: kṛtvaivaṃ pañca varṣāṇi samupāsya yathāvidhi // NarP_1,113.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24850: pañcābdaṃ vādaśābdaṃ vā ṣoḍaśābdamathāpi vā // NarP_1,113.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24854: atha śukla caturthyāṃ tu siddhavaināyakavratam // NarP_1,113.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24862: umāputrāya bailvaṃ tu dūrvāṃ gajamukhāya ca // NarP_1,113.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24866: herambāya tu siṃdūraṃ catirhetre ca patrajam // NarP_1,113.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24870: ācamayya namaskṛtya saṃprārthya ca visarjjayet // NarP_1,113.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24872: nivedayecca gurave dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,113.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24873: evaṃ kṛtārcano bhaktyā pañca varṣāṇi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24875: asyāṃ caturthyāṃ śaśinaṃ na paśyecca kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:24876: paśyan mithyābhiśāpa tu labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24877: atha taddoṣanāśāya mantraṃ paurāṇikaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,113.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24879: sakumāraka mā rodīstava hyeṣa syamantakaḥ // NarP_1,113.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24886: caturthyāṃ kārtike kṛṣṇe karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,113.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24892: suvāsinībhyo viprebhyo yathākāmaṃ ca sādaram // NarP_1,113.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:24894: bhuñjīta miṣṭamannaṃ ca vratasya paripūrtaye // NarP_1,113.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24895: yadvā kṣīreṇa karakaṃ pūrṇaṃ toyena vā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24899: yāvajjīvaṃ tu vā nāryā kāryyaṃ saubhāgyavāñchayā /
GP12nardp1_u:24908: viṣāṇi naśyantyacirānna daśanti ca pannagāḥ // NarP_1,113.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:24916: tasyopari ghaṭaṃ sthāpya tāmrapātreṇa saṃyutam // NarP_1,113.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24921: prabhāte vimale snātvā homaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /'
GP12nardp1_u:24929: tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ śaktyā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:24932: savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyādācāryāya sadakṣiṇām // NarP_1,113.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:24933: anyobhyo 'pi yathāśakti bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:24935: bandhubhiḥ saha bhuñjīta svayaṃ ca prītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24936: etadvrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhogānihottamān // NarP_1,113.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:24940: pauṣamāsacaturthyāṃ tu vighneśaṃ prārthya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,113.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:24942: evaṃ kṛte mune bhūyādvratī saṃpattibhājanam // NarP_1,113.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:24952: saśamīpatradadhi ca kṛtvā candrāya dāpayet // NarP_1,113.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:24956: śaktyā saṃbhojya viprāgryānsvayaṃ bhuñjīta cājñayā // NarP_1,113.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:24957: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saṃkaṣṭākhyaṃ śūbhāvaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24958: samṛddho dhanadhānyaiḥ syānna ca saṃkaṣṭamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,113.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:24960: tasyāṃ tu gaurī saṃpūjyā saṃyuktā yoginīgaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,113.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:24964: payasā pāyasenāpi lavaṇena ca pālakaiḥ // NarP_1,113.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:24966: saubhāgyavṛddhaye deyo bhoktavyaṃ bandhubhiḥ saha // NarP_1,113.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:24971: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvamasyāṃ kṛtaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24974: tilaṣiṣṭairdvijān bhojya svayaṃ cāśnīta mānavaḥ // NarP_1,113.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:24977: sauvarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ ca kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24980: sāṃgārakā vā viprendra sā viśeṣaphalapradā // NarP_1,113.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:24982: vighneśa eva deveśaḥ saṃpūjyo bhaktitatparaiḥ // NarP_1,113.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:24983: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādśanāsa caturthīvratānirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikasatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24989: asyāṃ matsyāvatārārcā bhaktaiḥ kāryā mahotsavā // NarP_1,114.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24992: yo lakṣmīṃ pūjayeccātra taṃ vai lakṣmīrna muñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:24993: pṛthvīvrataṃ tathā cāndraṃ hayagarīvavrataṃ tathā // NarP_1,114.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24995: atha vaiśākhapañcamyāṃ śeṣaṃ cābhyarcya mānavaḥ // NarP_1,114.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24999: athāṣāḍhasya pañcamyāṃ vāyuṃ sarvagataṃ mune // NarP_1,114.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25001: dhvajaṃ ca pañcavarṇaṃ tu vaṃśadaṇḍāgrasaṃsthitam // NarP_1,114.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25003: tatastanmūladeśe tu dikṣu sarvāsu nārada // NarP_1,114.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25005: prathamādiṣu yāmeṣu yo yo vāyuḥ pravartate // NarP_1,114.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25006: tasmai tasmai digīśāya pūjāṃ samyak prakalpayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25008: sāyamāgatya gehaṃ svaṃ bhuktvā svalpaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25010: yaḥ svapno jāyate tasyāṃ rātrau yāme caturthake /
GP12nardp1_u:25011: sa eva bhavitā nūnaṃ svapna ityāha vai śivaḥ // NarP_1,114.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25021: prātarbhānau samudite pitṝṃścaiva tathā ṛṣīn // NarP_1,114.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25024: sarvaṃ dinaṃ kṣipedevaṃ pradoṣe tu śivālaye /
GP12nardp1_u:25027: japetpañcākṣarī vidyāṃ śataṃ cāpi sahasrakam // NarP_1,114.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25032: yāni syustaiḥ samṛddho 'haṃ bhūyāṃ janmani janmani /
GP12nardp1_u:25033: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ gṛhamāgatya vai svakam // NarP_1,114.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25050: bhādre tu kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet // NarP_1,114.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:25060: etaibhyo 'ghya ca vidhivatkalpayitvā pradāya ca // NarP_1,114.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25064: kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān // NarP_1,114.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25070: arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ // NarP_1,114.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25076: bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet // NarP_1,114.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25078: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,114.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25082: tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25092: vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25094: yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine /
GP12nardp1_u:25095: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā // NarP_1,114.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25098: aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:25099: rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // NarP_1,114.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25101: nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,114.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25104: pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25105: pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā // NarP_1,114.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25106: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25109: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:25112: tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,115.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:25114: vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam // NarP_1,115.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25115: labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25127: gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām /
GP12nardp1_u:25129: paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25130: nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,115.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25132: akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,115.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25135: snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim /
GP12nardp1_u:25149: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25152: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet // NarP_1,115.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25155: snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25161: naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:25166: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā // NarP_1,115.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25168: rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet // NarP_1,115.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25178: pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā // NarP_1,115.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:25180: kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā // NarP_1,115.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25182: kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā // NarP_1,115.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25184: atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham // NarP_1,115.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25190: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā // NarP_1,115.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25194: yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama // NarP_1,115.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25202: māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:25207: phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija // NarP_1,115.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25214: evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:25215: iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante śivagatiṃ labhet // NarP_1,115.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25216: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25220: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25221: caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:25224: vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau // NarP_1,116.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25226: dakṣiṇe ca nyasetpatre tathaiva rākṣasadvayam // NarP_1,116.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25229: vāyavya yātudhānau dvau uttare ca ṛṣidvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25233: evaṃ saṃpūjya homaṃ tu ghṛtenāṣṭaśataṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:25235: nāmamantreṇa vedyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:25236: dakṣiṇā ca tato deyā dvijebhyaḥ śaktito dvija // NarP_1,116.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25238: dehānte maṇḍalaṃ bhānorbhattvā gacchetparaṃ padam // NarP_1,116.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25241: tāṃ tatra pūjayetsnātvā pratyūṣe vimale jale /
GP12nardp1_u:25243: tato ghaṭasahasraṃ tu deyaṃ gaṅgāvrate tvidam /
GP12nardp1_u:25246: tilamātraṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // NarP_1,116.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25250: iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sūrye cāstamupāgate // NarP_1,116.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25251: sodakuṃbhaṃ tu tatpadmaṃ kapilāṃ ca dvijer'payet /
GP12nardp1_u:25252: taddine tūpavastavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ ca pare 'hani // NarP_1,116.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:25254: nibavrataṃ ca tatreva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,116.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25258: dvijānpare 'hni saṃbhojya svayaṃ bhuñjīta bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,116.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25260: saptamī śarkarākhyaiṣā proktā taccāpi me śṛṇu // NarP_1,116.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25264: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // NarP_1,116.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25268: kartavyaṃ hi prayatnena vratame tadravipriyam // NarP_1,116.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25269: yaḥ kuryātparāyā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:25270: jyeṣṭhe tu śuklasaptamyāṃ jāta indro raviḥ svayam // NarP_1,116.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25272: svargatiṃ labhate vipra devendrasya prasādataḥ // NarP_1,116.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:25274: jātastaṃ tatra saṃprārcya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,116.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25277: kārpāsaṃ tu caturhastaṃ sārddha vastraṃ hi gopateḥ ///
GP12nardp1_u:25280: asyāṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ cākṣayyatāṃ vrajet // NarP_1,116.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25282: somasya tu maheśasya pūjanaṃ cātra kīrtitam // NarP_1,116.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25286: nālikeraṃ ca vṛntākaṃ nāraṅgaṃ bījapūrakam // NarP_1,116.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25290: saṃpūjya parayā bhaktyā dhārayedvāmake kare // NarP_1,116.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25291: strī naro dakṣiṇe caiva yāvadvarṣaṃ samāpyate /
GP12nardp1_u:25292: saṃbhojya viprānsaptaiva pāyasena visṛjyasa tān // NarP_1,116.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25294: phalāni tāni deyāni saptasvapi dvijeṣu ca // NarP_1,116.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25295: evaṃ tu sapta varṣāṇi kṛtvopāsya yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:25296: sāyujyaṃ labhate vipra mahādevasya tadvratī // NarP_1,116.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25300: tvāmahaṃ dadmi kalyāṇi prīyatāmaryamā svayam // NarP_1,116.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25302: ityuktvā vedaviduṣe dattvā kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,116.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25304: pacagavyaṃ vrataṃ cetthaṃ vidhāya śvo dvijottamān // NarP_1,116.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25306: kṛtaṃ hyetadgataṃ vipra subhāṣyaṃ śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_1,116.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25312: visṛjya bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,116.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25316: ato 'syāṃ pūjanaṃ tasya yathoktavidhinā dvija // NarP_1,116.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25318: suvarṇadakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,116.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25320: dvijobrāhmaṃ tathā śūdraḥ satkulejanma cāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25322: upoṣya bhānuṃ triḥsandhyaṃ samabhyarcya dharāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,116.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25325: pṛthavī vā suvarṇaṃ vā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25327: mārtaṇḍākhyaṃ vrataṃ nāma kathayanti dvijāḥ pare /
GP12nardp1_u:25331: sauvarṇaṃ gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ kṛtvā rātrau ca jāgaram /
GP12nardp1_u:25332: pare 'hni viprānsambhojya pāyasena tu sapta vai // NarP_1,116.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25333: dakṣiṇāṃ nālikerāṇi tebhyo datvā guruṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25334: sauvarṇaṃ tu raverbimbaṃ yuktaṃ dakṣiṇayā nyayā // NarP_1,116.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25335: samarpya ca bhṛśaṃ prārthya visṛjyādyātsvayaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25341: asyāṃ samarcya savituḥ pratimāṃ tu haimīṃ haimāśvayuktarathagāṃ tu dadetsahebhām /
GP12nardp1_u:25342: yo bhāvabhaktisahitaḥ sa gato hi lokaṃ śambhoḥ sa modata ihāpi ca bhuktabhogaḥ // NarP_1,116.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:25345: arkasya ca badaryāśca sapta sapta dalāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25347: putrapradaṃ vrataṃ cātra prāhādityaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25351: pūjayedapare cāhni homaṃ kṛtvā dvijāṃ stataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25352: dadhyodanena payasā pāyasena ca bhojayet // NarP_1,116.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25354: labhate sa tu satputraṃ cirāyuṣamanāmayam // NarP_1,116.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25363: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitasappamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25371: caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ // NarP_1,117.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25381: jyeṣṭhaśukle tathāṣṭamyāṃ yo devīṃ pūjayennaraḥ // NarP_1,117.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25383: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tathā'ṣāḍhe snātvā caiva niśāṃbunā // NarP_1,117.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25387: bhojayitvā tato viprāndatvā svarṇaṃ ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,117.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25388: visṛjya ca tataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25391: kṣīreṇa snāpayitvā ca miṣṭānnaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25395: upavāsaṃ tu saṃkalpya snātvā kṛtvā ca naityikam // NarP_1,117.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25397: kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathānantaṃ govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam // NarP_1,117.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25402: ādau madhye tathā cānte homaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25405: sauvarṇe tāmrapātre vā mṛnmaye veṇupātrake // NarP_1,117.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25407: haimīṃ ca pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25409: dātavyā gauḥ savatsā ca vastrālaṅkārabhūṣitā // NarP_1,117.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25411: tāśca dadyādvidhijñāya svayaṃ vā bhakṣayedvratī // NarP_1,117.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25413: daśame 'hni tato mūrtiṃ sadravyāṃ guraver'payet // NarP_1,117.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25415: dadyādeva daśābdaṃ tu kṛtvā vratamanuttamam // NarP_1,117.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25417: ante kṛṣṇasya sāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25421: upavāsī tilaiḥ snāto nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,117.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25423: tanmadhye kalaśaṃ sthāpya tāmrajaṃ vāpi mṛnmayam // NarP_1,117.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25425: haimīṃ vastrayugācchannāṃ kṛṣṇasya pratimāṃ śubham // NarP_1,117.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25427: devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca yaśodāṃ nandameva ca // NarP_1,117.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25429: tata ārārtikaṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpyānamya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,117.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25432: dhānyākaṃ ca yavānīṃ ca śuṇṭhīṃ khaṇḍaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25433: sājyaṃ raupye dhṛtaṃ pātre naivedyaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25439: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjettuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,117.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25441: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśrīta ca svayam // NarP_1,117.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25445: kṛtena yena labhyeta koṭyaikādaśakaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25449: śakto bhaktaścopavāsaṃ pare 'hni vidhinā tataḥ // NarP_1,117.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25451: kṛtvā svayaṃ ca bhuñjītaṃ vratamevaṃ samāpayet // NarP_1,117.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25453: rahasyaṃ goṣṭhajaṃ labdhvā rādhāparikare vaset // NarP_1,117.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25454: dūrvāṣṭamīvrataṃ cātra kathitaṃ tacca me śṛṇu /

GP12nardp1_u:25456: sthāpya liṅgaṃ tato gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaiśca dīpakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25463: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya viprānsaṃbhojya tatra vai // NarP_1,117.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25464: bhuktvā svayaṃ gṛhaṃ gacchedatvā vipreṣu dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25465: phalāni ca praśastāni miṣṭāni surabhīṇi ca // NarP_1,117.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25466: evaṃ puṇyā pāpaharā nṛṇā dūrvāṣṭamī dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:25468: yā na pūjayate dūrvā nārī mohādyathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:25469: janmāni trīṇi vaidhavyaṃ labhate sā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25471: jyeṣṭhā nāmnī tu sā jñeyā pūjitā pāpanāśinī // NarP_1,117.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25475: tadavighnena me yātu samāptiṃ tvatprasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25476: ityuccārya tato baddhā ḍoraka dakṣiṇe kare /
GP12nardp1_u:25491: pīyūṣadhāma rohiṇyāḥ sahitār'ghyaṃ gṛhāṇa me // NarP_1,117.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25495: reṇuke trāhi māṃ devi rāmamātaḥ śivaṃ kuru // NarP_1,117.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25501: candanaṃ tālapatraṃ ca puṣpamālāṃ tathākṣatān // NarP_1,117.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25502: durvāṃ kausumbhasūtraṃ ca yugaṃ śrīphalameva vā /
GP12nardp1_u:25503: bhakṣyāṇi ca nave śūrpe pratidravyaṃ tu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,117.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:25511: etadvrataṃ mahālakṣmyāḥ kṛtvā vipra vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25513: eṣāṣokāṣṭamī coktā yasyāṃ pūrṇaṃ ramāvratam // NarP_1,117.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:25516: yatra kutrāpi saṃjātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25517: āśvine śuklapakṣe tu proktā vipra mahāṣṭamī // NarP_1,117.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25519: upavāsaṃ caikabhaktaṃ mahāṣṭamyāṃ vidhāya tu // NarP_1,117.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:25521: ūrjje kṛṣṇādike 'ṣṭamyāṃ karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,117.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:25523: candrodayer'ghadānaṃ ca vidheyaṃ vratibhiḥ sadā // NarP_1,117.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25525: gopāṣṭamīti saṃproktā kārtike dhavale dale // NarP_1,117.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:25533: vratametannaraḥ kṛtvā nārī vā vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,117.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25534: putraṃ sallakṣaṇopetaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:25536: upoṣya jāgaraṃ kṛtvā mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate // NarP_1,117.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:25541: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tu pauṣasya śivaṃ sampūjya bhaktitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25549: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ phaālgunasya śivaṃ cāpi śivāṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:25553: śītale tvaṃ jaganmātā śītale tvaṃ jagatpitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25554: śītale tvaṃ jagadvātrī śītalāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_1,117.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:25557: śītale śītale cetthaṃ ye japanti jale lthitāḥ //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:25558: teṣāṃ tu śītalā devī syādvisphoṭakaśāntidā // NarP_1,117.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:25560: tasya varṣaṃ bhavecchāntiḥ śītalāyāḥ prasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:25562: śivāṃ vāpiśivaṃ prārcyalabhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:25563: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitāṣṭamīvratakathanaṃ nāma saptadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25566: atha vakṣyāmi viprendra navamyāste vratāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25567: yāni kṛtvā narā loke labhante vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,118.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25573: eva yaḥ kurute bhaktyā śrīrāmanavamīvratam // NarP_1,118.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25574: vidhūya cehapāpāni vraje dviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25575: uktaṃ mātṛvrataṃ cātra bhairaveṇa samanvitāḥ // NarP_1,118.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:25577: atraiva bhadrakālo tu yoginīnāṃ mahābalā // NarP_1,118.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25581: vidhinā sa vimānena devataiḥ saha modate // NarP_1,118.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25587: āṣāḍhe māsi viprendra yaḥ kuryātpakṣayordvija // NarP_1,118.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25589: sa bhavedvai valoke tu bhogabhāragdevayānagaḥ // NarP_1,118.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25591: pakṣayorupavāsaṃ vā kaumārīṃ caṇḍikāṃ yajet // NarP_1,118.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25595: sa vimānena gacchedvai devīlokaṃ sanātanam // NarP_1,118.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25596: bhādre tu navamī śuklā nandāhvā parikīrtitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25601: tato niśāyāṃ prāgyāme khaḍgaṃ dhanuriṣūngadām // NarP_1,118.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25602: śūlaṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ chirikāṃ carma kheṭakam /
GP12nardp1_u:25603: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ gajaṃ cāśva govṛṣaṃ pustakaṃ tulām // NarP_1,118.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25605: saṃpūjya mahiṣaṃ tatra bhadrakālyai samālabhet // NarP_1,118.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25606: evaṃ baliṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā pakkānna meva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25607: dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ datvā vrataṃ tatra samāpayet // NarP_1,118.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25612: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ cāpi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25615: svayaṃ bhuktvā ca vihareddvijebhyo dattadakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,118.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25616: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā japadānaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25617: homaṃ ca sarvamakṣayyaṃ bhavediti vidhervayaḥ // NarP_1,118.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25621: pauṣe śuklanavamyāṃ tu mahāmāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,118.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25623: māghamāse tu vā śuklā navamī lokapūjitā // NarP_1,118.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25625: tasyāṃ snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ japo homa upoṣaṇam // NarP_1,118.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25631: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitanavamīvratakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25634: atha te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi daśamyā vai vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25635: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā dharmarājapriyo bhavet // NarP_1,119.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25645: labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25646: jyeṣṭhe śukladaśamyāṃ tu jāhnavī saritāṃ varā /
GP12nardp1_u:25647: samāyātā dharāṃ svargāttasmātsā puṇyadā smṛtā // NarP_1,119.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25648: jyeṣṭhaḥ śukladalaṃ hasto budhaśca daśamīḥ tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25651: harate daśa pāpāni tasmāddaśaharaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,119.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25652: asyāṃ yo jāhnavīṃ prāpya snāti saṃprītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25653: vidhinā jāhnavītoye sa yāti harimandiram // NarP_1,119.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25655: tasyāṃ snānaṃ japo dānaṃ homo vā svargatipradāḥ // NarP_1,119.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25657: asyāṃ śivārcanaṃ śastaṃ gandhādyai rupacārakaiḥ // NarP_1,119.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25658: tatropavāso naktaṃ vā dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ japaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25659: hemno dāna ca dhenvādeḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,119.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25661: vrataṃ daśāvatārākhyaṃ tatra snānaṃ jalāśaye // NarP_1,119.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25664: matsyaṃ kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ ca narasiṃhaṃ trivikramam /
GP12nardp1_u:25665: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca bauddhaṃ kalkinameva ca // NarP_1,119.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25669: visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayaṃ sveṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,119.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25677: kinnaṃ dhānyaṃ saraupyaṃ tu dhṛtvā dhautāṃśukāvṛtam // NarP_1,119.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25681: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ tu naro varṣaṃ suravānvitaḥ // NarP_1,119.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25684: pūrvadikṣu śamīṃ vipra gatvā tanmūlajāṃ mṛdam /
GP12nardp1_u:25686: saṃpūjya tāṃ vidhānena sajjīkṛtya svakaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:25689: manasā kalpitāṃ vāpi svarṇaṃ puṃravaṃśareṇa vai // NarP_1,119.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25693: dhanaṃ jayaṃ sutān gāśca gajāśvaṃ vāpyajāvikam // NarP_1,119.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25695: daśamyāṃ kārtike śukle sārvabhaumavrataṃ caret // NarP_1,119.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25697: daśadikṣu baliṃ dadyād gṛhadvāpi purādbrahiḥ // NarP_1,119.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25700: yo me pūrvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25702: yo me vahnigataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25704: yo me dakṣagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25705: taṃ yamaḥ pretarājo vai nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,119.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25706: yo me nairṛtigaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25710: yo me vāyugataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25712: yo me saumyagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25714: yo ma īśagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25716: yo maṃ ūrddhvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25720: ityevaṃ dikṣu daśasu baliṃ datvā samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25725: dvādaśābhyarcya saṃbhojya śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,119.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25727: yugaṃ svargasukhaṃ bhuktvā sārvabhaumo nṛpo bhavet // NarP_1,119.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25731: etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra hyārogyaṃ prāpya bhūtale // NarP_1,119.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25733: pauṣe daśamyāṃ śuklāyāṃ viśvedevān samarcayet // NarP_1,119.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25734: ṛtuṃ dakṣaṃ vasū6nsatyaṃ kālaṃ kāmaṃ muniṃ gurum /
GP12nardp1_u:25735: vipraṃ rāmaṃ ca daśadhā keśavastānsamāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,119.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25739: dakṣiṇāṃ tāṃ dvijāgryebhyo gurave vā samarpayet // NarP_1,119.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25740: evaṃ kṛtavidhi ścaikabhakto bhogī vratī bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:25741: lokadvayasya viprarṣe nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25745: ātmā hyāyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca // NarP_1,119.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25746: barhiṣmāṃśca gaviṣṭhaśca dattaḥ satyaśca te daśa /
GP12nardp1_u:25759: gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ bhaktyā māmanukaṃpaya // NarP_1,119.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25761: raupyāṃ sudakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,119.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25765: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitadaśamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25769: nānāpuṣpairmune kṛtvā vicitraṃ maṇḍapaṃ śubham // NarP_1,120.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25775: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25780: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam ///
GP12nardp1_u:25781: iyaṃ tu kāmadā nāma sarvapātakanāśinī // NarP_1,120.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25787: sarvapāpa vinirmukto vaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padvam // NarP_1,120.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25789: snātvā pare 'hni saṃpūjya gandhādyaiḥ puruṣottamam // NarP_1,120.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25791: jeṣṭhasya kṛṣṇakādaśyāṃ samupoṣya parāṃ nṛpa // NarP_1,120.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25793: tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya datvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25795: jyeṣṭhasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ nirjalāṃ samupoṣya tu // NarP_1,120.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25805: upoṣya tasmin divase vidhivanmaṇḍape śubhe // NarP_1,120.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25809: tataḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya mantraiḥ śuddhajalena ca // NarP_1,120.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25813: vibuddhe tvayi buddhaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ carācaram // NarP_1,120.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25819: tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25825: upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśa bhistataḥ saṃbhojya vai dvijān // NarP_1,120.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25826: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25828: sa sarvakāmāṃllabdhveha yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25829: ekādaśyāṃ nabhaḥśukle pavitrāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25832: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyaḥ putraṃ prāpyeha sadguṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25845: tataḥ prabhāpte dvādaśyāṃ gandhādyairarcya vāmanam // NarP_1,120.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25847: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra padmāvratamanuttamam // NarP_1,120.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25848: bhuktiṃ prāpyeha muktiṃ tu labhateṃ'te prapañcataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25849: iṣasya kṛṣṇaikā daśyāmindirāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25851: viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ vipra tataḥ prātarharerdine // NarP_1,120.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25853: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā tāṃstato 'śnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,120.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25855: pitṝṇāṃ koṭimuddhṛtya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,120.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25859: bhaktyā praṇamya visṛjedaśnīyācca svayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,120.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25860: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā naraḥ pāśāṅkuśāvratam /
GP12nardp1_u:25861: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānyāti viṣṇoḥ salokatām // NarP_1,120.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25867: vyomayānena sāṃnidhyaṃ labhate ca ramāpateḥ // NarP_1,120.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25873: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā gadādāmodaraṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25877: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā bodhinīvratamādṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25881: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25884: sa vimānaṃ samāruhya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25885: mārgasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ mokṣākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25888: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25889: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25894: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saphalāyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,120.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25896: pauṣasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ putradāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25898: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyastu dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25900: evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhukvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:25902: māghamya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ ṣaṭtilāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25903: snātvā datvā tarpayitvā hutvā bhuktvā samarcya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25904: tilaireva dvijaśreṣṭha dvādaśyāṃ prātareva hi // NarP_1,120.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25907: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra vidhinā susamāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25911: bhojayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca datvā viprānvisṛjya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25912: svayaṃ bhuñjīta taccheṣaṃ prayato nijabāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:25913: ya evaṃ kurute vipra vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25914: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānante viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,120.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25918: visṛjya bāndhavaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayamaśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,120.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25920: dehānte vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ yāti devaiḥ susatkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25926: sitaikādaśyāṃ tapasye vrajedviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25930: datvā tebhyo visṛjyātha svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:25932: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ vimānena tu bhāsvatā // NarP_1,120.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:25933: itthaṃ kṛṣṇo tathā śukle vrataṃ caikādaśībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:25934: mokṣadaṃ kīrtitaṃ vipra nāstyasminsaṃśayaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,120.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25936: sarvavratottamaṃ vipra tato jñeyaṃ mahāphalam // NarP_1,120.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25942: daśamyāṃ daśa vastūni varjayedvaiṣṇavaṛ sadā // NarP_1,120.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:25943: dyūtakrīḍāṃ ca nidrāṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25944: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ steyaṃ hiṃsāṃ tathā ratim // NarP_1,120.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:25946: kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāṃ kṣaudraṃ tailaṃ viṇmlecchabhāṣaṇam // NarP_1,120.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:25952: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsastitaikādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25956: yāni kṛtvā naro loke viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,121.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25969: kāñcanaṃ kāmadevaṃ ca śuktāṃ gāṃ ca payasvinīm /
GP12nardp1_u:25975: svāstṛtāṃ tatra śayyāṃ tu kṛtvātra śrīyutaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:25982: saptajanmasu bhuṅkte ca bhogān lokadvayepsitān // NarP_1,121.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25994: tabhyo vāsāṃsi daṇḍāṃśca brahmasūtrāṇi mudrikāḥ // NarP_1,121.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25996: dvādaśyāṃ tu nabhaḥśukle śrīdharaṃ pūjayedvratī // NarP_1,121.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25998: saṃbhojya dakṣiṇā raupyāṃ datvā natvā visarjjayet // NarP_1,121.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:26000: dvādaśyāṃ nabhasyaśukle vratī saṃpūjya vāmanam // NarP_1,121.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26002: sauvarṇī dakṣiṇāṃ datvā viṣṇuprītikaro bhavet // NarP_1,121.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26009: tatra vatsayutāṃ gāṃ tu samālikhya sugandhibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26018: surabhi tvaṃ jaganmātā nityaṃ viṣṇupade sthitā // NarP_1,121.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26022: taddine tailapakvaṃ ca sthālīpakvaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,121.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26023: gokṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi takraṃ ca varjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26030: dehānte viṣṇusāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,121.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26034: hutvā tatra samuddīpte raupya dīpikayā mune // NarP_1,121.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26036: tatraivānugatāṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmāṇīṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā // NarP_1,121.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26037: ādityaṃ śaṅkaraṃ gaurīṃ yakṣaṃ gaṇapatiṃ grahān /
GP12nardp1_u:26040: namo jayeti śabdaiśca ghaṇṭāśaṅkhā diniḥsvanaiḥ // NarP_1,121.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26044: rājacihnāni sarvāṇi cchatrādīni ca nārada // NarP_1,121.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26053: yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre pure grāme kriyate śāntiruttamā /
GP12nardp1_u:26054: nīrājanābhidhā vipra tadrogā yānti saṃkṣayam // NarP_1,121.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26056: manobhavastathā prāṇo naro yātaśca vīryavān // NarP_1,121.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26058: vibhuścāpi prabhuścaiva sādhyā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,121.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26064: dhātāmitror'yamā pūṣā śakroṃ'śo varuṇo bhagaḥ // NarP_1,121.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26066: pratimāsaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāmarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,121.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26067: varṣaṃ nayedvratānte tu pratimā dvādaśāpi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26068: haimīḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā bhojayitvā dvijottamān // NarP_1,121.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26070: eva vrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā dvādaśādityasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,121.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:26072: jāyate bhuvi dharmātmā mānuṣye rogavarjitaḥ // NarP_1,121.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26075: nirañjanaṃ nirā kāraṃ nirdvandvaṃ brahma cāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:26080: tataḥ samānte tāṃ mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:26086: iti kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra prīṇayitvā janārdanam // NarP_1,121.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26087: sauvarṇena vimānena yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:26092: śoṣayedātape dhṛtvā pātre tāmre 'tha mṛnmaye // NarP_1,121.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:26094: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ viṣṇorniśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ caret // NarP_1,121.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:26096: tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ tilapātropari sthitām // NarP_1,121.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26101: vaiṣṇavyātha ca pūraṇāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottara tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26104: viprebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26105: naro vā yadi vā nārī vrataṃ kṛtvaivamādarāt // NarP_1,121.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26109: pītvā gaśṛṅgavāryādau tāṃ ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam // NarP_1,121.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:26115: candanaṃ palikaṃ vastraṃ pañcahastonmitaṃ tanum // NarP_1,121.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:26116: evaṃ tu māsikaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā prāśya yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:26117: gomūtraṃ jalamājyaṃ vā paktvā śākaṃ caturvidham // NarP_1,121.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26120: evaṃ kṛtavrato varṣaṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ raveḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26121: kṛtvā vai tāmrapātrasthāṃ nyasyābhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26123: viprāndrādaśa saṃbhojya tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,121.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26127: abhyacya vidhivadbhaktyā suvarṇaṃ tanmukhe nyaset // NarP_1,121.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:26133: antye sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,121.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26138: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GP12nardp1_u:26139: etā aṣṭau sadopoṣyā dvādaśyaḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,121.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:26141: kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmannetāsāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26142: tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva yāścanyāḥ puṇyadāyukāḥ // NarP_1,121.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26145: praśasya bhrātaraṃ prāha mahābhāgavataṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,121.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26147: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhrātaḥ sādhūnāṃ saṃśayacchidā /
GP12nardp1_u:26148: vakṣye mahādvādaśīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca phalaṃ pṛthak // NarP_1,121.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26150: tadā tu trispṛśā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26154: tadā tāṃ saṃparityajya dvādaśīṃ samupoṣayet // NarP_1,121.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:26158: tadā vañjulikākhyāṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvopoṣayetsadā // NarP_1,121.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:26163: kuhūrāke yadā vṛddhe syātāṃ vipra yadā tadā /
GP12nardp1_u:26164: pakṣavarddhanikā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:26167: yadā tu dhavale pakṣe dvādaśī syānmadhānvitā //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:26168: tadā proktā jayā nāma sarvaśatruvināśinī // NarP_1,121.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:26172: tadā sā vijayā nāma tasyāmacedgadādharam // NarP_1,121.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:26176: dvādaśī sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī nāmataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,121.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:26180: yadā tu syātsite pakṣe dvādaśī jīvabhānvitā // NarP_1,121.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:26186: tadā vratadvayaṃ kāryyaṃ na doṣo 'traikadaivatam // NarP_1,121.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:26188: ūrjje sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāmantyabhe ca vratadvayam // NarP_1,121.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:26191: ekādaśyā vrataṃ nityaṃ dvādaśyāḥ sahitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26193: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne pūrvabhāge caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26197: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā subhago jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,122.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26199: kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnena vījeyavdyajanena ca // NarP_1,122.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:26207: namo mārāya kāmāya kāmadevasya mūrttaye // NarP_1,122.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26212: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra varṣe varṣe mahotsavam /
GP12nardp1_u:26213: vasaṃtasamaye prāpte hṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sadaiva saḥ // NarP_1,122.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26215: madanaṃ hṛdbhavaṃ kāmaṃ manmathaṃ ca ratipriyam // NarP_1,122.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:26219: ajāyā dānamapyuktaṃ snātvā nadyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:26221: bhūyastvanena dānena sa loke naiva jāyate // NarP_1,122.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26222: yadīyaṃ śaninā yuktā sā mahāvāruṇī smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:26224: śubhayogaḥ śatarkṣaṃ ca śanau kāme madhau site /
GP12nardp1_u:26229: evameva vrataṃ kāryaṃ varṣānte gāmalaṅkṛtām // NarP_1,122.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26233: śvetamandāramarkaṃ vā karavīraṃ ca raktakam // NarP_1,122.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:26236: pūjitā mama daurbhāgyaṃ nāśayantu namo 'stu vaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26237: itthaṃ yor'cayate bhaktyā varṣe varṣe drumatrayam // NarP_1,122.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26238: naśyate tasya daurbhāgyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:26241: haimyau raupyau ca mṛnmapyau yathāśaktyā vidhāya ca // NarP_1,122.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26244: tataḥ pañcadinaṃ pūjā caikabhaktaṃ vrataṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26245: tṛtīyadivase prātaḥ snātvā saṃpūjya tau punaḥ // NarP_1,122.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26247: varṣe varṣe tataḥ paścādvidheyaṃ varṣapañcakam // NarP_1,122.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:26249: itthaṃ naro vā nārī vā kṛtvā vratamidaṃ śubham // NarP_1,122.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:26253: kṛtopavāsā kanyaiva nārī vā dvijasattama // NarP_1,122.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26254: tāmre vā mṛnmaye vāpi sauvarṇe rājate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26257: satakṛtya bhojya pratime dadyāttābhyāṃ sadakṣiṇe // NarP_1,122.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:26261: lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ kṛtvā sauvarṇaṃ vāpi rājatam // NarP_1,122.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26263: pīṭhe vinyasya vastrāḍhyaṃ gandhādyaiḥ paripūjayet // NarP_1,122.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26265: evaṃ dinatrayaṃ kṛtvā vratānte māsamarcya ca // NarP_1,122.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26268: tāsāṃ madhye tu yā nandā tasyai dhenvai namo namaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26270: gāvo mamāgrataḥ santu gāvo me saṃtu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26271: gāvo me pārśvataḥ saṃtu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // NarP_1,122.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26277: haimaṃ hyaśokaṃ nirmāya pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26283: samabhyarcya vidhānena dvijaṃ saṃbhojya dāpayet // NarP_1,122.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26287: pradoṣe tailadīpaṃ tu prajvālyābhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,122.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:26289: evaṃ kṛte tu viprendra yamapīḍā na jāyate // NarP_1,122.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26291: punaḥ snātvā pradoṣe tu vāgyataḥ susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,122.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:26296: tataḥ stuvīta deveśaṃ śivaṃ nāmnāṃ śatena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26297: tāni nāmāni kīrtyante sarvābhīṣṭapradāni vai // NarP_1,122.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26299: kaparddine sureśāya vyomakeśāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26303: vyālapriyāya vyālāya vyālānāṃ pataye namaḥ // NarP_1,122.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26307: vedagītāya guptāya vedaguhyāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26309: namo jagatpratiṣṭhāya vyomarūpāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26315: trinetrāya trivedāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // NarP_1,122.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:26317: viśvarūpāya viśvāya viśvanāthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26319: arūpāya virūpāya sūkṣmasūkṣmāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:26324: namaḥ prabhāvarūpāya prabhāvārthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:26326: triyaṃbakāya śitikaṇṭhabhārgiṇe gaurīyuje maṅgalahetave namaḥ // NarP_1,122.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26336: evaṃ kṛte tu vidhivadvratī saubhāgyabhājanaḥ // NarP_1,122.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26342: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahaṃ snātasya yatphalam /
GP12nardp1_u:26344: tatra snānaṃ japo homo dānaṃ cānantyamaśnute /
GP12nardp1_u:26345: phaālgune tu site pakṣe trayodaśyāmupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,122.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26351: tato vratānte tu punaḥ sauvarṇaṃ dhananāyakam // NarP_1,122.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26358: guruṃ samarcya vastrādyaiḥ pratimāṃ tāṃ nivedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26359: dvijebhyo dakṣaṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visṛjya ca // NarP_1,122.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:26361: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra nirdhanaḥ prāpya vaibhavam // NarP_1,122.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26362: modate bhuvi vikhyāto rājarāja ivāparaḥ // NarP_1,122.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26363: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvādaśamāsasthitatrayodaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśadadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26366: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi caturdaśyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26367: yāni kṛtvā naro loke sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,123.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26378: datvā mantraṃ dvijāgryāya bhuñjīta ca pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26379: evameva tu kṛṣṇāsu sarvāsu dvijasattama // NarP_1,123.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26383: niśāgame tu saṃpūjya nṛsiṃhaṃ daityasūdanam // NarP_1,123.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26391: varṣe varṣe sa labhate bhuktabhogo hareḥ padam // NarP_1,123.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26393: durlabhaṃ vārcanaṃ tatra darśanaṃ pāpanāśanam // NarP_1,123.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:26399: evaṃ yaḥ pūjayetpaiṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam // NarP_1,123.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26407: śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tato devyai nivedayet // NarP_1,123.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26413: gandhādyaiḥ prāk samabhyarcyaḥ kārpāsaṃ paṭṭajaṃ tu vā // NarP_1,123.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26415: tataḥ purāṇamuttārya sūtraṃ kṣiptvā jalāśayeṃ // NarP_1,123.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26421: suśobhane nyasettatra kalaśaṃ tāmrajaṃ mune // NarP_1,123.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26423: pītapaṭṭāṃśukācchannāṃ tatra tāṃ vidhinā yajet // NarP_1,123.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26425: tato homaṃ haviṣyeṇa kṛtvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret // NarP_1,123.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:26426: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dhenuṃ pratimāṃ ca dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:26431: kadalīvratamapyatra tadvidhānaṃ ca me śṛṇu // NarP_1,123.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26432: naro vā yadi vā nārī raṃbhāmupavanasthitām /
GP12nardp1_u:26435: evaṃ saṃpūjya mantreṇa tataḥ saṃprārthayerdvatī // NarP_1,123.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26437: śarīrārogyalāvaṇyaṃ dehi devi namo 'stu te // NarP_1,123.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26438: iti saṃprārthyaṃ kanyāstu catasro vā suvāsinīḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26440: namaskṛtya nijaṃ gehaṃ samāpya niyamaṃ vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:26441: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra labdhvā saubhāgyamuttamam // NarP_1,123.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26447: tarpaṇaṃ ca gavāṃ grāsaṃ baliṃ caiva śvakākayoḥ // NarP_1,123.41 //

GP12nardp1_u:26462: snātvā viśveśvaro devo devaiḥ saha munīśvara /

GP12nardp1_u:26473: śvetāyāḥ kṣīramuditaṃ raktāyāśca tathā dadhi // NarP_1,123.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26475: kuśāṃ bunā tataḥ prātaḥ snātvā santarpyaṃ devatāḥ // NarP_1,123.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26478: yacca bālye kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kaumāre vārddhake 'pi yat /
GP12nardp1_u:26487: pare 'hni prātarutthāya snātvā somaṃ maheśvaram // NarP_1,123.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26496: tatsthaṃ dvijātaye dattvā modate divi devavat /
GP12nardp1_u:26501: kṛśarānnaṃ svayaṃ cāpi tadevāśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,123.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26509: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ martyo mahādevaprasādataḥ // NarP_1,123.72 //

GP12nardp1_u:26517: udyāpane tu sarvāṃsāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate // NarP_1,123.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26521: pātrāṇi yajñasūtrāṇi tāvatyeva hi kalpayet // NarP_1,123.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26523: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsasthitacaturdaśīvratavarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26526: atha nārada vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrṇāvratāni te /
