GP12nardp1_u:26533: śṛtānnamudakuṃbhaṃ ca vaiśākhyāṃ vai dvijottame // NarP_1,124.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26535: atra kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadyātsakhuraṃ ca saśṛṅgakam // NarP_1,124.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26539: modate viṣṇu loke hi yāvaccandrārkatārakam // NarP_1,124.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26541: yaḥ pradadyāddvijāgryebhyaḥ sa na śocati karhicit // NarP_1,124.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26547: patyā sahāviyogaṃ me vaṭasthe kuru te namaḥ // NarP_1,124.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:26548: iti saprārthya yā nārī bhojayitvā pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26554: evaṃvidhaṃ hariṃ tatra snātvā pūjāṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:26562: pūrṇāntaṃ śrāvaṇe māsi gaurīrūpāṃ ca kokilām /

GP12nardp1_u:26568: tato vratānte haimīṃ vā tilapiṣṭamayīṃ dvija /

GP12nardp1_u:26582: gandhādyairabhipūjya devanikarānsaṃprārthya viṣṇvādikānbadhnīyāddvijahastataḥ pramudito natvā prakoṣṭhe svake // NarP_1,124.29 //

GP12nardp1_u:26591: kṛtāñjaliḥ prārthayecchvaḥ kariṣye ca vrataṃ prabho /

GP12nardp1_u:26608: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caiva umāmāheśvarābhidham // NarP_1,124.42 //

GP12nardp1_u:26631: niśīthe carate loke ko jāgartiṃ dharātale /
GP12nardp1_u:26632: tasmai vittaṃ prayacchāmi jāgrate pūjakāya me // NarP_1,124.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26639: kīṭāḥ pataṅgā maśakāśca vṛkṣā jale sthale ye vicaranti jīvāḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:26645: evaṃ devānsamabhyarcya dīpo deyo gṛhādbahiḥ // NarP_1,124.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26648: gavāṃ kṣīreṇa saṃpūrya haimaṃ tatra vinikṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:26650: mahāmatsyāya ca nama iti mantraṃ samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:26654: atra kṛttvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vrataṃ naktaṃ ca nārada /

GP12nardp1_u:26713: itthaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ tithikṛtyaṃ mune tava // NarP_1,124.95 //

GP12nardp1_u:26719: saṃpūjitāḥ śāstravidāṃ variṣṭhāḥ kṛtāhnikā jagmurumeśalokam // NarP_1,125.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26723: jagmustato jñānaghanasvarūpā natvā purāriṃ svapiturnikāśam // NarP_1,125.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:26724: tatpādapadme praṇatiṃ vidhāya pitrāpi satkṛtya sabhājitāste /
GP12nardp1_u:26725: labdhvāśiṣo 'dyāpi caranti śaśvallokeṣu tīrthāni ca tīrthabhūtāḥ // NarP_1,125.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26727: dadhyuściraṃ viṣṇupadābjamavyayaṃ dhyāyanti yadyatayo vītarāgāḥ // NarP_1,125.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26729: labdhvā jñānaṃ savijñānaṃ bhṛśaṃ prītamanā hyabhūt // NarP_1,125.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26731: praṇamya satkṛtaḥ pitrā brahmaṇā niṣasāda ca // NarP_1,125.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26733: varṇayāmāsa tattvena so 'pi śrutvā mumoda ca // NarP_1,125.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26747: atha śvetābhrasadṛśe śṛṅge tasya ca bhūbhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,125.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:26753: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado viprā bhaktinamrātmakandharaḥ // NarP_1,125.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:26757: athāpṛcchacca kuśalaṃ nāradaṃ jagatāṃ guruḥ // NarP_1,125.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:26758: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvamasti me /
GP12nardp1_u:26759: sarveṣāṃ yogivaryāṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatra vāḍavāḥ // NarP_1,125.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26761: sa śivaḥ sādaraṃ tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,125.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:26763: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavaṃ jñānaṃ śaṅkarāllokaśaṅkarāt // NarP_1,125.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26767: etadvaḥ kīrtitaṃ viprā nāradīyaṃ mahanmayā // NarP_1,125.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26773: setau kāñcyāṃ kuśasthalyāṃ gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale // NarP_1,125.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26775: sa labhetsarvaya jñānāṃ tīrthānāṃ ca phalaṃ mahat // NarP_1,125.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26781: kathitaḥ sarvapāpaghnaḥ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,125.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26786: tapasāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca phalānāṃ saṃprakāśakam /
GP12nardp1_u:26787: mantrāṇāṃ caiva yantrāṇāṃ vedāṅgānāṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // NarP_1,125.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26789: ya etatpaṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,125.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26791: śrutvedaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam // NarP_1,125.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26795: yastu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃgraham // NarP_1,125.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26797: kāyena manasā vācā dhanādyairapi saṃtatam // NarP_1,125.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26799: śrutvā purāṇaṃ vidhivaddhomaṃ kṛtvā surārcanam // NarP_1,125.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26801: dakṣiṇāṃ pradadecchaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ // NarP_1,125.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26802: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaraṃ ca saro yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26803: kāśī purī nago merurdevo nārāyaṇo hariḥ // NarP_1,125.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26805: mārgo mṛgendraḥ puruṣo 'śvatthaḥ prahlāda ānanam // NarP_1,125.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26806: uccaiḥ śravā vasaṃtaśca japaḥ śeṣor'yamā dhanuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26807: pāvako viṣṇurindraśca kapilo vākpatiḥ kaviḥ // NarP_1,125.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26811: śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu sarveṣāṃ vo dvijottamāḥ // NarP_1,125.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26816: śrutaṃ samyaganuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuśca satriṇaḥ // NarP_1,125.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26818: sa tu nirviṣamanasā sametya yāgaṃ labhate satamabhīpsitaṃ hi lokam // NarP_1,125.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26819: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
